text: 如果双曲线的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}(-3,0)$, $F_{2}(3,0)$ ,一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{2} x$，则该双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-3, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (3, 0);Focus(G)={F1,F2};Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(2)*x)
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2 + x^2/k^2 = 1);k: Number;k>0;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (3,0)

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的任意一点$P$，记点$P$到$y$轴的距离为$d$，对于给定点$A(4,5)$，则$|P A|+d$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(A) = (4, 5);PointOnCurve(P,G);Distance(P, yAxis) = d;d:Number

text: 过点$M(3 ,-1)$且被点$M$平分的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的弦所在直线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: LineSegment;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (3, -1);IsChordOf(H,G);MidPoint(H)=M;PointOnCurve(M,H)

text: 动点$P$与定点$A(-1,0)$ , $B(1,0)$的连线的斜率之积为$-1$，则点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Slope(LineSegmentOf(P, A))*Slope(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) = -1;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-1, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (1, 0)

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1)

text: 点$P(x, y)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}} + \frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$上的任意一点，$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$是椭圆的两个焦点，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2} \leq 90^{\circ}$，则该椭圆的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};AngleOf(F1, P, F2) <= ApplyUnit(90, degree)

text: 若双曲线$C$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$有相同的焦点，且一条渐近线的方程为$y= \sqrt{7} x$，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(C) = Focus(G);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (y = sqrt(7)*x)

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1(m, n>0)$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$ , 一个焦点恰好是抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点，则椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;n: Number;m>0;n>0;Eccentricity(H) = 1/2;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);OneOf(Focus(H)) = Focus(G)

text: 已知抛物线的顶点在原点，焦点在$x$轴上，其上的点$P(-3 , m)$到焦点的距离为$5$，则抛物线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;O: Origin;m:Number;Coordinate(P) = (-3, m);Vertex(G) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, Focus(G))=5

text: 已知$M$是抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上一点，$F$为其焦点，点$A(1,5)$，则$|M F|+|M A|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;M: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Coordinate(A) = (1, 5);PointOnCurve(M, G);Focus(G) = F

text: 直线$y=x-1$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$| A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (y = x - 1);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$，直线$y=\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3} b$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$O A \perp O B$，则椭圆离心率的值等于?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;G: Line;Expression(G) = (y = b*sqrt(6)/3);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, A), LineSegmentOf(O, B)) = True

text: 抛物线$y=2 x^{2}$和圆$x^{2}+(y-a)^{2}=1$有两个不同的公共点，则$a$的值的集合是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = 2*x^2);H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + (-a + y)^2 = 1);a: Number;NumIntersection(G, H) = 2

text: 已知点$P(x, y)$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上，则$3 x+2 y$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/9 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);PointOnCurve(P, G);x1:Number;y1:Number

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F_{1}$、$O$为坐标原点，点$P$在椭圆上，点$Q$在椭圆的右准线上，若$\overrightarrow{P Q}=2 \overrightarrow{F_{1} O}$, $\overrightarrow{F_{1} Q}=\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} O}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1} O}|})(\lambda>0)$则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;O: Origin;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Q: Point;PointOnCurve(Q, RightDirectrix(G));VectorOf(P, Q) = 2*VectorOf(F1, O);lambda: Number;lambda>0;VectorOf(F1, Q) = lambda*(VectorOf(F1, O)/Abs(VectorOf(F1, O)) + VectorOf(F1, P)/Abs(VectorOf(F1, P)))

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的右焦点$F$到其一条渐近线的距离为$1$，抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的准线过双曲线的左焦点，则抛物线上的动点$M$到点 $(5,0)$距离的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;b>0;F: Point;RightFocus(G) = F;Distance(F, OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = 1;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;PointOnCurve(LeftFocus(G), Directrix(H)) = True;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, H) = True;I: Point;Coordinate(I) = (5, 0)

text: 已知$M(t, 0)$为抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$对称轴上一点，且过该点的直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，则直线$O A$, $O B$斜率乘积为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;O: Origin;A: Point;M: Point;B: Point;t:Number;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));PointOnCurve(M,SymmetryAxis(G));Coordinate(M) = (t, 0);PointOnCurve(M, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

G: Ellipse;H: Circle;J: Circle;P: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/36 + y^2/32 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 2)^2 = 1);Expression(J) = (y^2 + (x + 2)^2 = 1/4);PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(M, H);PointOnCurve(N, J)

text: 已知斜率为$k$的直线$l$过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，且与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，抛物线$C$的准线上一点$M(-1,-1)$满足$\overrightarrow{M A} \cdot \overrightarrow{M B}=0$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;k: Number;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(M) = (-1, -1);Slope(l)=k;PointOnCurve(Focus(C),l);Intersection(l, C) = {A,B};PointOnCurve(M,Directrix(C));DotProduct(VectorOf(M, A), VectorOf(M, B)) = 0

text: 经过两点$A(0,2)$ , $B(\frac{1}{2}, \sqrt{3})$的椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 2);Coordinate(B) = (1/2, sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(A,G) = True;PointOnCurve(B,G) = True

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点的直线$x-m y+m=0$与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，且$\Delta O A B$($O$为坐标原点) 的面积为$2 \sqrt{2}$，则$m^{6}+m^{4}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;m: Number;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (m - m*y + x = 0);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Area(TriangleOf(O,A,B))=2*sqrt(2)

text: 从抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P$引抛物线准线的垂线，垂足为$M$，且$|P M|=5$，设抛物线的焦点为$F$，则$\cos \angle MPF$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;M: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(P,G);L:Line;PointOnCurve(P,L);IsPerpendicular(L,Directrix(G));FootPoint(L,Directrix(G))=M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M)) = 5;Focus(G) = F

text: 已知曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}-\frac{y^{2}}{b}=1$与直线$x+y-1=0$相交于$P$、$Q$两点，且$\overrightarrow{O P} \cdot \overrightarrow{O Q}=0$($O$为原点)，则$\frac{1}{a}-\frac{1}{b}$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;H: Curve;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (x + y - 1 = 0);Expression(H) = (-y^2/b + x^2/a = 1);Intersection(H, G) = {P, Q};DotProduct(VectorOf(O, P), VectorOf(O, Q)) = 0

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的两个焦点，过点$F_{1}$的直线与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: F2: Point;F1: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);H: Line;PointOnCurve(F1, H) = True;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 设抛物线$x^{2}=2 p y$经过点$(2 , 1)$，则抛物线的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));Coordinate(H) = (2, 1);PointOnCurve(H, G)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{m}-x^{2}=1(m>0)$的一个焦点与抛物线$y=\frac{1}{8} x^{2}$的焦点重合，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;H: Parabola;m>0;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2/m = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x^2/8);OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$，过双曲线$C$的左焦点$F$作一斜率为$\sqrt{2}$的直线交双曲线$C$的左支于$A$、$B$两点，若以$A B$为直径的圆过坐标原点$O$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;a > 0;b > 0;Expression(C) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;l: Line;Slope(l) = sqrt(2);PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, LeftPart(C)) = {A, B};E: Circle;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A, B), E);O: Origin;PointOnCurve(O, E)

text: 若点$P$到直线$x=-1$的距离比它到点$(2 , 0)$的距离小$1$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;H: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x = -1);Coordinate(H) = (2, 0);Distance(P, G) = Distance(P, H) - 1

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，过$F$且斜率为$\sqrt{3}$的直线交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A B}=5 \overrightarrow {F B}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Slope(G) = sqrt(3);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};VectorOf(A, B) = 5*(VectorOf(F, B))

text: 已知$A$、$B$两点均在焦点为$F$的抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上，若$|\overrightarrow{A F}|+|\overrightarrow{B F}|=4$，线段$A B$的中点到直线$x=\frac{p}{2}$的距离为$1$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Expression(H) = (x = p/2);Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);Abs(VectorOf(A, F)) + Abs(VectorOf(B, F)) = 4;Distance(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)),H)=1

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的两条渐近线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1)

text: 若双曲线方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$，则其离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1)

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{3+k}+\frac{y^{2}}{2-k}=1$表示椭圆，则$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(x^2/(3+k)+y^2/(2-k)=1);k:Number

text: 若斜率为$k$的直线$l$与椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$交于$A$、$B$两点，且$A B$的中点坐标为$(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{3})$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: k: Number;l: Line;Slope(l) = k;C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/3 + y^2/2 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = (1/2, 1/3)

text: $A$、$B$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$上两点，线段$A B$的中点在直线$x=-\frac{1}{2}$上，则直线$A B$与$y$轴的交点的纵坐标的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;B: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x = -1/2);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)),H)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{5}$，则其渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(5)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$，若$P$为其右支上一点，且$|P F_{1}|=2|P F_{2}|$，则双曲线离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))

text: 已知双曲线$C$的焦点在坐标轴上，渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} x$，若点$(4,2)$在$C$上，则双曲线$C$的焦距为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (4, 2);Expression(Asymptote(C)) = (y = pm*(sqrt(2)/2)*X);PointOnCurve(G, C);PointOnCurve(Focus(C), axis)

text: 已知中心在原点，对称轴为坐标轴的双曲线的一条渐近线为$y=\frac{4}{3} x$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;O:Origin;Center(C)=O;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=(y=4/3*x);SymmetryAxis(C)=axis

text: 已知点$P(\frac{3}{2},-1)$在抛物线$E$: $x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的准线上，过点$P$作抛物线的切线，若切点$A$在第一象限，$F$是抛物线$E$的焦点，点$M$在直线$A F$上，点$N$在圆$C$:$(x+2)^{2}+(y+2)^{2}=1$上，则$|M N|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;p: Number;C: Circle;G: Line;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;M: Point;N: Point;p>0;Expression(E) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));Expression(C) = ((x + 2)^2 + (y + 2)^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (3/2, -1);PointOnCurve(P, Directrix(E));TangentOfPoint(P , E) = G;TangentPoint(G, E) = A;Quadrant(A) = 1;Focus(E) = F;PointOnCurve(M, LineOf(A, F));PointOnCurve(N, C)
l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Expression(l)=(x-2*y+6=0);IsTangent(l,C)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，离心率为$e$，过$F_{1}$作直线$y=-\frac{b}{a} x$的垂线交双曲线右支于点$P$，若$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{3}$，则$e^{2}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;e:Number;L:Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = -x*b/a);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;Eccentricity(G)=e;PointOnCurve(F1,L);IsPerpendicular(L,H);Intersection(L,RightPart(G))=P;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = pi/3

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若右准线上存在$P$点使得线段$P F_{1}$的垂直平分线恰好过$F_{2}$，则该椭圆的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, RightDirectrix(G)) = True;P: Point;PointOnCurve(F2, PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))) = True

text: 设直线$y=k x$与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$P$为$C$上不同于$A$、$B$的一点，直线$P A$, $P B$的斜率分别为$k_{1}$, $k_{2}$，若$C$的离心率为$2$，则$k_{1} \cdot k_{2}$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;k1: Number;k2:Number;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y = k*x);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};PointOnCurve(P, C);Negation(P = A);Negation(P = B);Slope(LineOf(P,A)) = k1;Slope(LineOf(P,B))=k2;Eccentricity(C) = 2;k:Number

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的两焦点，$P$为椭圆上一点，若$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则离心率$e$的最小值是?

text: 已知点$F_{1}(-\sqrt{2}, 0)$, $F_{2}(\sqrt{2}, 0)$动点$P$满足$|P F_{2}|-|P F_{1}|=2$，当点$P$的纵坐标为$\frac{1}{2}$时，点$P$到坐标原点的距离为?

text: $F$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，$P$是抛物线上任一点，$A(3 , 1)$是定点，则$|PF|+|PA|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(A) = (3, 1);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知点$A(-\sqrt{2}, 0)$, $B(\sqrt{2}, 0)$，动点$P$满足$\angle A P B=\theta$且$|P A| \cdot|P B| \cdot \cos 2 \frac{\theta}{2}=1$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-sqrt(2), 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (sqrt(2), 0);P: Point;AngleOf(A, P, B) = theta;theta: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A))*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B))*Cos(theta/2)^2 = 1

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$M$是双曲线$C$左支上的点，$\Delta M F_{1} F_{2}$的周长是$9$，动点$P$在双曲线$C$的右支上，则$\Delta M F_{1} P$面积的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(M, LeftPart(C));Perimeter(TriangleOf(M, F1, F2)) = 9;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(C))

text: 椭圆的两焦点为$F_{1}(-4,0)$ , $F_{2}(4,0)$，点$P$在椭圆上，若$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积最大为$12$，则椭圆方程为?

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}-ky^{2}=1$的一个焦点是$(3 , 0)$，则实数$k$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-k*y + x^2 = 1);k: Real;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (3, 0);OneOf(Focus(G)) = H

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的左、右焦点，$A$是椭圆的右顶点，动点$P(x_{0}, y_{0})$满足$\overrightarrow{O P} \cdot \overrightarrow{O A}=9$，则当$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}$最大时，$y_{0}^{2}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;O: Origin;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;x0: Number;y0: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/8 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (x0, y0);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;RightVertex(G) = A;DotProduct(VectorOf(O, P), VectorOf(O, A)) = 9;WhenMax(AngleOf(F1, P, F2))

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$($|F_{1} F_{2}|=2 c$)，以坐标原点$O$为圆心，以$c$为半径作圆$A$，圆$A$与双曲线$C$的一个交点为$P$，若三角形$F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为$a^{2}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;c:Number;A: Circle;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) =F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1,F2))=2*c;O:Origin;Center(A)=O;Radius(A)=c;OneOf(Intersection(A, C)) = P;Area(TriangleOf(F1,P,F2)) = a^2

text:
设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点. 若点$P$在双曲线上，且$ \overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，
则$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$=?

text: 若双曲线经过点$(-\sqrt{3} , 6)$，且它的两条渐近线方程是$y=\pm 3 x$，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (-sqrt(3), 6);PointOnCurve(F, E);Expression(Asymptote(E)) = (y = pm*3*x)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8+m}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的离心率是$\frac{1}{2}$，则两准线间的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m + 8) + y^2/9 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 1/2;l1:Line;l2:Line;Directrix(G)={L1,L2}

text: 已知点$P(t, 3)$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 x$上一点，$F$是$C$的焦点，则$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*x);P: Point;t: Number;Coordinate(P) = (t, 3);PointOnCurve(P, C);F: Point;Focus(C) = F

text: 在平面直角坐标系中，$A(-5,0)$ , $B(5,0)$，若$||P A|-| P B||=8$，则$P$点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-5, 0);Coordinate(B)=(5,0);Abs(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,A))-Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,B)))=8

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的右焦点到渐近线的距离是其到左顶点距离的一半，则$b$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;b>0;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Distance(RightFocus(G),Asymptote(G))=(1/2)*Distance(RightFocus(G),LeftVertex(G))

text: 方程$(x^{2}+y^{2}-2) \sqrt{x-3}=0$表示的曲线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Curve;Expression(G)=((x^2+y^2-2)*sqrt(x-3)=0)

text: 若关于$x$, $y$的方程$\frac{x^{2}}{2+k}+\frac{y^{2}}{3-k}=1$表示焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆，则$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;k:Number;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis);Expression(G)=(x^2/(2+k)+y^2/(3-k)=1)

text: 若点$P$、$Q$均在椭圆$T$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}-1}=1(a>1)$上运动，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$T$的左、右焦点，则$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}-2 \overrightarrow{P Q}|$的最大值为?

text: 过双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=8$的右焦点$F_{2}$有一条弦$P Q$ ,$|P Q|=7$, $F_{1}$是左焦点，那么$\Delta F_{1} P Q$的周长为?

text: 已知椭圆的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$, $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$为椭圆的左右焦点，$P$为椭圆上在第一象限的一点，$I$为$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，直线$P I$与$x$轴交于点$Q$，椭圆的离心率为$\frac{1}{3}$，若$\overrightarrow{P Q}=\lambda \overrightarrow{I Q}$，则$\lambda$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;I: Point;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Q: Point;lambda:Number;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) =F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,G);Quadrant(P)=1;Incenter(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = I;Intersection(LineOf(P,I), xAxis) = Q;Eccentricity(G) = 1/3;VectorOf(P, Q) = lambda*VectorOf(I, Q);a:Number;b:Number;a>b;b>0

text: 直线$l$经过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$，且与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=5 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则直线$l$的斜率为?

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$，点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为其两个焦点，点$P$为双曲线上一点，若$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，则$| PF_{1}|+| PF_{2} |$的值为?

text: 如果方程$x^2+k y^2=2$表示焦点在$x$轴上，且焦距为$\sqrt{3}$的椭圆，则椭圆的短轴长为?

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F$作某一渐近线的垂线，分别与两渐近线相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\frac{|A F|}{|B F|}=\frac{1}{2}$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: $F(c , 0)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点，$F$与椭圆上点的距离的最大值为$m$，最小值为$n$，则椭圆上与点$F$距离为$\frac{m+n}{2}$的点是?

text: 已知抛物线方程为$y^{2}=4 x$，直线$l$的方程为$x-y+4=0$，在抛物线上有一动点$P$到$y$轴的距离为$d_{1}$ , $P$到直线$l$的距离为$d_{2}$，则$d_{1}+d_{2}$的最小值为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$，过左焦点$F$且斜率为$\frac{1}{4}$的直线交$C$的一条渐近线于点$A$，且$A$在第一象限，若$|O A|=|O F|$（$O$为坐标原点），则$C$的渐近线方程为?

text: 已知直线$l$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，与准线交于$C$点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，若$\overrightarrow{B C}=3 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$|A F|-|B F|$的值为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的上焦点为$F$，直线$x+y+1=0$和$x+y-1=0$与椭圆相交于点$A$、$B$、$C$、$D$，则$A F+B F+C F+D F$=?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{9}+x^{2}=1$，过点$P(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2})$的直线与椭圆相交于$A$、$B$两点，且弦$A B$被点$P$平分，则直线$A B$的方程为?

text: 对于曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{k-1}=1$表示焦点在$x$轴上椭圆，则$k$的取值范围?

text: 已知$A$、$B$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{m+1}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的长轴的两个端点，$P$是椭圆$C$上的动点，且$\angle A P B$的最大值是$\frac{2 \pi}{3}$，则实数$m$的值是?

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过点$F_{1}$的直线$l$交椭圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，已知$(\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}+ \overrightarrow{F_{1} F_{2}}) \cdot \overrightarrow{A F_{1}}=0$ , $\overrightarrow{A F_{1}}=\frac{4}{3} \overrightarrow {{F}_{1}B}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知抛物线的顶点在原点，对称轴为$x$轴，抛物线上的点$M(-3, m)$到焦点的距离为$5$，则$m$=?

text: 已知方程$(m-1) x^{2}+(3-m) y^{2}=(m-1)(3-m)$表示椭圆，则$m$的取值范围为?

text: 若短轴长为$2 \sqrt{5}$，焦距为$4$的椭圆的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$和$F_{2}$ ,过$F_{1}$作直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?

text: 已知直线$l$: $a x+b y=0$与椭圆$x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$交于$A$、$B$两点，若点$C$的坐标为$(1,1)$，则$\overrightarrow{C A} \cdot \overrightarrow{C B}$的取值范围是?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的上、下顶点分别为$B_{1}$、$B_{2}$. 点$M$为$C$上不在坐标轴上的任意一点，且直线$M B_{1}$, $M B_{2}$的斜率之积为$-\frac{b}{2 a}$，则$C$的离心率为?

text: $P$、$Q$是抛物线$y=x^{2}$上顶点以外的两点，$O$为坐标原点.$\angle P O Q=\frac{\pi}{4}$，直线$l_{1}$,$l_{2}$分别是过$P$、$Q$两点抛物线的切线.($I$)则$l_{1}$,$l_{2}$的交点$M$点的轨迹方程是?($II$)若$l_{1}$,$l_{2}$分别交$x$轴于$A$、$B$两点，则过$\triangle A B M $的垂心与点$(0,-\frac{1}{4})$的直线方程是?

text: 直线$l$与抛物线$y=\frac{x^{2}}{2}$交于$A$、$B$两点，且抛物线在$A$、$B$两点处的切线互相垂直，其中$A$点坐标为$(2 , 2)$, 则直线$l$的斜率等于?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/2);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;IsPerpendicular(TangentOnPoint(A,G),TangentOnPoint(B,G)) = True;Coordinate(A) = (2, 2)

text: 过点$P(1,1)$作直线$l$与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=\lambda$交于$A$、$B$两点，若点$P$恰为线段$A B$的中点，则实数$\lambda$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;B: Point;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = lambda);Coordinate(P) = (1, 1);PointOnCurve(P,l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=P;lambda: Real

text: 已知抛物线$\Gamma_{1}$和$\Gamma_{2}$的焦点均为点$F(2,1)$，准线方程为$x=0$和$5 x+12 y=0$. 设两抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，则直线$A B$的方程为?
fact_expressions: Gamma_1: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Gamma_2: Parabola;Focus(Gamma_1)=F;Focus(Gamma_2)=F;Coordinate(F)=(2,1);Expression(Directrix(Gamma_2)) = (5*x + 12*y = 0);Expression(Directrix(Gamma_1)) = (x = 0);Intersection(Gamma_1,Gamma_2)={A,B}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的两个焦点为$F_{1}(-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, 0)$ , $F_{2}(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, 0)$, 点$P$是第一象限内双曲线上的点，且$\tan \angle P F_{1} F_{2}=\frac{1}{2}$，$\tan \angle P F_{2} F_{1}=-2$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F1) = (-sqrt(3)/2, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (sqrt(3)/2, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Quadrant(P) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, G);Tan(AngleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 1/2;Tan(AngleOf(P, F2, F1)) = -2

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$和圆$O$:$x^{2}+y^{2}=b^{2}$, 若$C$上存在点$P$, 使得过点$P$引圆$O$的两条切线,切点分别为$A$、$B$,满足$\angle A P B=60^{\circ}$, 则椭圆$C$的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;O: Circle;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(O) = (x^2 + y^2 = b^2);TangentOfPoint(P, O) = {l1, l2};TangentPoint(l1,O)=A;TangentPoint(l2,O)=B;AngleOf(A, P, B) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);PointOnCurve(P,C)

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左，右焦点，点$M$在$E$上，且$\angle F_{1} M F_{2}=\frac{2 \pi}{3}$，则$\Delta F_{1} M F_{2}$的面积为?

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，直线$y=\frac{4}{3} x$与双曲线相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$A F \perp B F$，则双曲线的渐进线方程为?

text: 设抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$ , $A \in C$，已知以$F$为圆心，$F A$为半径的圆$F$交$l$于$B$、$D$两点；若$\angle B F D=90^{\circ}$, $\triangle A B D$的面积为$4 \sqrt{2}$；则$p$的值为?

text: 已知点$F_{1}$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左焦点，点$A(1,1)$，动点$P$在椭圆上，则$|P A+ P F_{1}|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;P: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (1, 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 过椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$长轴的一个顶点作圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=b^{2}$的两条切线,切点分别为$A$、$B$, 若$\angle A O B=90^{\circ}$($O$是坐标原点), 则椭圆$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知椭圆的中心在原点，对称轴为坐标轴，短轴的一个端点$B$与椭圆的两个焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$组成的三角形的周长为$4+2 \sqrt{3}$ ,且$\angle F_{1} B F_{2}=\frac{2 \pi}{3}$ ,则椭圆的方程为?

text: 已知曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$，当$m \in[-2 ,-1]$时，该曲线的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左右焦点，点$P$在双曲线的左支上，且$\frac{|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|^{2}}{|P F_{1}|}$的最小值为$8 a$，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的左焦点为$F$、$M$是该双曲线一条渐近线上的点，且$O M \perp M F$ , $O$为坐标原点，若$\triangle O M F$的面积为$4$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，过原点$O$作斜率为$\frac{4}{3}$的直线交$C$的右支于点$A$，若$|O A|=|O F|$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$焦点的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，过点$A$作抛物线准线的垂线，垂足为$M$, $|A B|=|B M|$, 则$A$点的横坐标为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$A$是椭圆上顶点，$D$是$A F_{2}$的中点，若$\overrightarrow{A F_{2}} \perp \overrightarrow{D F_{1}}$ ,则椭圆$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$G$位于第一象限的双曲线上，若点$H$满足$\overrightarrow{O H}=\overrightarrow{O G}+\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{G F_{1}}}{|\overrightarrow{G F_{1}}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{G F_{2}}}{| \overrightarrow{G F_{2}}} |)(\lambda \neq 0)$，且直线$G H$与$x$轴的交点为$P(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}, 0)$，则$G$点的坐标为?

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(a>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$3 x-2 y=0$，则以双曲线的顶点和焦点分别为焦点和顶点的椭圆的离心率为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的两个顶点$A(a, 0)$ , $B(0, b)$，过$A$、$B$分别作$A B$的垂线交该椭圆于不同的$C$、$D$两点，若$2|B D|=3|A C|$，则椭圆的离心率是?

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}}=1(m>0)$的渐近线与圆$x^{2}+(y+2)^{2}=1$没有公共点，则该双曲线的焦距的取值范围为?

text: 已知$A$、$B$两点均在焦点为$F$的抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$上，若$|A F|+|B F|=4$，线段$A B$的中点到直线$x=\frac{p}{2}$的距离为$1$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (x = p/2);PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);Focus(G)=F;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 4;Distance(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)),H)=1

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，上顶点为$A$，点$P$为第一象限内椭圆上的一点，$|P F_{1}|+|P F_{2}|=4|F_{1} F_{2}|$，$S_{\Delta P F_{1} A}=2 S_{\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}}$，则直线$P F_{1}$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;A: Point;UpperVertex(G) = A;P: Point;Quadrant(P) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 4*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, A))=2*Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2))

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线$l$: $x=-\frac{5}{4}$，点$M$在抛物线$C$上，点$A$在准线$l$上，若$M A \perp l$，直线$A F$的倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{3}$，则$|M F|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;l: Line;A: Point;F: Point;M: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(C) = F;Expression(l)=(x=-5/4);PointOnCurve(M, C);Directrix(C)=l;PointOnCurve(A, l);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M, A),l);Inclination(LineOf(A,F)) = pi/3

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$的直线交双曲线于$P$、$Q$两点，且$P Q \perp P F_{1} $,$|P Q|=\frac{5}{12}|P F_{1}|$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;P: Point;Q: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2, H);Intersection(H, G) = {P, Q};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, Q), LineSegmentOf(P, F1));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = (5/12)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))

text: 过抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=x$的焦点$F$任作两条互相垂直的直线$l_{1}$ , $l_{2}$，分别与抛物线$E$交于$A$、$B$两点和$C$、$D$两点，则$|A B|+4|C D|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;l1:Line;l2:Line;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;D: Point;F:Point;Expression(E) = (y^2 = x);Focus(E)=F;PointOnCurve(F,l1);PointOnCurve(F,l2);IsPerpendicular(l1,l2);Intersection(l1,E)={A,B};Intersection(l2,E)={C,D}

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$中以$P(8,1)$为中点的弦所在的直线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: LineSegment;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/4 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (8, 1);IsChordOf(H, G);MidPoint(H) = P

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1 (a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}={8} x$的焦点重合，且焦点到其渐近线的距离为$1$，则此双曲线的实轴长?

text: 已知双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}$，则$C$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(5)/2

text: 已知点$P(6 , y)$在抛物线$y^{2}=2 px(p>0)$上，$F$为抛物线焦点，若$|PF|=8$，则点$F$到抛物线准线的距离等于?

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-k y^{2}=1$的一个焦点是$(\sqrt{5}, 0)$，则$k$=?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，直线$y=x-3$交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，且$|A F|+|B F|=|A B|$，则$p$=?

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$右支上一点$A(a , b)$到直线$y=x$的距离为$\sqrt {2}$，则$a+b$=?

text: 以双曲线的一个顶点为圆心的圆经过该双曲线的一个焦点，且与该双曲线的一条准线相切，;则该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{15}=1$的离心率为$e$，则$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/15 = 1);e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上一点$P$到它的一个焦点的距离等于$2$，那么点$P$到另一个焦点的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1:Point;F2:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P,F1)=2;OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F2;Negation(F1=F2)
G: Ellipse;k: Number;Expression(G) = (k*y^2 + 3*x^2 = 3);FocalLength(G) = 2*sqrt(2)

text: 若椭圆$b^{2} x^{2}+a^{2} y^{2}=a^{2} b^{2}(a>b>0)$和圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=(\frac{b}{2}+c)^{2}$有四个交点，其中$c$为椭圆的半焦距，则椭圆的离心率$e$的取值范围为?

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的左、右焦点，$P$为椭圆上任一点，点$M$的坐标为$(6,4)$，则$|P M|+|P F_{1}|$的最大值为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(a>0)$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$有相同的焦点，则$a$的值为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ , 过点$F_{2}$作直线交椭圆于$M$、$N$两点，线段$M N$长度的最小值为$3$. 若$|\overrightarrow{N F_{2}}|=\lambda|\overrightarrow{F_{2} M}|(\lambda \in[1,2])$，则弦长$M N$的取值范围为?

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，点$O$是原点，若$|A F|=3$，则$\triangle A O B$的面积为?

text: 已知点$P(1,1)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$某条弦的中点，则此弦所在的直线的一般方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: LineSegment;P:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3=1);MidPoint(H)=P;Coordinate(P) = (1,1);IsChordOf(H,G)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，过点$F$作双曲线$C$的一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$H$，点$P$在双曲线上，且$\overrightarrow{F P}=3 \overrightarrow{F H}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;P: Point;H: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;l:Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);IsPerpendicular(l, OneOf(Asymptote(C)));FootPoint(l, OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=H;PointOnCurve(P, C);VectorOf(F, P) = 3*VectorOf(F, H)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(a>0)$的离心率为$2$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>0;Eccentricity(G) = 2

text: 已知点$F$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点，且过点$F$的直线$y=2 x-4$与此双曲线只有一个交点，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = 2*x - 4);RightFocus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(F, H);NumIntersection(H,G)=1

text: 已知$m>0$ , $A(0, \sqrt{m+1})$ , $B(0,-\sqrt{m+1})$. 若直线$y=3 x$上存在一点$P$，使得$|P B|-|P A|=2$，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y = 3*x);Coordinate(A) = (0, sqrt(m + 1));Coordinate(B) = (0, -sqrt(m + 1));m > 0;PointOnCurve(P, G);-Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) = 2;m: Number

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点的距离到焦点的距离为$5$，则这点的坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);D: Point;PointOnCurve(D, G) = True;Distance(D, Focus(G)) = 5

text: 过抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=4 x$焦点的直线$l$与$E$交于$A$、$B$两点，$E$在点$A$、$B$处的切线分别与$y$轴交于$C$、$D$两点，则$4 \sqrt{2}|C D|-|A B|$的最大值是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;E: Parabola;C: Point;D: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(E), l);Intersection(l, E) = {A, B};Intersection(TangentOnPoint(A,E), yAxis) = C;Intersection(TangentOnPoint(B,E),yAxis)=D
C: Ellipse;E: Circle;M: Point;N: Point;F1:Point;F2:Point;LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;Expression(C) = (x^2/4+y^2/3=1);Expression(E)=((x-4)^2+(y-3)^2=1);PointOnCurve(M,C);PointOnCurve(N,E)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的点到直线$x-y+4=0$的最小距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;P0: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x - y + 4 = 0);PointOnCurve(P0, G)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，过原点$O$的直线$l$交椭圆$C$于点$A$、$B$，且$2|F O|=|A B|$，若$\angle B A F=\frac{\pi}{6}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;O: Origin;l: Line;PointOnCurve(O, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, O)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B));AngleOf(B, A, F) = pi/6

text: 直线$l$过抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，且与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，$|A B|=4$，若$A B$的中点到$y$轴的距离为$1$，则$p$的值是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));PointOnCurve(Focus(C), l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4;Distance(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)), yAxis) = 1

text: 已知抛物线的顶点为原点，对称轴为坐标轴，并且经过点$M(-5 ,-10)$，则抛物线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;O: Origin;Coordinate(M) = (-5, -10);Vertex(G) = O;SymmetryAxis(G)=axis;PointOnCurve(M,G)
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 4

text: 以$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的焦点为顶点，顶点为焦点的椭圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;C: Curve;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1) ;Focus(C) = Vertex(G);Vertex(C) = Focus(G)

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0)$的离心率为$2$，则它的一个焦点到一条渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/m = 1);m: Number;m>0;Eccentricity(G) = 2

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 m x(m>0)$的焦点到双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的一条渐近线的距离为$3$，则此抛物线的方程?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*m*x);m: Number;m>0;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1);Distance(Focus(H),OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = 3

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=16 y$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 16*y)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的实轴长为$8$，右焦点为$F$、$M$是双曲线$C$的一条渐近线上的点，且$O M \perp M F$，$O$为坐标原点，若$S_{\triangle O M F}=6$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;M: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Length(RealAxis(C)) = 8;RightFocus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(M,OneOf(Asymptote(C)));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, M), LineSegmentOf(M, F));Area(TriangleOf(O,M,F)) = 6

text: 设双曲线的焦点在坐标轴上，两条渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{1}{3} x$，则该双曲线的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),axis) = True;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(x/3));e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$，左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$的直线$l$交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，则$|\overrightarrow{B F_{2}}|+|\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;B: Point;F2: Point;A: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，过原点$O$的直线与$C$相交于$A$、$B$两点，连接$B F$，若$|O A|=|O F|=5$ ,$|B F|=8$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;B: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;A: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(O, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F));Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F)) = 5;Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 8

text: 若直线$y=k x+1$与双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$有且只有一个公共点，则$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;k: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = k*x + 1);NumIntersection(H, G) = 1

text: 已知点$A(0,-2)$，椭圆$E$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$ , $F$是椭圆的焦点，直线$A F$的斜率为$\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$ , $E$的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;F: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0,-2);Eccentricity(E) = sqrt(3)/2;Focus(E) = F;Slope(LineOf(A,F))=2*sqrt(3)/3

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{12-m}=1(0<m<12)$的一条渐近线的斜率$k>\sqrt{2}$，则$m$的取值范围是?

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，右顶点为$A$，点$P$为$C$上一动点，若$|P F|$的最大值为$3$，最小值为$1$，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F: Point;A: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;RightVertex(C) = A;PointOnCurve(P, C);Max(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))) = 3;Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))) = 1

text: 已知点$(-2 , 3)$与抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点的距离是$5$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(H) = (-2, 3);Distance(H, Focus(G)) = 5

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$在双曲线上，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=90^{\circ}$，则点$P$到$x$轴的距离等于?

text: 若过双曲线焦点且与双曲线实轴线垂直的弦的长等于焦点到渐近线距离的$2$倍，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;L: LineSegment;IsChordOf(L, G);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), L);IsPerpendicular(L, RealAxis(G));Length(L) = 2*Distance(Focus(G), Asymptote(G))

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$2$，焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点相同，那么双曲线的标准方程为?

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 px(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$ , $M$是抛物线$C$上一动点，$A(0 , 3)$,过$M$作$MN$垂直准线$l$，垂足为$N$，若$|MN|+|MA|$的最小值为$2$，则抛物线$C$的方程为?

text: 离心率$e=\frac{2}{3}$，焦距$2 c=16$的椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;FocalLength(G) = 2*c ;2*c = 16;c: Number;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e;e = 2/3

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$焦点且斜率为$1$的直线$l$与此抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?

text: 已知$B$、$C$是两个定点，$|B C|=6$，且$\triangle A B C$的周长等于$16$，则顶点$A$的轨迹方程为?

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{4}$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，$||F B|-| F A||$=?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，若过点$F$且倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线与双曲线的右支有且只有一个交点，则此双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=m x$的准线与直线$x=1$的距离为$3$，则抛物线的方程为?

text: 方程$\frac{x^{2}}{2 m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m-1}=1$表示焦点在$y$轴上的椭圆，则$m$的取值范围是?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=m x$的焦点是椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左焦点，则抛物线$C$的准线方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = m*x);m: Number;E: Ellipse;Expression(E) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);Focus(C) = LeftFocus(E)

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m+3}+\frac{y^{2}}{4-m}=1$表示焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆，则$m$的取值范围是?

text: 若抛物线的焦点坐标为$(-2,0)$，则抛物线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Coordinate(Focus(G)) = (-2, 0)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率为$2$，则实数$m$=?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$的焦点为$F$，准线与$x$轴的交点为$K$，点$A$在$C$上且$|A K|=\sqrt{2}|A F|$，则$\triangle A F K$的面积为?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$，过其焦点且斜率为$1$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若线段$A B$的中点的纵坐标为$2$，则该抛物线的准线方程为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=4 x$，过焦点$F$作倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，且$|A F|>|B F|$，则$\frac{|A F|}{|B F|}$=?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$M$在双曲线上且$M F_{1} \perp M F_{2}$，则点$M$到$x$轴的距离为?

text: 已知过抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点$F$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=16$，且$|A F|<|B F|$则$|A F|$=?

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的两条渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/9 = 1)

text: 若$A B$为过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$中心的弦，$F_{1}$为椭圆的焦点，则$\triangle F_{1} A B$面积的最大值为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=a y  (a>0)$上一点$P(2 a , 4 a)$到焦点$F$的距离为$17$，则直线$P F$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;a: Number;P: Point;F: Point;a>0;Expression(C) = (x^2 = a*y);Coordinate(P) = (2*a, 4*a);PointOnCurve(P, C);Focus(C) = F;Distance(P, F) = 17

text: 设一双曲线的两条渐近线方程为$2 x-y=0$ , $2 x+y=0$，则双曲线的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;L1: Line;L2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {L1, L2};Expression(L1) = (2*x - y = 0);Expression(L2) = (2*x + y = 0)

text: 双曲线$2 x^{2}-3 y^{2}=1$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (2*x^2 - 3*y^2 = 1)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=16 x$的焦点为$F$，准线是$l$，点$P$是曲线$C$上的动点，点$P$到准线$l$的距离为$d$，点$A(1,6)$，则$|P A|+d$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;l: Line;d: Number;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 16*x);Coordinate(A) = (1, 6);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, C);Directrix(C) = l;Distance(P, l) = d

text: 若椭圆两焦点为$F_{1}(-4 , 0)$ ,$F_{2}(4 , 0)$,点$P$在椭圆上，且$\Delta PF_{1} F_{2}$的面积的最大值为$12$，则此椭圆的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-4, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (4, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Max(Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2))) = 12

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在椭圆上，且$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，$\tan \angle P F_{1} F_{2}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;Tan(AngleOf(P, F1, F2)) = sqrt(3)/3

text: 已知$A$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左顶点，$F$为双曲线$C$的右焦点，以实轴长为直径的圆交其中一条渐近线于点$P$(点$P$在第二象限)，$P A$平行于另一条渐近线，且$S_{\Delta O P A}=\sqrt{3}$，则$P F$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;A: Point;LeftVertex(C) = A;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;G: Circle;Diameter(G) = Length(RealAxis(C));l1: Line;l2: Line;Intersection(G,l1) = P;P: Point;Quadrant(P) = 2;IsParallel(LineSegmentOf(P,A) , l2) = True;O: Origin;Area(TriangleOf(O,P,A)) = sqrt(3);OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = l1;OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = l2;Negation(l1=l2)

text: 若椭圆的焦点坐标为$(\pm 3,0)$，且经过点$(4,0)$，则椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Coordinate(Focus(G)) = (pm*3,0);I: Point;Coordinate(I) = (4, 0);PointOnCurve(I,G) = True

text: $F$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$的焦点，过点$F$的直线与抛物线的一个交点为$A$，交抛物线的准线于$B$，若$\overrightarrow{B A}=2 \overrightarrow{A F}$，且$|\overrightarrow{B A}|=4$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: F: Point;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H) = True;H: Line;OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = A;A: Point;Intersection(H, Directrix(G)) = B;B: Point;VectorOf(B, A) = 2*VectorOf(A, F);Abs(VectorOf(B, A)) = 4

text: 已知双曲线$\frac {x^{2}} {a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线为$y=\sqrt{3} x$，那么双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$，过点$P(1 , 1)$的直线$l$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若点$P$恰为弦$A B$中点，则直线$l$斜率是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (1, 1);PointOnCurve(P, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=P;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),C)

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的准线过双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{9}-\frac{x^{2}}{16}=1$的一个顶点，则抛物线的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));p: Number;p>0;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/16 + y^2/9 = 1);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Vertex(G)), Directrix(H)) = True

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，过抛物线上一点$M$作$l$的垂线，垂足为$N$. 设$A(\frac{7}{2} p, 0)$ , $A N$与$M F$相交于点$B$，若$|A F|=2|M F| $, $\Delta A B M$的面积为$\frac{9 \sqrt{2}}{2}$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;N: Point;M: Point;F: Point;B: Point;l: Line;l1: Line;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(A) = ((7/2)*p, 0);Focus(G) = F;Directrix(G) = l;PointOnCurve(M, l1);IsPerpendicular(l, l1);FootPoint(l, l1) = N;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(A, N), LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = B;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F));Area(TriangleOf(A, B, M)) = (9*sqrt(2))/2;PointOnCurve(M, G)

text: 抛物线$y=x^{2}$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2)

text: 经过点$(1 , 2)$的抛物线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (1, 2);PointOnCurve(H, G)

text: 已知$\triangle A B C$的顶点$A(-5,0)$, $B(5,0)$，其内切圆圆心在直线$x=3$上，则顶点$C$的轨迹方程?
fact_expressions: H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;PointOnCurve(Center(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(A,B,C))),H);Expression(H) = (x = 3);Coordinate(A) = (-5, 0);Coordinate(B)=(5,0)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{10}-\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$，抛物线的顶点在原点，对称轴为$x$轴，焦点为双曲线的左焦点，则抛物线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Parabola;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (x^2/10 - y^2/6 = 1);Vertex(G) = O;SymmetryAxis(G)=xAxis;Focus(G)=LeftFocus(C)

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$左焦点$F_{1}$的直线交双曲线的左支于$M$、$N$两点,$F_{2}$为其右焦点,则$|M F_{2}|+|N F_{2}|-|M N|$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;M: Point;F2: Point;N: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(G) =F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, LeftPart(G)) = {M, N}
query_expressions: Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F2)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, F2)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N))

text: 设$F_{1}$和$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，点$P$在双曲线上，且满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=90^{\circ}$, 则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右顶点为$A$ ,经过原点的直线$l$交椭圆$C$于$P$、$Q$两点，若$|P Q|=a$ , $A P \perp P Q$ ,则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;Q: Point;O:Origin;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightVertex(C) = A;PointOnCurve(O, l);Intersection(l, C) = {P, Q};Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = a;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, P), LineSegmentOf(P, Q))

text: 若直线$m x+n y=4$和圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=4$没有交点，则过点$(m, n)$的直线与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的交点个数为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Circle;l: Line;m: Number;n: Number;J: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 4);Expression(l) = (m*x + n*y = 4);Coordinate(J) = (m, n);NumIntersection(l, H)=0;PointOnCurve(J, L);L:Line

text: 已知$P$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点，记$P$到此抛物线的准线的距离为$d_{1}$ , $P$到直线$x+2 y-12=0$的距离为$d_{2}$，则$d_{1}+d_{2}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x + 2*y - 12 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);d1: Number;d2: Number;Distance(P, Directrix(G)) = d1;Distance(P, H) = d2

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=3 y$上一点$A$的纵坐标为$\frac{5}{4}$，则点$A$到此抛物线焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 3*y);PointOnCurve(A,G);YCoordinate(A)=5/4

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=a^{2}(a>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A$、$B$，点$P$是第一象限内双曲线上的点.若直线$P A$ , $P B$的倾斜角分别为$\alpha$ , $\beta$，且$\beta=m \alpha(m>1)$，那么$\alpha$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;a>0;m:Number;m>1;alpha:Number;beta:Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = a^2);LeftVertex(G) = A;RightVertex(G) = B;Quadrant(P) = 1;PointOnCurve(P, G);Inclination(LineOf(P,A))=alpha;Inclination(LineOf(P,B))=beta;beta=m*alpha

text: 抛物线的准线方程是$y=\frac{1}{2}$，则其标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (y = 1/2)

text: 已知双曲线$C$过点$(4,2 \sqrt{3})$，且渐近线方程为$y=\pm x$，则$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (4, 2*sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(G, C);Expression(Asymptote(C)) = (y = pm*x)

text: 已知抛物线$C$:$ x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，其准线与$y$轴交于点$D$，过点$F$作直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若$A B \perp A D$，且$|B F|=|A F|+4$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;D: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C), yAxis) = D;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, B), LineSegmentOf(A, D));Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) + 4

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$A$为双曲线的右支上的一点，$|A F_{1}|=\frac{11}{2} a-c$($c$为半焦距)，且直线$A F_{2}$与直线$y=-\frac{b}{a} x$平行，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;F2: Point;A: Point;F1: Point;c:Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y =-(b/a)*x);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,F1))=(11/2)*a-c;HalfFocalLength(G)=c;IsParallel(LineOf(A,F2),H)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$的焦点是$F$，过点$F$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，分别过$A$、$B$两点作直线$x=-2$的垂线，垂足分别为$E$，$H$. 若$|A E|=2|B H|$，则直线$l$的斜率 $k$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;G: Line;A: Point;E: Point;B: Point;H: Point;F: Point;k: Number;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);Expression(G) = (x = -2);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};L1:Line;L2:Line;PointOnCurve(A,L1);PointOnCurve(B,L2);IsPerpendicular(L1,G);IsPerpendicular(L2,G);FootPoint(L1,G)=E;FootPoint(L2,G)=H;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, E)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, H));Slope(l) = k

text: 已知双曲线$C$的离心率$e=\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，过焦点$F$作双曲线$C$的一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$M$，直线$M F$交另一条渐近线与$N$，则$\frac{M F}{N F}$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;e: Number;Eccentricity(C) = e;e = 2*sqrt(3)/3;F: Point;OneOf(Focus(C)) = F;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(F, Z);L1: Line;L2: Line;OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = L1;OneOf(Asymptote(C)) = L2;Negation(L1 = L2);IsPerpendicular(L1, Z);M: Point;FootPoint(L1, Z) = M;N: Point;Intersection(LineOf(M, F), L2) = N

text: 已知$c$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的半焦距，则$\frac{b+c}{a}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;c: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);HalfFocalLength(G) = c

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过焦点且与渐近线平行的直线与双曲线相交于点$M$，则$\Delta M F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Line;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(Focus(C),G);IsParallel(G,Asymptote(C));Intersection(G,C)=M

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的一个焦点为$(1,0)$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Number;G: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(G) = (1, 0);OneOf(Focus(C)) = G

text: 以坐标轴为对称轴，原点为顶点，且过圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-2 x+6 y+9=0$圆心的抛物线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;SymmetryAxis(G) = axis;O: Origin;Vertex(G) = O;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (6*y - 2*x + x^2 + y^2 + 9 = 0);PointOnCurve(Center(H), G)

text: 已知过椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左焦点$F$的直线交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A F|+2|B F| \geq k$恒成立，则$k$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};k: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,F))+2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B,F)) >= k

text: 一动点到$y$轴的距离比到点$(2 , 0)$的距离小$2$，则此动点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: K: Point;G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (2, 0);Distance(K, yAxis) = Distance(K, G) - 2

G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p > 0;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), l) = True;l: Line;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);x2: Number;y2: Number

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{k+2}-\frac{y^{2}}{5-k}=1$表示双曲线，则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(k + 2) - y^2/(5 - k) = 1);k: Number

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，焦距为$2 c$，双曲线上存在一点$P$，使直线$P F_{1}$与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$相切于$P F_{1}$的中点$M$，则双曲线的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1,F2};c: Number;FocalLength(G) = 2*c;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;M: Point;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);TangentPoint(LineOf(P,F1),H) = M;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,F1)) = M

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m-1}+\frac{y^{2}}{3-m}=1$表示椭圆，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m:Number;Expression(G)=(x^2/(m-1)+y^2/(3-m)=1)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Real;Expression(G) = (y^2/3 + x^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 1/2

text: 已知双曲线$a x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的一条渐近线方程为$y=x$，则实数$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Real;Expression(G) = (a*x^2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=(y=x)

text: 设$m$为常数，若点$F(0,5)$是双曲线$-\frac{y^{2}}{m}-\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1$的一个焦点，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/9 - y^2/m = 1);m: Number;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (0, 5);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F

text: 设点$M$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$上的动点，点$N$是圆$E$:$(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=1$上的动点，且直线$M N$与圆$E$相切，则$|M N|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;E: Circle;N: Point;M: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/9 + y^2/8 = 1);Expression(E) = (y^2 + (x - 1)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(M, C);PointOnCurve(N, E);IsTangent(LineOf(M,N),E)

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点坐标为$(1,0)$，则该抛物线上一点到焦点的距离的取值范围是?

text: 已知直线$y=k x(k \neq 0)$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$交于$A$、$B$两点，以$A B$为直径的圆恰好经过双曲线的右焦点$F$，若三角形$A B F$的面积为$4 a^{2}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左，右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，直线$y=k x(k>0)$与双曲线交于$M$、$N$两点，且$|O M|=|O F_{2}|$,$O$为坐标原点，又$S_{\Delta M F_{2} N}=\frac{(|M F_{2}|+|N F_{2}|)^{2}}{16}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，点$P$在抛物线上，点$Q(\frac{9}{2} p, 0)$. 若$|Q F|=2|P F|$，且$\Delta P Q F$的面积为$8 \sqrt{3}$，则$p$=?

text: 一个动点到点$F(0 ,-4)$距离比到直线$y-3=0$的距离多$1$，则动点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y - 3 = 0);Coordinate(F) = (0, -4);P:Point;Distance(P,F)=Distance(P,G)+1

text: 椭圆$M$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆$M$上任一点，且$| P F_{1}|\cdot| P F_{2} |$的最大值的取值范围是$[2 c^{2} , 3 c^{2}]$，其中$c=\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}$，则椭圆$M$的离心率$e$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: M: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;c:Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;e: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(M) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(M)=F1;RightFocus(M)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,M);Range(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1))*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F2)))=[2*c^2,3*c^2];c=sqrt(a^2-b^2);Eccentricity(M)=e

text: 已知双曲线$C$与曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$有公共的渐近线，且经过点$A(-3,4 \sqrt{2})$，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Curve;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (-3, 4*sqrt(2));Asymptote(C) = Asymptote(G);PointOnCurve(A,C)

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 ,b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{3}$，且它的一条准线与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的准线重合，则此双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Parabola;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*x);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3);OneOf(Directrix(G))=Directrix(H)

text: 若双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若在其渐近线上存在一点$P$，使得 $||P F_{1}|-| P F_{2}||=2 b$，则双曲线$E$的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,Asymptote(E));Abs(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))) = 2*b

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的准线和圆$x^{2}+y^{2}+6 x+m=0$相切，则实数$m$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);H: Circle;Expression(H) = (m + 6*x + x^2 + y^2 = 0);m: Real;IsTangent(Directrix(G), H)

text: 已知点$M$ $(\sqrt{3}, 0)$，椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$与直线$y=k(x+\sqrt{3})$交于点$A$、$B$，则$\triangle A B M$的周长为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (sqrt(3), 0);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = k*(x + sqrt(3)));A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G,H) = {A,B};k:Number

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上的一点$P$到椭圆一个焦点的距离为$3$，则$P$到另一焦点距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F1;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F2;Negation(F1 = F2);Distance(P, F1) = 3

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$上点$P(4,4)$到焦点$F$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;P: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(P) = (4, 4);PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G) = F

text: 若直线$y=x+k$与曲线$x=\sqrt{1-y^{2}}$恰有一个公共点，则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Line;Expression(G) = (y = k + x);k: Number;H: Curve;Expression(H) = (x = sqrt(1 - y^2));NumIntersection(G, H)=1

text: 若以$F$为焦点的抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的两点$A$ , $B$满足$\overrightarrow{A F}=2 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则弦$AB$的中点到准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);VectorOf(A, F) = 2*(VectorOf(F, B));IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G)

text: 已知双曲线的两个焦点为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$的长轴的端点，其准线过椭圆的焦点，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/16 + y^2/7 = 1);Focus(G) = Endpoint(MajorAxis(H));PointOnCurve(Focus(H),Directrix(G))

text: 以$3 x \pm 4 y=0$为渐近线，且过点$M(-2,3)$的双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (3*x + pm*4*y = 0);G: Hyperbola;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-2, 3);PointOnCurve(M, G) = True

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/4 = 1)

r1: Hyperbola;r2:Hyperbola;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;x1:Number;x2:Number;y1:Number;y2:Number;a:Number;b:Number;a>0 ;b>0;Expression(r1) = (x^2/a^2-y^2/b^2=1);Expression(r2) = (y^2/b^2-x^2/a^2=1);PointOnCurve(A,r1);PointOnCurve(B,r2);Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);x1^2 - x2^2 = a^2;Slope(LineOf(O, A))*Slope(LineOf(O,B)) = 1/3

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{5}$，则其渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(5)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的上顶点为$A$，左焦点为$F$、$C$为$O A$的中点 ($O$为坐标原点)，点$P$为第一象限中的一点，且$|C P|=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}|O C|$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/8 + y^2/4 = 1);A: Point;UpperVertex(G) = A;F: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F;C: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = C;O: Origin;P: Point;Quadrant(P) = 1;Abs(LineSegmentOf(C, P)) = (sqrt(3)/2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, C))

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$，若点$P$为双曲线左支上的一点，且直线$P A_{1}$, $P A_{2}$的斜率分别为$-1$，$-\frac{1}{3}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;A1: Point;A2: Point;LeftVertex(G) = A1;RightVertex(G) = A2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(G));Slope(LineOf(P, A1)) = -1;Slope(LineOf(P, A2)) = -1/3

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的实轴长为$2$，虚轴长为$4$，则该双曲线的焦距为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Length(RealAxis(G))=2;Length(ImageinaryAxis(G)) = 4

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为点$F$，点$B$是虚轴的一个端点，点$P$为双曲线$C$左支上一个动点，若$\triangle B P F$周长的最小值等于实轴长的$4$倍，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;B: Point;P: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;OneOf(Endpoint(ImageinaryAxis(C))) = B;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(C));Min(Perimeter(TriangleOf(B, P, F))) = 4*Length(RealAxis(C))

text: 若斜率为$2$的直线经过抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点，且与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Slope(H)=2;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),H);Intersection(H,G)={A,B}

text: 已知$M$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的一点，$F$是抛物线的焦点，线段$MF$的中点$P$到$y$轴的距离为$2$，则$| PF |$=?
fact_expressions: M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;P: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M,F)) = P;Distance(P, yAxis) = 2

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，点$P(x, y)$为该抛物线上的动点，又已知定点$A(2,2)$，则$|P A|+|P F|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;A: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(A) = (2, 2);Focus(G) = F;x1:Number;y1:Number;PointOnCurve(P, G)

O1: Circle;Expression(O1) = (x^2 + y^2 = 1);O2: Circle;Expression(O2) = (y^2 + (x - 4)^2 = 4);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;TangentOfPoint(P, O1) = LineOf(P, A);TangentOfPoint(P, O2) = LineOf(P, B);TangentPoint(LineOf(P, A), O1) = A;TangentPoint(LineOf(P, B), O2) = B;A: Point;B: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B))

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$上一点$P(m, n)$到其焦点的距离为$8 m$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);P: Point;m: Number;n: Number;Coordinate(P) = (m, n);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, Focus(G)) = 8*m

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率$e \in (1 , 2)$，则其中一条渐近线的斜率取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e;In(e, (1, 2))

text: 以双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点$A$为圆心，$\sqrt{2} a$为半径作圆，与双曲线右支交于$P$、$Q$二点，若$\angle P A Q=\frac{\pi}{2}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=6 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线$l$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，且$C$的准线交$x$轴于点$M$. 若$|A F|=2|M F|$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;M: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 6*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F))
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (2*x^2 + 3*y^2 = 1)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}=1$有相同的焦点，则$a$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (-y^2/2 + x^2/a = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/4 + y^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G)=Focus(H)

text: 已知点$A$ ,$B$是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$上的两点，$O$为原点，若$\overrightarrow {OA} \cdot \overrightarrow {OB}=0$，则点$O$到直线$A B$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;B: Point;A: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, B)) = 0

text: 若双曲线$E$的两条渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$，且$E$的两焦点坐标为$(0, \pm \sqrt{5})$，则双曲线$E$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(E)) = (y = pm*2*x);Coordinate(Focus(E)) = (0, pm*sqrt(5))

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=2$的焦点到渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 2)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$ , $P$为$x$轴上一动点，经过点$P$的直线$y=2 x+m(m\neq 0)$与双曲线$C$有且只有一个交点，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 设$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，经过点$P(1 , 0)$的直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，且$2 \overrightarrow{B P}=\overrightarrow{P A}$，则$|A F|+2|B F|$=?

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的实轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$，两焦点为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ ,过$F_{2}$作$x$轴的垂线交双曲线于$A$、$B$两点，且$\triangle A B F_{1}$内切圆的半径为$a$，则此双曲线的离心率为?

text: 一动圆过定点$A(2,0)$，且与定圆$B$: $x^{2}+4 x+y^{2}-32=0$内切，则动圆圆心$M$的轨迹方程是?

text: 已知$F$是椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的左焦点，$P$是椭圆$E$上的动点，$A(1, \sqrt{3})$为一个定点，则$|P A|+|P F|$的最大值为?

text: 已知椭圆的标准方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$，则该椭圆的焦距为?

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$恒过定点$A(1 , 2)$，则椭圆的中心到准线的距离的最小值?

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点为$F_{1}$,$F_{2}$,$\Delta A B F_{1}$的顶点$A$, $B$在椭圆上，且边$AB$经过右焦点$F_{2}$，则$\triangle A B F_{1}$的周长是?

text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$的直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点. 若$|A F|=6 $,$|B F|=3$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 6;Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 3
G: Ellipse;m: Number;m>0;Expression(G) = (2*(m*x^2) + y^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 1/2

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+x^{2}=1(a>1)$的离心率$e=\frac{2 \sqrt{5}}{5}$, $P$为椭圆上的一个动点，则$P$与定点$B(-1,0)$连线距离的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;a: Number;B: Point;P: Point;e:Number;a>1;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(B) = (-1, 0);Eccentricity(G)=e;e = (2*sqrt(5))/5;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$ ,过点$P(0,6)$的直线$l$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$A$是线段$P B$的中点，则点$A$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;l: Line;P: Point;B: Point;A: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/16 + y^2/12 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (0, 6);PointOnCurve(P, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,B)) = A

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，过点$(-1,0)$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$4|F A|+|F B|$的最小值为$19$，则抛物线$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;H:Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(H) = (-1, 0);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(H, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Min(4*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, B))) = 19

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过点$F_{1}$的直线$l$分别与双曲线的左、右支交于点$A$、$B$，若以$A B$为直径的圆过点$F_{2}$且$|A F_{2}|=|B F_{2}|$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l, LeftPart(C)) =A;Intersection(l,RightPart(C))=B;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);PointOnCurve(F2,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,F2))=Abs(LineSegmentOf(B,F2))

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左, 右顶点分别为$A$、$B$，点$P$在椭圆$C$上 (与$A$、$B$不重合)，直线$A P$与$y$轴交于点$M$，过点$A$作$A N \| B P$，直线$A N$与$y$轴交于点$N$，若点$S(t, 0)$满足$\overrightarrow{S M} \cdot \overrightarrow{S N}=5$，则$t$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;LeftVertex(C) = A;RightVertex(C) = B;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);Negation(P=A);Negation(P=B);M: Point;Intersection(LineOf(A, P), yAxis) = M;N: Point;PointOnCurve(A, LineOf(A, N));IsParallel(LineOf(A, N), LineOf(B, P));Intersection(LineOf(A, N), yAxis) = N;S: Point;t: Number;Coordinate(S) = (t, 0);DotProduct(VectorOf(S, M), VectorOf(S, N)) = 5

text: 已知$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，并且椭圆上点$P$满足$\angle F_{1} PF_{2}=90^{\circ}$，则$\triangle F_{1} PF_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P,G);AngleOf(F1,P,F2)=ApplyUnit(90,degree)

text: 设椭圆$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$, $F$是右焦点，$l$是过点$F$的一条直线（不与$y$轴平行），交椭圆于$A$, $B$两点，$l^{\prime}$是$A B$的中垂线，交椭圆的长轴于一点$D$，则$\frac{D F}{A B}$的值是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;l: Line;l1:Line;A: Point;B: Point;D: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F,l);Negation(IsParallel(l,yAxis));Intersection(l,C)={A,B};PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = l1;Intersection(MajorAxis(C),l1)=D

text: 已知双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，点$M$、$N$在双曲线$E$的一条渐近线上，$|F M|=|F N|=\sqrt{3} a$且$\overrightarrow{F M} \cdot \overrightarrow{F N}=a^{2}$，则双曲线$E$的离心率是?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;RightFocus(E) = F;F: Point;M: Point;N: Point;J: Line;OneOf(Asymptote(E)) = J;PointOnCurve(M, J) = True;PointOnCurve(N, J) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, M)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, N));Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, N)) = sqrt(3)*a;DotProduct(VectorOf(F, M), VectorOf(F, N)) = a^2

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为双曲线$C$上一点，$Q$为双曲线$C$渐近线上一点，$P$、$Q$均位于第一象限，且$2 \overrightarrow{Q P}=\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$，$\overrightarrow{Q F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{Q F_{2}}=0$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;Q: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) =F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);PointOnCurve(Q,Asymptote(C));Quadrant(P)=1;Quadrant(Q)=1;2*VectorOf(Q, P) = VectorOf(P, F2);DotProduct(VectorOf(Q, F1), VectorOf(Q, F2)) = 0

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的左、右焦点，点$P$是椭圆上的任意一点，则$\frac{|PF_{1}-PF_{2}|}{P F_{1}}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/12 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，其一条渐近线方程为$y=x$，点$P(\sqrt{3} , y_{0})$在该双曲线上，则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;y0:Number;b>0;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (sqrt(3), y0);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=(y=x);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在椭圆上，且$\overrightarrow{PF_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0$, $\tan \angle P F_{1} F_{2}=2$，则椭圆的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;Tan(AngleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 2

text: $P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$上的点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是其焦点，双曲线的离心率是$\frac{5}{4}$，且$\overrightarrow{PF_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0$，若$\triangle F_{1} PF_{2}$的面积为$9$，则$a+b$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Eccentricity(G) = 5/4;DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;Area(TriangleOf(F1, P, F2)) = 9

text: 若点$P$在双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$上，它的横坐标与双曲线的右焦点的横坐标相同，则点$P$与双曲线的左焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/12 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);XCoordinate(P) = XCoordinate(RightFocus(G))

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点，$P$为双曲线右支上任一点，当$\frac{|PF_{1}|^{2}}{|PF_{2}|} |$最小值为$8 a$时，该双曲线离心率$e$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))^2/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))) = 8*a;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，准线与$x$轴的交点$M$、$N$为抛物线上的一点，且满足$|M N|=2 | N F|$,则$\angle NMF$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;N: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G)=F;Intersection(Directrix(G),xAxis)=M;PointOnCurve(N,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,N))=2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(N,F))

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$作渐近线的一条垂线，若该垂线恰好与以$F_{1}$为圆心，$|O F_{1}|$为半径的圆相切，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;O: Origin;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;L:Line;PointOnCurve(F2,L);IsPerpendicular(Asymptote(C),L);Center(G)=F1;Radius(G)=Abs(LineSegmentOf(O,F1));IsTangent(L,G)

text: 如果过两点$A(a, 0)$和$B(0 , a)$的直线与抛物线$y=x^{2}-2 x-3$没有交点，那么实数$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: a: Real;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (a, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (0, a);H: Line;PointOnCurve(A, H);PointOnCurve(B, H);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2 - 2*x - 3);NumIntersection(H, G) = 0

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(a>\sqrt{3})$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则直线$y=6 x$与$C$的其中一个交点到$y$轴的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Number;G: Line;a>sqrt(2);Expression(C) = (y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y = 6*x);Eccentricity(C) = 1/2

text: 若抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上的点$A$到焦点的距离为$10$，则$A$到$x$轴的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);PointOnCurve(A, G);Distance(A, Focus(G)) = 10

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F_{1}$、$O$为坐标原点,点$P$在椭圆上，点$Q$在椭圆的右准线上，若$\overrightarrow{P Q}=2 \overrightarrow{F_{1} O}$, $\overrightarrow{F_{1} Q}=\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} O}}{| \overrightarrow{F_{1} O}|})(\lambda>0)$,则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;Q: Point;F1: Point;O: Origin;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;PointOnCurve(P,G);PointOnCurve(Q, RightDirectrix(G));VectorOf(P, Q) = 2*VectorOf(F1, O);lambda:Number;VectorOf(F1, Q) = lambda*(VectorOf(F1, O)/Abs(VectorOf(F1, O)) + VectorOf(F1, P)/Abs(VectorOf(F1, P)));lambda>0

text: 已知$P$为抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上的动点，点$P$在$x$轴上的射影为$M$，点$A$的坐标是$(2,0)$，则$|P A|+|P M|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;A: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Coordinate(A) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(P,G);Projection(P, xAxis) = M

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{3}$，椭圆上一点$P$到两焦点距离之和为$12$，则椭圆的短轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(5)/3;PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Distance(P, F1) + Distance(P, F2) = 12

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{25}-\frac{y^{2}}{24}=1$上的点$P$到一个焦点的距离为$11$，则它到另一个焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 - y^2/24 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1:Point;F2:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F2;Negation(F1=F2);Distance(P, F1) = 11

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线过点$P(1, \frac{4}{3})$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (1, 4/3);PointOnCurve(P,Asymptote(G))

text: 已知抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$、$O$为坐标原点，点$A$在$E$上，且$|A F|=2|O F|$，若$|O A|=\sqrt{10}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;p>0;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(E) = F;PointOnCurve(A, E);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F));Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = sqrt(10)

text: 在平面坐标系中,动点$P$和点$M(-2,0)$ , $N(2,0)$满足$|\overrightarrow{M N}| \cdot|\overrightarrow{M P}|+\overrightarrow{M N} \cdot \overrightarrow{N P}=0$, 则动点$P(x, y)$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-2, 0);N: Point;Coordinate(N) = (2, 0);DotProduct(VectorOf(M, N), VectorOf(N, P)) + DotProduct(Abs(VectorOf(M, N)), Abs(VectorOf(M, P))) = 0;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number

text: 平面内到一定点$F$和到一定直线$l$($F$在$l$上)的距离相等的点的轨迹是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;F:Point;G:Point;PointOnCurve(F,l);Distance(F,G)=Distance(G,l)

text: 设点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1(a>0)$的左、右焦点，过点$F_{1}$且与$x$轴垂直的直线$l$与双曲线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点.若$\triangle A B F_{2}$的面积为$2 \sqrt{6}$，则该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);IsPerpendicular(xAxis,l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Area(TriangleOf(A, B, F2)) = 2*sqrt(6)

text: 已知双曲线的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 \sqrt{5} x$的焦点相同，且双曲线的渐进线方程为$y=\pm \frac{1}{2} x$，则此双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*(sqrt(5)*x));OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(x/2))

text: 设$M$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上的一个点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的焦点，如果点$M$到点$F_{1}$的距离是$4$，那么点$M$到点$F_{2}$的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Distance(M, F1) = 4

text: 已知直线$l$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的准线，半径为$3$的圆过抛物线顶点$O$和焦点$F$与$l$相切，则抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Circle;O: Origin;F:Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Directrix(G)=l;Radius(H)=3;Vertex(G)=O;Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(O,H);PointOnCurve(F,H);IsTangent(H,l)

text: 已知点$P$到点$F(-3,0)$的距离比它到直线$x=2$的距离大$1$，则点$P$满足的方程为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (-3, 0);G: Line;Expression(G) = (x = 2);Distance(P, F) = Distance(P, G) + 1

text: 过点$M(1,1)$作斜率为$-\frac{1}{3}$的直线$l$与椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$M$是线段$A B$的中点，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, 1);Slope(l) = -1/3;PointOnCurve(M, l) = True;l: Line;C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M;B: Point;A: Point

text: 已知抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，点$A$在$E$上，以$A$为圆心的圆与$y$轴相切，且交$A F$于点$B$，若$|A B|=2|B F|$，则圆$A$截线段$A F$的垂直平分线所得弦长为$\sqrt{7}$，则$p$=?

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F(1,0)$，过点$F$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，$C$的准线与$x$轴的交点为$M$，若$\triangle M A B$的面积为$\frac{8 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，则$\frac{|A F|}{|B F|}$=?

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点$F$，其右准线与$x$轴的交点为$A$，在椭圆上存在点$P$满足线段$AP$的垂直平分线过点$F$，则椭圆离心率的取值范围是?
