text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m+3}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的离心率$e=\frac{1}{3}$，则$m$的值等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m + 3) + y^2/4 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e ;e=1/3;e:Number

text: $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$分别是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，双曲线$C$的离心率$e=\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，点$P$在双曲线$C$的右支上，满足$\overrightarrow{P F_{2}} \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{1} {F}_{2}}=0$，$|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|=\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，则双曲线的虚轴长为?
fact_expressions: F1:Point;F2:Point;C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;e:Number;Eccentricity(C)=e;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(C));DotProduct(VectorOf(P,F2),VectorOf(F1,F2)) =0;Abs(VectorOf(P, F2)) = (2*sqrt(3))/3;e=2*sqrt(3)/3

text: 已知点$M$、$N$是抛物线$y=4 x^{2}$上不同的两点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，且满足$\angle M F N=135^{\circ}$，弦$M N$的中点$P$到直线$l$: $y=-\frac{1}{16}$的距离记为$d$, $|M N|^{2}=\lambda \cdot d^{2}$，则$\lambda$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = 4*x^2);M: Point;N: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G);PointOnCurve(N, G);Negation(M=N);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;AngleOf(M, F, N) = ApplyUnit(135, degree);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(M, N), G);P: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M, N)) = P;l: Line;Expression(l) = (y=-1/16);d: Number;Distance(P, l) = d;lambda: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N))^2 = (d^2)*lambda

text: 已知直线$l$: $y=1$与$y$轴交于点$M$、$Q$为直线$l$上异于点$M$的动点，记点$Q$的横坐标为$n$，若曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$上存在点$N$，使得$\angle M Q N=45^{\circ}$，则$n$的取值范围是?(用区间表示)
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Curve;M: Point;Q: Point;N: Point;n:Number;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Expression(l)=(y=1);Intersection(l,yAxis)=M;PointOnCurve(Q,l);Negation(Q=M);XCoordinate(MidPoint(Q)) = n;PointOnCurve(N, C);AngleOf(M, Q, N) = ApplyUnit(45, degree)

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点，若在双曲线的右支上存在一点$M$，使得$(\overrightarrow{O M}+\overrightarrow{O F_{2}}) \overrightarrow{F_{2} M}=0$(其中$O$为坐标原点)，且$|\overrightarrow{M F_{1}}|=\sqrt{3}|\overrightarrow{M F_{2}}|$，则双曲线离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;M: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(M, RightPart(G));DotProduct((VectorOf(O, F2) + VectorOf(O, M)),VectorOf(F2, M)) = 0;Abs(VectorOf(M, F1)) = sqrt(3)*Abs(VectorOf(M, F2))

text: 已知直线$a x+b y+c-1=0 ,(b c>0)$经过圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-2 y-15=0$的圆心，则$\frac{1}{b}+\frac{9}{c}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: H: Line;b: Number;a: Number;c: Number;b*c>0;Expression(H) = (a*x + b*y + c - 1 = 0);G: Circle;Expression(G) = (-2*y + x^2 + y^2 - 15 = 0);PointOnCurve(Center(G),H) = True

text: 曲线$y=\sqrt{1-\frac{x^{2}}{4}}$与直线$y=2 x+m$有且只有一个公共点，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: H: Curve;G: Line;m: Real;Expression(H) = (y = sqrt(1 - x^2/4));Expression(G) = (y = m + 2*x);NumIntersection(H, G) = 1

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率为$2$ ,它的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点相同，那么双曲线的焦点坐标为?渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;Eccentricity(G) = 2;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 8*x);OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H)

text: 中心在原点，一个焦点是$(-5 , 0)$，一条渐近线是直线$4 x-3 y=0$的双曲线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;O:Origin;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (4*x - 3*y = 0);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (-5, 0);Center(G)=O

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=k^{2}$与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=1$有公共点，则实数$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Real;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/4 = k^2);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 1);IsIntersect(G, H)

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{64}+\frac{y^{2}}{28}=1$的左焦点为$F_{1}$，椭圆$C$上的一点$P$到左焦点的距离为$6$，点$M$是线段$P F_{1}$的中点，$O$为坐标原点，则$|O M|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;O: Origin;M: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/64 + y^2/28 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;PointOnCurve(P, C);Distance(P,LeftFocus(C))=6;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,F1)) = M

text:
设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的公共焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是两曲线的一个交点，
则$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 - y^2/2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/6 + y^2/2 = 1);OneOf(Intersection(G,H))=P;Focus(G)={F1,F2};Focus(H)={F1,F2}

text: 已知圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=R^{2}$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$无公共点，则$R$取值范围为?
fact_expressions: H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = R^2);R: Number;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/9 = 1);NumIntersection(H, G) = 0

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=12 x$的准线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 12*x)

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左焦点$F_{1}$，作圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=4$的切线交双曲线右支于点$P$，切点为$T$ , $P F_{1}$的中点为$M$，则$|M O| -| M T |$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1);F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 4);L1: Line;TangentOfPoint(F1, H) = L1;Intersection(L1, RightPart(G)) = P;P: Point;TangentPoint(L1, H) = T;T: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = M;M: Point;O: Origin

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=2 y$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 2*y)

text: 已知点$P$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$右支上一点，点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线的左右焦点，点$I$是$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心 (三角形内切圆的圆心)，若恒有$S_{\Delta I P F_{1}}-S_{\Delta I P F_{2}} \leq \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} S_{\Delta I F1 F_{2}}$成立，则双曲线的离心率取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;I: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Incenter(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = I;Center(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2))) = I;Area(TriangleOf(I, P, F1)) - Area(TriangleOf(I, P, F2)) <= (sqrt(2)/2)*Area(TriangleOf(I, F1, F2))

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的一个焦点坐标为$(0,2)$，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/m = 1);m: Real;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (0, 2)

text: 若双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{3}{2} x$，则满足条件的一个双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(3/2)*x)

text: 已知倾斜角为$\alpha$的直线$l$的斜率等于双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的离心率，则$\sin (\pi-2 \alpha)$=?
fact_expressions: alpha: Number;Inclination(l) = alpha;l: Line;Slope(l) = Eccentricity(G);G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上一点$P$到左焦点的距离为$\frac{5}{2}$, 则它到右准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, LeftFocus(G)) = 5/2

text: 如果$M$是椭圆$C_{1}$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上的动点，$N$是椭圆$C_{2}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{64}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1$上的动点，那么$\Delta O M N$面积的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C1: Ellipse;C2: Ellipse;O: Origin;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(C1) = (x^2/16+y^2/9=1);Expression(C2) = (x^2/64+y^2/36=1);PointOnCurve(M,C1);PointOnCurve(N,C2)

text: 过双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点，且斜率为$2$的直线与$E$的右支有两个不同的公共点，则双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;G: Line;PointOnCurve(RightFocus(E), G);Slope(G) = 2;NumIntersection(G, RightPart(E)) = 2

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的一条渐近线方程是$y=\sqrt3x $,它的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$的焦点相同. 则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;a > 0;b > 0;Expression(E) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(E))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x);F: Parabola;Expression(F) = (y^2 = 16*x);OneOf(Focus(E)) = Focus(F)

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$作两条互相垂直的直线$l_{1}$ , $l_{2}$，直线$l_{1}$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，直线$l_{2}$与$C$交于$D$、$E$两点，则$\frac{1}{|A B|}+\frac{1}{|D E|}$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;l1:Line;l2:Line;A: Point;B: Point;D: Point;E: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F,l1);PointOnCurve(F,l2);IsPerpendicular(l1,l2);Intersection(l1,C)={A, B};Intersection(l2,C)={D, E}

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1(m>n>0)$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，有一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点重合，则$m n$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Ellipse;m: Number;n: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);m > n;n > 0;Expression(H) = (y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(H) = 1/2;OneOf(Focus(H))=Focus(G)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$焦点为$F$，原点为$O$，过抛物线焦点垂直于$x$轴的直线与抛物线交于点$P$，若$P O=3 \sqrt{5}$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;O: Origin;H: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);IsPerpendicular(H, xAxis);P: Point;Intersection(H, G) = P;LineSegmentOf(P, O) = 3*sqrt(5)

text: 双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{16}-\frac{x^{2}}{4}=1$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/4 + y^2/16 = 1)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=2 x$，右准线方程是$x=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$，则该双曲线的焦距为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = 2*x);Expression(RightDirectrix(G)) = (x = sqrt(5)/5)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的离心率为$\sqrt{5}$, 则双曲线$C$的实轴长为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(C) = (-y^2/4 + x^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(5)

text: 过双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点$F$作圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$的两条切线，切点分别为$A$，$B$，若$\angle A F B=120^{\circ}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;OneOf(Focus(C)) = F;G: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);TangentOfPoint(F, G) = {l1, l2};l1: Line;l2: Line;TangentPoint(l1,G) = A;TangentPoint(l2,G) = B;A: Point;B: Point;AngleOf(A, F, B) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，若双曲线左支上存在一点$P$使得$\frac{|P F_{2}|^{2}}{|P F_{1}|}=8 a$，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: F2: Point;F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,LeftPart(G)) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F2))^2/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1)) = 8*a

text: 两个焦点为$(\pm 2,0)$且过点$P(\frac{5}{2},-\frac{3}{2})$的椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Coordinate(Focus(G)) = (pm*2, 0);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (5/2, -3/2);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+y^{2}=1(m>0)$的焦距为$2$，则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;m>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 + x^2/m = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);FocalLength(G) = 2

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的渐近线为$y=\pm \frac{3}{4} x$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(3/4)*x)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的短轴长为$2$，上顶点为$A$，左顶点为$B$，左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，且$\Delta F_{1} A B$的面积为$\frac{2-\sqrt{3}}{2}$，点$P$为椭圆上的任意一点，则$\frac{1}{|P F_{1}|}+\frac{1}{|P F_{2}|}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Length(MinorAxis(G)) = 2;A: Point;UpperVertex(G) = A;B: Point;LeftVertex(G) = B;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Area(TriangleOf(F1, A, B)) = (2 - sqrt(3))/2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G)

P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);x1: Number;y1: Number;PointOnCurve(P, G);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (3, 0);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 2;O: Origin;M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = M

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-y^{2}=1$与$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$有相同的焦点，则实数$m$=?

text: 已知抛物线$C$的方程为$x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$，其焦点为$F$,$A B$为过焦点$F$的抛物线$C$的弦，过$A$、$B$分别作抛物线的切线$l_{1}$,$l_{2}$，设$l_{1}$，$l_{2}$相交于点$P$. 则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$=?

text: 已知直线$l$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点（$A$点在第一象限) , $\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=-4 $, $M$坐标为$(4,0)$，当$\triangle A B M$的面积最小时，线段$O A$的长度为?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点，点$P$是双曲线$C$上一点，且$|P F_{1}|=2|P F_{2}|$，若线段$P F_{1}$的中点$Q$恰好在直线$y=\frac{b}{a} x$上，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Line;a: Number;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x*(b/a));LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Expression(C) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2));MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = Q;PointOnCurve(Q, G);a > 0;b > 0

text:
若点$P$是以$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为焦点的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$上一点，满足$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，且$|P F_{1}|=2|P F_{2}|$，
则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P,G);Focus(G)={F1,F2};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))

text: 过点$A(6,1)$作直线与双曲线$x^{2}-4 y^{2}=16$相交于两点$B$、$C$, 且$A$为线段$B C$的中点则直线的方程（表示为一般式）为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;B: Point;C: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - 4*y^2 = 16);Coordinate(A) = (6, 1);PointOnCurve(A, H);Intersection(H, G) = {B, C};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(B,C))=A

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$，焦点记为$F$，过点$F$作直线$l$交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A F|-\frac{2}{|B F|}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}
F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;t:Number;Coordinate(F1) = (0, -3);Coordinate(F2) = (0, 3);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F2))=t+9/t;t>0

text: 若过点$(\sqrt{2}, 2)$的双曲线的渐近线为$y=\pm 2 x$，则该双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(2), 2);PointOnCurve(H,G) = True;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*2*x)

text: 平面上两定点$A$ , $B$之间距离为$4$，动点$P$满足$PA-PB=2$，则点$P$到$AB$中点的距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Distance(A, B) = 4;LineSegmentOf(P, A) - LineSegmentOf(P, B) = 2

text: 已知点$M$是抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上的一个动点，则点$M$到点$A(2,0)$的距离与点$M$到该抛物线准线的距离之和的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Coordinate(A) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(M, G)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上一点$P$到焦点$F_{1}$的距离是$6$，那么$P$到焦点$F_{2}$的距离?

text: 已知抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=4 x$，过点$M(2,0)$的直线$l$与$E$交于$A$、$B$两点，与$E$的准线交于点$C$，且点$A$在第一象限，若$\frac{|C B|}{|A B|}=\frac{2}{3}$，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 4*x);M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (2, 0);l: Line;B: Point;A: Point;PointOnCurve(M,l) = True;Intersection(l, E) = {A, B};C: Point;Intersection(Directrix(E) , l) = C;Quadrant(A) = 1 ;Abs(LineSegmentOf(C, B))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2/3

text: 若点$P$是以$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$为焦点的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$上一点，满足$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，且$|P F_{1}|=2 | P F_{2}| $，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))

text: 设双曲线的渐近线方程为$2 x \pm 3 y=0$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (2*x + pm*3*y = 0)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1 (b>a>0)$的左、右焦点为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ , $P$$(2, \sqrt{2})$为双曲线$C$上一点，且$\frac{|P F_{1}|}{|P F_{2}|}=3$，若线段$P F_{1}$与双曲线$C$交于另一点$A$，则$\Delta P A F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a, b: Number;b > a;a > 0;Expression(C) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (2, sqrt(2));PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 3;A: Point;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), C) = {P, A}

text: 设椭圆的两焦点分别为$(0 ,-2)$,$(0 , 2)$，两准线间的距离为$13$，则椭圆的方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}(-c, 0)$、$F_{2}(c, 0)$. 若双曲线上存在点$P$，使$\frac{\sin \angle P F_{1} F_{2}}{\sin \angle P F_{2} F_{1}}=\frac{a}{c}$，则该双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的左右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$的直线$l$与$C$的左右两支分别交于$A$、$B$两点，且$|A F_{1}|=|B F_{1}|$，则$|A B|$=?

text: 设抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点为$F$，点$M$在$C$上，$|M F|=5$，若以$M F$为直径的圆过点$(0,2)$，且$p>|M F|$，则抛物线$C$的标准方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$过点$(-2,0)$，过左焦点$F_{1}$的直线与双曲线的左支交于$A$、$B$两点，右焦点为$F_{2}$，若$\angle A F_{2} B=45^{\circ}$，且$|A F_{2}|=8$，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的面积为?

text: 已知点$F$、$A$分别为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点和右顶点，过$F$作$x$轴的垂线交椭圆于点$P$，且$\triangle A F P$的内切圆半径为$\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}{2}$，则椭圆的离心率为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2} x$, 且与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$有公共焦点. 则双曲线$C$的方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{3}$，那么双曲线的渐近线方程为?

text: 已知过点$P(-2 , 0)$的双曲线$C$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$有相同的焦点，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (-2, 0);PointOnCurve(P, C);C: Hyperbola;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(C) = Focus(G)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 y$，则$C$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*y)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，且椭圆$C$与双曲线$C^{\prime}$: $\frac{2 x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1$共焦点，若椭圆$C$与双曲线$C^{\prime}$的一个交点$M$满足$|M F_{1}| \cdot|M F_{2}|=2$，则$\Delta M F_{1} F_{2}$的面积是?
fact_expressions: C1: Hyperbola;C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Expression(C1)=(2*x^2/a^2-y^2=1);Focus(C)=Focus(C1);OneOf(Intersection(C,C1))=M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F1))*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F2))=2

text: 直线$y=\sqrt{3}(x-1)$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为原点，则三角形$A O B$面积为?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = sqrt(3)*(x - 1));G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};O: Origin

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一动点，则点$P$到直线$l$:$2 x-y+3=0$和$y$轴的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(l) = (2*x - y + 3 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知点$P$和$Q$的横坐标相同，$P$的纵坐标是$Q$的纵坐标的$2$倍，$P$和$Q$的轨迹分别为双曲线$C_{1}$和$C_{2}$. 若$C_{1}$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \sqrt{3} x$，则$C_{2}$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: C1:Hyperbola;C2:Hyperbola;P:Point;Q:Point;XCoordinate(P)=XCoordinate(Q);YCoordinate(P)=2*YCoordinate(Q);Locus(P)=C1;Locus(Q)=C2;Expression(Asymptote(C1)) = (y = pm*(sqrt(3)*x))

text: 以抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$为圆心的圆交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，交$C$的准线于$D$、$E$两点，已知$|A B|=8$，则$|D E|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Circle;A: Point;B: Point;D: Point;E: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;Center(G) = F;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Intersection(G, Directrix(C)) = {D, E};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 8

text: 已知直线$l_{1}$: $x-y-5=0$和直线$l_{2}$: $y=-4$，抛物线$x^{2}=16 y$上一动点$P$到直线$l_{1}$和直线$l_{2}$的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;l1: Line;l2: Line;P:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 16*y);Expression(l1) = (x - y - 5 = 0);Expression(l2) = (y=-4);PointOnCurve(P,G)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1(a>0)$的一个焦点的坐标是$(5,0)$，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/16 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (5, 0)

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上一点$P$到一个焦点的距离为$5$，则$P$到另一个焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1:Point;F2:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F2;Negation(F1=F2);Distance(P, F1) = 5
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1)

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$，由原点向过焦点的某条直线作垂线，垂足坐标为$(2,1)$，则 抛物线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;O:Origin;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));L:Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),H);PointOnCurve(O,L);IsPerpendicular(H,L);Coordinate(FootPoint(H,L))=(2,1)

text: 已知双曲线的焦点在$y$轴上，焦距为$4$，且一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{3} x$，则双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),yAxis);FocalLength(G) = 4;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}-\frac{y^{2}}{b}=1$的离心率为$\sqrt{5}$，则$\frac{a}{b}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b + x^2/a = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(5)

text: 过点$(0,-3)$的直线$l$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$只有一个公共点，则直线$l$的方程为?
fact_expressions: H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (0, -3);l: Line;PointOnCurve(H, l);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);NumIntersection(l, G) = 1

text: 以方程$\frac{x}{a} \pm \frac{y}{b}=0$为渐近线的双曲线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (x/a + pm*y/b = 0);a: Number;b: Number

text: 若焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2/m = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Eccentricity(G) = 1/2

text: 已知$A$ , $B$ , $P$为双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$上不同三点，且满足$\overrightarrow{P A}+\overrightarrow{P B}=2 \overrightarrow{P O}$($O$为坐标原点)，直线$PA$ , $PB$的斜率记为$m$, $n$，则$m^{2}+\frac{n^{2}}{9}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;m: Number;n: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/4 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(A = B);Negation(A = P);Negation(P = B);VectorOf(P, A) + VectorOf(P, B) = 2*VectorOf(P, O);Slope(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) = m;Slope(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) = n

G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;a2: Number;b2: Number;a1: Number;b1: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a2>0;b2>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b2^2 + x^2/a2^2 = 1);a1>b1;b1>0;Expression(H) = (y^2/b1^2 + x^2/a1^2 = 1);OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = P;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Focus(H) = {F1, F2};Focus(G) = Focus(H);e1: Number;e2: Number;Eccentricity(H) = e1;Eccentricity(G) = e2;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = pi/3

text: 已知双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \sqrt{2} x$，且过点$(1,2)$，则该双曲线的焦距为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (1, 2);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*sqrt(2)*x);PointOnCurve(H,G)

text: 已知$A$、$B$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的公共顶点.$P$是双曲线上的动点，$M$是椭圆上的动点（$P$、$M$都异于$A$ , $B$)，且满足$AP+BP= \lambda(AM+B M)$，其中$\lambda \in R$，设直线$A P$ , $B P$ , $A M$ , $B M$的斜率分别记为$k_{1}$,$k_{2}$ , $k_{3}$, $k_{4}$, $k_{1}+k_{2}=5$，则$k_{3}+k_{4}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;M: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a1:Number;b1:Number;a1 > b1;b1 > 0;Expression(H) = (y^2/b1^2 + x^2/a1^2 = 1);Vertex(G)={A,B};In(A,Vertex(H));In(B,Vertex(H));PointOnCurve(P,G);PointOnCurve(M,H);Negation(P=A);Negation(P=B);Negation(M=A);Negation(M=B);LineSegmentOf(A, P) + LineSegmentOf(B, P) = lambda*(LineSegmentOf(A, M) + LineSegmentOf(B, M));lambda:Real;Slope(LineOf(A,P))=k1;Slope(LineOf(B,P))=k2;Slope(LineOf(A,M))=k3;Slope(LineOf(B,M))=k4;k1:Number;k2:Number;k3:Number;k4:Number;k1+k2=5

text: 椭圆$r$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$焦距为$2 c$，若直线$y=\sqrt{3}(x+c)$与椭圆$r$的一个交点$M$满足$\angle M F_{1} F_{2}=2 \angle M F_{2} F_{1}$, 则该椭圆的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: r: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;c: Number;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;G:Line;a > b;b > 0;Expression(r) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (y = sqrt(3)*(c + x));LeftFocus(r)=F1;RightFocus(r)=F2;FocalLength(r)=2*c;OneOf(Intersection(G,r))=M;AngleOf(M,F1,F2)=2*AngleOf(M,F2,F1)

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，点$P$在抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$上，点$F$为抛物线的焦点，若$\Delta O P F$的面积为$32$，则$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 16*x);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;Area(TriangleOf(O, P, F)) = 32

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$的焦点为$F$，准线与$x$轴的交点为$K$，点$A$在$C$上且$|A K|=\sqrt{2}|A F|$，则$\Delta A F K$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;K: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = K;PointOnCurve(A, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, K)) = sqrt(2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F))

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点到焦点$F$和点$(4,0)$的距离之和的最小值为$5$，则此抛物线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;K: Point;PointOnCurve(K, C);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (4, 0);Min(Distance(K, F) + Distance(K, G)) = 5

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$的左、右焦点，点$P$在椭圆上，且满足$P F_{1}=2 P F_{2}$ , $\angle P F_{1} F_{2}=30^{\circ}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);LineSegmentOf(P, F1) = 2*LineSegmentOf(P, F2);AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = ApplyUnit(30, degree)

text: 以$x=1$为准线的抛物线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(Directrix(G))= (x = 1)

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$且斜率为$1$的直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点,则$|A B|$的值等于?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Slope(G) = 1;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B}

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M$到准线及对称轴的距离分别为$10$和$6$，则其标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;M: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y**2 = 2*(p*x));PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;Distance(M, Directrix(G)) = 10;Distance(M, SymmetryAxis(G)) = 6

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$经过焦点的弦$A B$的两端点坐标分别为$A(x_{1} , y_{1})$ , $B(x_{2} , y_{2})$，则$\frac{y_{1} y_{2}}{x_{1} x_{2}}$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;A: Point;B: Point;Endpoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = {A, B};Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G) = True;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = True;x1: Number;y1: Number;x2: Number;y2: Number

text: 已知斜率为$1$的直线过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的焦点，且与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，则线段$A B$的长是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);H: Line;Slope(H) = 1;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，过右焦点$F$且斜率为$k(k>0)$的直线与$C$相交于$A$，$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=3 \overrightarrow{F B}$, 则$k$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;G: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;k:Number;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(3)/2;RightFocus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Slope(G)=k;k>0;Intersection(G, C) = {A,B};VectorOf(A, F) = 3*VectorOf(F, B)

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的离心率$e=\frac{1}{2}$，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/9 + x^2/m = 1);e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e;e = 1/2;m: Real;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$，右焦点为$F$，点$P$是直线$x=2$在第一象限上的动点，直线$P F$与双曲线$C$的一条渐近线在第一象限上的交点为$Q$，若$\overrightarrow{F P}=2 \overrightarrow{P Q}$，则$|F Q|$=?

text: 设椭圆$M$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$右顶点和上顶点分别为$A$、$B$，直线$A B$与直线$y=-x$相交于点$P$，若点$P$在抛物线$y^{2}=-a x$上，则椭圆$M$的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Number;M: Ellipse;b: Number;H: Line;B: Point;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -a*x);a > b;b > 0;Expression(M) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = -x);RightVertex(M) = A;UpperVertex(M) = B;Intersection(LineOf(A,B), H) = P;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知点$A(0,1)$, $C(0,5)$, 动点$M$的轨迹为$x^{2}=4 y$, 动点$N$满足$|N C|=2$, 则$|M N|+\frac{1}{2}|N A|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;C: Point;N: Point;M: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 1);Coordinate(C) = (0, 5);E: Curve;Expression(E) = (x^2 = 4*y);Locus(M) = E;Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, C)) = 2

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过$F$的直线$l$与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，$P(-\frac{5}{3}, 0)$，若$P B \perp A B$，则$|A F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l) = True;Intersection(l,G) = {A,B};B: Point;A: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (-5/3, 0);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, B), LineSegmentOf(A, B))

text: 过直线$y=2$与抛物线$x^{2}=8 y$的两个交点，并且与抛物线准线相切的圆为?

text: 已知点$F$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点，$A$为右顶点，点$P$是椭圆上一点，$P F \perp x$轴，若$|P F|=\frac{1}{4}|A F|$，则该椭圆的离心率为?

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的左、右焦点，$P$为椭圆上一点，$M$是$F_{1} P$的中点，$|O M|=1$，则$P$点到椭圆左焦点的距离为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$，长轴在$y$轴上，若焦距为$4$，则$m$等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/8 + y^2/m = 1);OverlappingLine(MajorAxis(G),yAxis);FocalLength(G) = 4

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$A(m, 2 \sqrt{3})$到焦点的距离为$4$，则实数$p$的值为?

text: 双曲线$3 x^{2}-y^{2}=3$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (3*x^2 - y^2 = 3)

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过点$F$的直线交该抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若点$A$在第一象限，且$|F A|=3|F B|$，则线段$A B$的中点坐标为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，两渐近线分别为$l_{1}$: $y=\frac{b}{a} x$ , $l_{2}$: $y=-\frac{b}{a} x$. 过$F$作$l_{1}$的垂线，垂足为$M$，该垂线交$l_{2}$于点$N$，$O$为坐标原点. 若$|O F|=|F N|$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 双曲线$C$:$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$，若双曲线$C$的右顶点为$A$，过$A$的直线$l$与双曲线$C$的两条渐近线交于$P$、$Q$两点，且$\overrightarrow{P A}=2 \overrightarrow{A Q}$，则直线$l$的斜率为?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左右两个焦点，若双曲线上存在点$P$满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=\frac{2 \pi}{3}$ ,$|F_{1} P|=3|P F_{2}|$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知椭圆$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{5}+y^{2}=1$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是$\Gamma$上的点.若$|P F_{1}| \cdot|P F_{2}|=3$，则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$的值为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$ , $A$ , $B$是椭圆$C$上的两个不同的点，设$P(1, \frac{1}{2})$，若$\overrightarrow{A P}=\overrightarrow{P B}$，则直线$A B$的方程为?

text: 设双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{24}=1$的左焦点和右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$A$是$C$右支上的一点，则$|A F_{1}|+\frac{8}{|A F_{2} |}$的最小值为?

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = 1)

text: 过点$P(1,1)$作一条直线与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$交于$M$、$N$两点，且$P$恰为线段$M N$的中点，则该直线的方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点、右焦点为$A$、$F$，过点$A$的直线$l$与$C$的一条渐近线交于点$Q$，直线$Q F$与$C$的一个交点为$B$，$\overrightarrow{A Q} \cdot \overrightarrow{A B}=\overrightarrow{A Q} \cdot \overrightarrow{F B}$，且$\overrightarrow{B Q}=4 \overrightarrow{F Q}$，则双曲线的离心率$e$为?

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 px$过点$M(2 , 2)$，则点$M$到抛物线焦点的距离为?

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，过点$M(a, 0)(a \neq 0)$的直线与抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$交于$A$、$B$两点，设直线$O A$, $O B$的斜率分别为$k_{1}$, $k_{2}$，若$k_{1} k_{2}=-2 p$，则$a$的值为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过点$F_{1}$的直线交椭圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?

text: $F_{1}(-4,0)$、$F_{2}(4,0)$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(m>0)$的两个焦点，点$M$是双曲线$C$上一点，且$\angle F_{1} M F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$\triangle F_{1} M F_{2}$的面积为?

text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作直线$A B$,$D E$分别与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$和$D$、$E$，若直线$A B$,$D E$的斜率分别为$k_{1}$，$k_{2}$，且满足$k_{1}^{2}+k_{2}^{2}=4$，则$|A B|+|D E|$的最小值为?

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的左焦点为$F$，直线$l$: $y=k x(k \neq 0)$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A F B$周长的取值范围是?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$e$，其渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{\sqrt{6}}{e} x$，则$e$=?

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-16 y^{2}=16$左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$，直线$l$过双曲线的左焦点$F_{1}$交双曲线的左支与$A$、$B$，且$|A B|=12$，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?

text: 抛物线$x=y^{2}$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x = y^2)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的右焦点为$F$，若过点$F$的直线与双曲线的右支有且只有一个交点，则此直线斜率的取值范围?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/12 - y^2/4 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F,H);NumIntersection(H,RightPart(G))=1

text: 焦点在$y$轴上的椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{m}+\frac{x^{2}}{4}=1$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，则实数$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/m = 1);m: Real;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3)/2

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P$到其焦点的距离为$3$，则点$P$的横坐标等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, Focus(G)) = 3

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，经过原点$O$的直线$l$与椭圆$E$交于$P$、$Q$两点，若$|P F|=3|Q F|$，且$\angle P F Q=90^{\circ}$，则椭圆$E$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F: Point;LeftFocus(E) = F;l: Line;O: Origin;PointOnCurve(O, l);P: Point;Q: Point;Intersection(l, E) = {P, Q};Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F));AngleOf(P, F, Q) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的焦点到渐近线的距离是$a$，则双曲线的离心率的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Distance(Focus(G),Asymptote(G)) = a

text: 双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{5}-\frac{x^{2}}{4}=1$的焦点到渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/4 + y^2/5 = 1)

text: 已知$F$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点，$P$为$C$上的一点，若$|P F|=1$，则点$P$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 1

text: 已知$F$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左焦点，$P$为椭圆上一点，则$|P F|$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 设$O$为坐标原点，$P$是以$F$为焦点的抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上任意一点，$M$是线段$P F$上的点，且$|P M|=2|M F|$，则直线$O M$斜率的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;O: Origin;M: Point;F: Point;P: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(M, LineSegmentOf(P,F));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F))

text: 双曲线$m x^{2}+y^{2}=1$的虚轴长是实轴长的$2$倍，则实数$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;Expression(G) = (m*x^2 + y^2 = 1);Length(ImageinaryAxis(G)) = 2*Length(RealAxis(G))

text:
过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的焦点作垂直于$x$轴的直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，若$A B=\frac{a}{2}$，则
双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;H: Ellipse;l: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a > b;b > 0;Expression(H) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(H), l);IsPerpendicular(l,xAxis);Intersection(l, H) = {A, B};LineSegmentOf(A, B) = a/2

text: 已知椭圆的标准方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}}=1(0<m<5)$，并且焦距为$6$，则实数$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/m^2 = 1);FocalLength(G) = 6;m>0;m<5

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+y^{2}=1(m>1)$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{n}-y^{2}=1(n>0)$有相同的焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是两曲线的一个交点，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;n: Number;H: Ellipse;m: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;n>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/n = 1);m>1;Expression(H) = (y^2 + x^2/m = 1);Focus(G) = {F1,F2};Focus(H) = {F1,F2};OneOf(Intersection(G,H))=P

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(m>0)$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{n^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(n>0)$有相同的焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$为椭圆和双曲线的一个交点，则$|P F_{1}| \cdot|P F_{2}|$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;m: Number;n: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;m>0;n>0;Expression(H) = (y^2/9 + x^2/m^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (-y^2/4 + x^2/n^2 = 1);Focus(H) = {F1, F2};Focus(G) = {F1, F2};OneOf(Intersection(H,G))=P

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，双曲线左支上点$A$满足$A F_{1} \perp A F_{2}$，则$\triangle A F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(A,LeftPart(G));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A,F1),LineSegmentOf(A,F2))

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的焦距为$6$，短轴为长轴的$\frac{\sqrt{7}}{4}$，直线$l$与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，弦$A B$的中点为$M(2,1)$，则直线$l$的方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (2, 1);FocalLength(G)=6;MinorAxis(G)=(sqrt(7)/4)*MajorAxis(G);Intersection(l,G)={A,B};IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=M

text: 从抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P$引抛物线准线的垂线，垂足为$M$，且$|PM |=5$，设抛物线的焦点为$F$，则$\triangle MPF$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;L: Line;PointOnCurve(P, L) = True;IsPerpendicular(L, Directrix(G)) = True;FootPoint(L, Directrix(G)) = M;M: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M)) = 5;F: Point;Focus(G) = F

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{81}+\frac{y^{2}}{27}=1$的两焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，一直线过$F_{1}$交椭圆于$P$、$Q$，则$\triangle P Q F_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H:Line;P: Point;Q: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/81 + y^2/27 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(F1,H);Intersection(H, G) = {P, Q}

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，短轴长为$4$，则椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3)/2;Length(MinorAxis(G))=4

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点到焦点的距离为$6$，则这点的坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);P:Point;Distance(P,Focus(G))=6;PointOnCurve(P,G)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，点$A$的坐标为$(0,2 b)$，若直线$A F$的倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 2*b);Inclination(LineOf(A, F)) = ApplyUnit(45, degree)

text: 已知点$P$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$上的一动点，则点$P$到点$A(0,2)$的距离与点$P$到抛物线$C$准线的距离之和的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(A) = (0, 2);PointOnCurve(P, C)

text: 已知双曲线的两条渐近线互相垂直，则此双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;l1: Line;l2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {l1, l2};IsPerpendicular(l1, l2)

text: 已知双曲线$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的焦距为$10$ , $P(2 , 1)$在$C$的渐近线上，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (2, 1);FocalLength(C) = 10;PointOnCurve(P, Asymptote(C))
G: Hyperbola;a: Number;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + (-a + y)^2 = 4);a > 0;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),H)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$的焦点与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}}=1(m>0)$的右焦点重合，则该双曲线的虚轴长等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;H: Parabola;m>0;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/m^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 16*x);Focus(H) = RightFocus(G)

text: 若点$(a, 3)$在方程$(x-y+1)(x+y)=0$的曲线上，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: G: Curve;H: Point;a:Number;Coordinate(H) = (a, 3);Expression(G)=((x-y+1)*(x+y)=0);PointOnCurve(H,G)

text: 若双曲线$C$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{12} -\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$共渐近线，且过点$A(3, \sqrt{2})$，则双曲线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (3, sqrt(2));G:Hyperbola;Expression(G)=(x^2/12-y^2/8=1);Asymptote(G)=Asymptote(C);PointOnCurve(A,C)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$的直线交抛物线于点$A$、$B$，交其准线$l$于点$C$，且$|A F|>|B F|$，若$|B C|=2|B F|$，则$|A F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;H: Line;PointOnCurve(F, H) = True;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;l: Line;Directrix(G) = l;Intersection(H, l) = C;C: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) > Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F));Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, C)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左, 右焦点，若双曲线右支上存在一点$P$，使$(\overrightarrow{O P}+\overrightarrow{O F_{2}}) \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{2} P}=0$ , $O$为坐标原点，且$|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|=\sqrt{3}|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(G));DotProduct((VectorOf(O, F2) + VectorOf(O, P)),VectorOf(F2, P)) = 0;Abs(VectorOf(P, F1)) = sqrt(3)*Abs(VectorOf(P, F2))

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点为$F$、$O$为坐标原点，$C$上有且只有一个点$P$满足$|O F|=|F P|$，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Number;O: Origin;F: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(P,C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(O,F))=Abs(LineSegmentOf(F,P))

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$到直线$l$: $y=\sqrt{3} x+b$的距离为$\sqrt{3}$，且直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A F|+|B F|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(l) = (y = sqrt(3)*x + b);Focus(C) = F;Distance(F, l) = sqrt(3);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};b:Number

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=8 y$的焦点为$F$、$O$为坐标原点，点$P$在抛物线$C$上，且$P F \perp O F$，则$|\overrightarrow{O F}-\overrightarrow{P F}|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 8*y);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;O: Origin;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F), LineSegmentOf(O, F))
G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1)

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的右焦点. 若$P$是$C$的左支上一点，$A(0,6 \sqrt{6})$是$y$轴上一点，则$\triangle A P F$周长的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/8 = 1);F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(C));A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 6*sqrt(6));PointOnCurve(A, yAxis)

text: $P$是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$右支上一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是左、右焦点，$I$是三角形$P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，若$S_{\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}}=2 S_{\Delta I P F_{2}}+(1+\frac{1}{\lambda}) S_{\Delta I F_{1} F_{2}}$，则实数$\lambda$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;I: Point;Incenter(TriangleOf(P,F1,F2)) = I;lambda: Real;Area(TriangleOf(P,F1,F2)) = 2*Area(TriangleOf(I,P,F2)) + (1+1/lambda)*Area(TriangleOf(I,F1,F2))

text: 若双曲线的一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{2} x$，则其离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y=sqrt(2)*x)

text: 已知直线$l$经过椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{2}+x^{2}=1$的焦点并且与椭圆相交于$P$、$Q$两点，线段$P Q$的垂直平分线与$x$轴相交于点$M$，则$\triangle M P Q$面积的最大值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), l) = True;Intersection(l,G) = {P,Q};G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2/2 = 1);P: Point;Q: Point;M: Point;Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(P,Q)),xAxis) = M
C: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/16 - y^2/4 = 1);LeftFocus(C) =F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 4

text: 直线$x=m$与椭圆$C$: $3 x^{2}+4 y^{2}=12$交于$A$、$B$，椭圆的左焦点为$F$，当$\triangle F A B$的周长最大时，$\triangle F A B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Line;m: Number;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(C) = (3*x^2 + 4*y^2 = 12);Expression(G) = (x = m);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};LeftFocus(C) = F;WhenMax(Perimeter(TriangleOf(F, A, B)))

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点为$F$，准线与$y$轴的交点为$M$、$N$为抛物线上的一点，且满足$|N F|=\lambda|M N|$，则$\lambda$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;Intersection(Directrix(G),yAxis) = M;M: Point;PointOnCurve(N,G) = True;N: Point;lambda: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, F)) = lambda*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N))

text: 已知点$A$、$B$、$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+y^{2}=1(a>1)$的右顶点、下顶点、左焦点和右焦点，点$M$、$N$是椭圆上任意两点，若$\Delta M A B$的面积最大值为$\sqrt{2}+1$，则$\frac{|N F_{1}| \cdot|N F_{2}|}{|N F_{1}|+9|N F_{2}|}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;a: Number;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;N: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>1;Expression(G) = (y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightVertex(G) = A;LowerVertex(G) = B;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(M, G);PointOnCurve(N, G);Max(Area(TriangleOf(M, A, B))) = 1 + sqrt(2)

text: 点$A$是抛物线$C_{1}$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$与双曲线$C_{2}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线的交点，若点$A$到抛物线$C_{1}$的准线的距离为$p$，则双曲线$C_{2}$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C2: Hyperbola;C1: Parabola;A: Point;p: Number;a: Number;b: Number;a > 0;b > 0;p > 0;Expression(C1) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Expression(C2) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Intersection(C1, OneOf(Asymptote(C2))) = A;Distance(A, Directrix(C1)) = p
G: Hyperbola;a: Number;a > 0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/9 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (3*x - 2*y = 0)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$与点$M(-1,2)$，过$C$的焦点，且斜率为$k$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{M A} \cdot \overrightarrow{M B}=0$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-1, 2);PointOnCurve(Focus(C), G);Slope(G) = k;k: Number;G: Line;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;DotProduct(VectorOf(M, A), VectorOf(M, B)) = 0

text: 若常数$a>0$, 椭圆$x^{2}+a^{2} y^{2}=2 a^{2}$的长轴长是短轴长的$3$倍，则实数$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: a: Real;a>0;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (a^2*y^2 + x^2 = 2*a^2);Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 3*Length(MinorAxis(G))

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左、右焦点，$C$的离心率$e=2$，过$F_{2}$的直线与双曲线$C$的右支交于$A$、$B$两点(其中$A$点在第一象限)，设点$M$、$N$分别为$\Delta A F_{1} F_{2}$, $\Delta B F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，则$|M N|$的范围是?(用只含有$a$的式子表示)

text: 已知点$(1,1)$在抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上，则$C$的焦点到其准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(G) = (1, 1);PointOnCurve(G, C)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、 右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$的直线交双曲线$C$的左支于$P$、$Q$两点，若$\overrightarrow{P F_{2}} \perp \overrightarrow{P Q}$且$\triangle P Q F_{2}$的周长为$12 a$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，点$P$在此双曲线上，$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，如果点$P$到$x$轴的距离等于$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{5}$，那么该双曲线的离心率等于?

text: 已知双曲线的中心在坐标原点，一个焦点为$F(10 , 0)$，两条渐近线的方程为$y=\pm \frac{4}{3} x$，则该双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F: Point;O:Origin;Center(G)=O;Coordinate(F) = (10, 0);OneOf(Focus(G))=F;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(4/3)*x)

text: 已知点$Q(-2 \sqrt{2} , 0)$及抛物线$x^{2}=-4 y$上一动点$P(x, y)$，则$|y|+|P Q|$的最小值是?

text: 若抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点到双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线距离等于$\frac{1}{3}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知点$P(m, 2)$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$右支上的一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为其左右焦点，线段$P F_{1}$交$C$的左支于点$Q$，则$|P Q|+|Q F_{2}|$=?

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左、右焦点，若双曲线上存在点$A$，使$\angle F_{1} A F_{2}=90^{\circ}$，且$|A F_{1}|=3|A F_{2}|$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$, 过$F_{1}$且垂直于$x$轴的直线与该双曲线的左支交于$A$、$B$两点，$A F_{2}$,$B F_{2}$分别交$y$轴于$P$、$Q$两点，若$\triangle P Q F_{2}$的周长为$16$，则$\frac{b^{2}}{a+1}$的最大值为?

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(a>0)$的渐近线方程为$3 x \pm 2 y=0$，则正数$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/9 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = ((2*y)+(3*(pm*x)) = 0)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的焦点$F$到准线的距离为$4$，过点$F$和$R(m, 0)$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$P$、$Q$两点.若$\overrightarrow{R P}=\overrightarrow{P F}$，则$|P Q|$=?

已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$，若过右焦点$F$且倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$的直线与双曲线的右支有

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是椭圆上一点，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{3}$，若$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的外接圆和内切圆的半径分别为$R$, $r$，当$R=4 r$时，椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P,G) ;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = pi/3;R:Number;r:Number;Radius(CircumCircle(TriangleOf(F1,P,F2)))=R;Radius(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(F1,P,F2)))=r;R=4*r

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$作倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若线段$A B$的长为$8$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;l: Line;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F,l);Inclination(l)=ApplyUnit(30,degree);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Length(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=8

text: 若直线$l$经过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，且线段$A B$中点的横坐标为$2$，则线段$A B$的长为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), l);Intersection(l,G)={A,B};XCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))) = 2

text: 已知直线$x-y=2$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$ , $B$两点，那么线段$AB$的中点坐标是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;G: Parabola;H: Line;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x - y = 2);Intersection(H, G) = {A,B}

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左右焦点，$P$是直线$l$: $y=x+m(m \in R)$上一点，若$|P F_{1}|+|P F_{2}|$的最小值是$4$，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;l: Line;m: Real;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Expression(l) = (y = x + m);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, l);Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))) = 4

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线与直线$2 x-y+1=0$平行，则它的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;H: Line;Expression(H) = (2*x - y + 1 = 0);IsParallel(OneOf(Asymptote(G)), H) = True

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的左焦点为$F$，直线$x=t$与椭圆相交于点$M$、$N$，当$\Delta F M N$的周长最大时，$\Delta F M N$的面积是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;t: Number;F: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/4 = 1);Expression(H) = (x = t);LeftFocus(G)=F;Intersection(H, G) = {M, N};WhenMax(Perimeter(TriangleOf(F,M,N)))
G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 2
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};F1: Point;F2: Point;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$与直线$y=2 x$有交点，则离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = 2*x);IsIntersect(G, H)

text: 若双曲线$C$: $\frac{y^{2}}{m}-x^{2}=1(m>0)$的一条渐近线为$m x+\sqrt{3} y=0$，则$C$的焦距为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-x^2 + y^2/m = 1);m: Number;m>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (m*x + sqrt(3)*y = 0)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在椭圆上，当$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$时，$\triangle F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0

text: 已知双曲线的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$，点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是其左右焦点，$A$是圆$x^{2}+(y-5)^{2}=1$上的一点，点$M$在双曲线的右支上，则$|M F_{1}|+|M A|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Circle;M: Point;F1: Point;F2:Point;A: Point;Expression(H) = (x^2 + (y - 5)^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, H);LeftFocus(G) =F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(M, RightPart(G))

text: 过焦点为$F$的抛物线$y^{2}=12 x$上一点$M$向其准线作垂线，垂足为$N$，若$|N F|=10$，则$|M F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 12*x);F: Point;Focus(G)=F;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M,G);L:Line;PointOnCurve(M,L);IsPerpendicular(Directrix(G),L);N: Point;FootPoint(Directrix(G),L)=N;Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, F)) = 10

text: 已知过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$焦点$F$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，$A$、$B$两点在抛物线准线上的射影为$A_{1}$, $B_{1} $则$\angle A_{1} F B_{1}$为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;A1: Point;F: Point;B1: Point;A: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Projection(A,Directrix(G))=A1;Projection(B,Directrix(G))=B1

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率等于$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3)/2

text: 已知动直线$l$: $y=\frac{1}{m} x+2 m(m \neq 0)$与椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$相交于$M$、$N$两点，若椭圆$C$上存在点$Q$，使得$\overrightarrow{O M}+\overrightarrow{O N}=\lambda \overrightarrow{O Q}(\lambda \neq 0)$，则实数$\lambda^{2}$的取值范围?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;O: Origin;M: Point;N: Point;Q: Point;lambda:Real;Expression(C) = (x^2/8 + y^2/4 = 1);Expression(l) = (y = 2*m + x/m);m:Number;Negation(m=0);Intersection(l, C) = {M, N};PointOnCurve(Q, C);VectorOf(O, M) + VectorOf(O, N) = lambda*VectorOf(O, Q);Negation(lambda=0)

text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作直线$l$交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$. 若$|A F|=4|B F|$，则直线$l$的斜率是?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 4*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的一个焦点坐标$F_{1}(0,4)$，则实数$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2/12 + x^2/m = 1);Coordinate(F1) = (0, 4);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F1

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，点$M$为双曲线的左支上一点，满足$|M F_{1}|=2|F_{1} F_{2}|$ ,且$\cos \angle M F_{1} F_{2}=-\frac{5}{16}$，则该双曲线的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;e: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(M, LeftPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));Cos(AngleOf(M, F1, F2)) = -5/16;Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 已知直线$l$被椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{36}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$所截得的弦的中点为$M(4 , 2)$，则$l$被椭圆截得的弦长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;l: Line;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/36 + y^2/9 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (4, 2);MidPoint(InterceptChord(l, G)) = M

text: 直线$x-2 y+3=0$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$相交于$A$、$B$两点，且$P(-1,1)$恰好为$AB$中点，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (x - 2*y + 3 = 0);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (-1, 1);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，抛物线上有一点$P$，过点$P$作$P M \perp l$，垂足为$M$，且$|M P|=| M F |$，若$\triangle P M F$的面积为$\sqrt{3}$，则$p$等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;P: Point;M: Point;F: Point;l: Line;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(G) = F;Directrix(G) = l;PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(P,LineSegmentOf(P,M));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,M),l);FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,M),l)=M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, P)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F));Area(TriangleOf(P, M, F)) = sqrt(3)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=4 y$的焦点为$F$，过$C$上一点$A$作$C$的准线$l$的垂线，垂足为$B$，连接$F B$交$x$轴于点$D$，若$|A F|=5$，则$|A D|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 4*y);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, C) = True;PointOnCurve(A, Z) = True;l: Line;Directrix(C) = l;IsPerpendicular(Z, l) = True;Z: Line;FootPoint(Z, l) = B;B: Point;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(F, B), xAxis) = D;D: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 5

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$一条渐近线的倾斜角为$120^{\circ}$，则它的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Inclination(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，$E$为其准线与$x$轴的交点，过$F$的直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，$M$为线段$A B$的中点，且$|M E|=\sqrt{11}$，则$|\overrightarrow{A B}|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;E: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = E;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, E)) = sqrt(11)

text: 双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在$C$上且$\tan \angle F_{1} P F_{2}=4 \sqrt{3}$ ,$ O$为坐标原点，则$|O P|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);Tan(AngleOf(F1, P, F2)) = 4*sqrt(3)

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的两个焦点，点$M$在$C$上，则$|M F_{1}| \cdot|M F_{2}|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(M, C)

text: 过椭圆$x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$上一点$P$作$x$轴的垂线，垂足为$Q$，则线段$P Q$中点$M$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2/2 = 1);P: Point;L: Line;PointOnCurve(P,G);PointOnCurve(P, L);IsPerpendicular(L, xAxis);Q: Point;FootPoint(L, xAxis) = Q;M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = M

text: 设$m$是常数，若点$F(0 , 5)$是双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{m}-\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1$的一个焦点，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;F: Point;Expression(G) = (-x^2/9 + y^2/m = 1);Coordinate(F) = (0, 5);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F

text: 直线$y=k x+1$被椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$截得的弦长的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;k: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = k*x + 1)

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的焦点到渐近线的距离为$1$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/m = 1);Distance(Focus(G), Asymptote(G)) = 1

text: 已知$A$、$B$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$两点，$O$为坐标原点. 若$|O A|=|O B|$，且$\triangle A O B$的垂心恰是此抛物线的焦点，则直线$A B$的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;B: Point;A: Point;O: Origin;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, A)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, B));Orthocenter(TriangleOf(A,O,B))=Focus(G)

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，$P$为$C$上的一点，若$|P F|=3$，则点$P$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 3

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，直线$l$过$F$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A F|=|B F|$，则$y$轴被以线段$A B$为直径的圆截得的弦长为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F));G: Circle;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{b}=1$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆上一点，且$\angle P F_{1} F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{6}$ , $\angle P F_{2} F_{1}=\frac{\pi}{3}$，则椭圆的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b + x^2/a = 1);b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = pi/6;AngleOf(P, F2, F1) = pi/3;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 已知$A$、$F$是离心率为$2$的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点和右焦点，记$A$、$F$到直线$b x-a y=0$的距离分别为$d_{1}$、$d_{2}$，则$\frac{d_{1}}{d_{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;A: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (-a*y + b*x = 0);Eccentricity(G) = 2;RightVertex(G) = A;RightFocus(G) = F;d1: Number;d2: Number;Distance(A, H) = d1;Distance(F, H) = d2

text: 已知斜率$k=\frac{3}{4}$的直线$l$过抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点，且与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，分别过点$A$、$B$若作抛物线的两条切线相交于点$M$，则$\triangle M A B$的面积为?

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上横坐标为$6$的点到焦点的距离等于$8$，则焦点到准线的距离是?

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{11}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1(a>0)$有相同的焦点，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为?

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 + y^2/m = 1)

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=-2 y$的焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = -2*y)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{k}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的其中一个焦点坐标为$(\sqrt{6}, 0)$，则实数$k$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Real;Expression(G) = (-y^2/4 + x^2/k = 1);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G)))=(sqrt(6),0)

text: 若$a>0$，则抛物线$x^{2}=4 a y$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*a*y);a > 0

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=a x$焦点重合，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2 = a*x);Expression(H) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);OneOf(Focus(H)) = Focus(G)

text: 已知斜率为$1$的直线$l$与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$相交于$B$、$D$两点，且$B D$的中点为$M(1,3)$，则$C$的离心率是?

text: 已知直线$l$: $\sqrt{3} x-y-\sqrt{3}=0$与抛物线$\Gamma$: $y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点与$x$轴交于$F$, 若$\overrightarrow{O F}=\lambda \overrightarrow{O A}+\mu \overrightarrow{O B}(\lambda \leq \mu)$,则$\frac{\lambda}{\mu}$=?

text: 已知椭圆短轴的一个端点到一个焦点的距离为$5$，焦点到椭圆中心的距离为$3$，则椭圆的标准方程为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ ,过$F_{2}$的直线与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=b^{2}$相切于点$A$，并与椭圆$C$交于两点$P$、$Q$，若$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，则椭圆的离心率为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$、$A$为$C$上一点，且$|A F|=5$ , $O$为坐标原点，则$\triangle O A F$的面积为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左焦点为$F$，直线$x-y-2=0$ , $x-y+2=0$与椭圆分别相交于$A$、$B$、$C$，$D$，则$|A F|+|B F|+|C F|+|D F|$=?

text: 已知椭圆的中心在坐标原点，焦点在$x$轴上，焦距为$6 \sqrt{3}$，且椭圆上一点到两个焦点的距离之和为$12$，则椭圆的方程为?

text: 抛物线$y=8 x^{2}$的焦点坐标为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$、$M$为抛物线的准线上一点，且$M$的纵坐标为$3 \sqrt{3}$ , $N$是直线$M F$与抛物线的一个交点，若$\overrightarrow{M N}=2 \overrightarrow{N F}$，则$p$=?

text: 已知直线$k x-y+1=0$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1$相交于两个不同的点$A$、$B$，若$x$轴上的点$M(3,0)$到$A$、$B$两点的距离相等，则$k$的值为?

text: 若椭圆$C$的对称轴为坐标轴，焦点在$y$轴上，且椭圆$C$的离心率为$\frac{{\sqrt{5}}}{3}$，面积为$6\pi$，则椭圆$C$的方程为？

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$ , $M(x_{1}, y_{1})$ , $N(x_{2}, y_{2})$是抛物线$C$上的两个动点，若$x_{1}+x_{2}+2=2|M N|$，则$\angle M F N$的最大值为?

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1$的公共焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是两曲线的一个公共点，则$S_\Delta F_{1} F_{2} P$=?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{5}$，则其渐近线方程为?

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$且与$x$轴垂直的直线与双曲线交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|F_{1} F_{2}|=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}|A B|$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左、右焦点，双曲线上有一点$M$，满足$|M F_{1}|=\lambda|M F_{2}|(\frac{1}{3} \leq \lambda \leq \frac{1}{2})$，且$\angle F_{1} M F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则该双曲线离心率的取值范围是?

text: 已知点$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，过点$F$的直线$l$交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，与$C$的准线交于点$M$，若$\overrightarrow{A B}+\overrightarrow{A M}=\overrightarrow{0}$，则$|A B|$的值等于?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，$P$为双曲线右支上一点，满足$|P F_{2}|=|F_{1} F_{2}|$，直线$P F_{1}$与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$有公共点，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;H: Circle;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));IsIntersect(LineOf(P,F1), H)

text: 已知$A$、$B$、$P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1( a>0, b>0)$上的不同三点，且$A$、$B$两点连线经过坐标原点，若直线$P A$, $P B$的斜率乘积$k_{P A} \cdot k_{P B}=\frac{2}{3}$，则该双曲线的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;O:Origin;e: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(A=B);Negation(A=P);Negation(B=P);PointOnCurve(O,LineSegmentOf(A,B));Slope(LineOf(P, B)) = k2;Slope(LineOf(P,A))=k1;k1:Number;k2:Number;k1*k2=2/3;Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的中心为顶点,以椭圆的左准线为准线的抛物线与椭圆右准线交于$A$ , $B$两点,则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);Vertex(G)=Center(H);LeftDirectrix(H)=Directrix(G);Intersection(RightDirectrix(H),G)={A,B}

text: 过点$(\sqrt{3},\sqrt{5})$，且与椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{25}+\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1$有相同焦点的椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/25 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(3), sqrt(5));C:Ellipse;Focus(C)=Focus(G);PointOnCurve(H,C)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆上一点，$O$是坐标原点，$M$是$P F_{1}$的中点，若$|P F_{1}|=4$，则$|O M|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;O: Origin;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 4

text: 双曲线以$F_{1}(-3 , 0)$ , $F_{2}(3 , 0)$为焦点，且虚轴长为实轴长$\sqrt{2}$倍，则该双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-3, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (3, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Length(ImageinaryAxis(G)) = sqrt(2)*Length(RealAxis(G))

text: 直线$l$过抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点且与其交于点$A$、$B$，以线段$|A B|$为直径的圆$M$恰与抛物线的准线相切，若圆$M$的面积为$16 \pi$，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};M: Circle;IsDiameter(Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)), M);IsTangent(Directrix(G), M);Area(M) = 16*pi

text: 若抛物线$C$顶点在原点，焦点在$y$轴上，且过点$(2,1)$，则$C$的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;O: Origin;Vertex(C) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(C), yAxis);G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (2, 1);PointOnCurve(G, C)

text: 已知平面内两定点$A(-5,0)$ , $B(5,0)$，动点$M$满足 $||M A|-| M B||=6$，则点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-5, 0);Coordinate(B) = (5, 0);M: Point;Abs(Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, A)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, B))) = 6

text: 椭圆$x^{2}+4 y^{2}=4$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 4*y^2 = 4)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左顶点为$A$，上顶点为$B$，右焦点为$F$. 设线段$A B$的中点为$M$，若$2 \overrightarrow{M A} \cdot \overrightarrow{M F}+\overrightarrow{B F}^2 \geq 0$，则该椭圆离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;A: Point;LeftVertex(G) = A;B: Point;UpperVertex(G) = B;F: Point;RightFocus(G) = F;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = M;M: Point;DotProduct(VectorOf(M, F), 2*VectorOf(M, A)) + VectorOf(B, F)^2 >= 0

text: 已知直线$x-y=2$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，那么线段$A B$的中点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;B: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x - y = 2);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}
G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 1/2

text: 若抛物线${y}^{2}=2 px$的焦点坐标为$(1,0)$，则准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;Coordinate(Focus(G)) = (1,0)

text: 设抛物线$y=4 x^{2}$的焦点为$F$，则点$F$的坐标为？
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y = 4*x^2);Focus(G) = F

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点恰好是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{12-m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m+4}=1$的右焦点，则实数$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;H: Parabola;p: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/(12 - m) - y^2/(m + 4) = 1);p>0;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(H) = RightFocus(G)

text: 过点$P(2,1)$的直线与抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，且$\overrightarrow{P A}+\overrightarrow{P B}=\overrightarrow{0}$则此直线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 16*x);Coordinate(P) = (2, 1);PointOnCurve(P, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};VectorOf(P, A) + VectorOf(P, B) = 0

text: 已知圆$(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=1$经过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$的一个顶点和一个焦点，则此椭圆的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;e: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 2)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)),H);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Vertex(G)),H);Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P$到焦点的距离是它到$y$轴的距离的$2$倍，则点$P$到焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(P,G);Distance(P, Focus(G)) = Distance(P, yAxis)*2

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{2+m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m+1}=1$表示双曲线，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m + 2) - y^2/(m + 1) = 1);m: Number

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}$ , $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$是双曲线的两个焦点，$A$为左顶点、$B(0, b)$，点$P$在线段$AB$上，则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;b>0;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Coordinate(B) = (0, b);Eccentricity(G)=sqrt(5)/2;Focus(G)={F1,F2};LeftVertex(G)=A;PointOnCurve(P, LineSegmentOf(A, B))

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=k$的一个焦点是抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$的焦点，则$k$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Number;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = k);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 16*x);OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H)

text: 曲线$x y=2$上的点到直线$x+y+\sqrt{2}=0$的距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;H: Curve;P0: Point;Expression(G) = (x + y + sqrt(2) = 0);Expression(H) = (x*y = 2);PointOnCurve(P0, H)

text: 已知双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$，写出双曲线$C$的一个标准方程?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(C)) = (y = pm*2*x)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$2$，焦点到渐近线的距离为$\sqrt{3}$，则此双曲线的焦距等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2;Distance(Focus(G),Asymptote(G))=sqrt(3)

text: 如果过两点$A(a, 0)$和$B(0, a)$的直线与抛物线$y=x^{2}-2 x-3$没有交点.那么实数$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;a: Real;Expression(G) = (y = x^2 - 2*x - 3);Coordinate(A)=(a,0);Coordinate(B)=(0,a);PointOnCurve(A,H);PointOnCurve(B,H);NumIntersection(H,G)=0

text: 若焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{k+4}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则实数$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/(k + 4) + y^2/9 = 1);k: Real;Eccentricity(G) = 1/2

text: 直线$l$: $y=2 x+10$过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$一个焦点且与其一条渐近线平行，则双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Expression(l) = (y = 2*x + 10);G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), l);IsParallel(l, OneOf(Asymptote(G)))

text: 方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m+2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$表示焦点在$y$轴上的双曲线，则$m$取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m + 2) + y^2/4 = 1);m: Number;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis) = True

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-4 x+2=0$有交点，则该双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (-4*x + x^2 + y^2 + 2 = 0);IsIntersect(Asymptote(G),H)

text: 设点$F$、$B$分别为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(a>\sqrt{3})$的右焦点和上顶点，$O$为坐标原点，且$\triangle O F B$的周长为$3+\sqrt{3}$，则实数$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Real;O: Origin;F: Point;B: Point;a > sqrt(3);Expression(C) = (y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C) = F;UpperVertex(C) = B;Perimeter(TriangleOf(O, F, B)) = sqrt(3) + 3

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}$，则$C$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(5)/2

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$上两点$A$、$B$，若$A B$的中点为$D$，直线$O D$的斜率等于$1$，则直线$A B$的斜率等于?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;O: Origin;D: Point;B: Point;A: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A,C);PointOnCurve(B,C);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = D;Slope(LineOf(O,D))=1

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上的点$A(x_{0}, \sqrt{2})$到其焦点的距离是$A$到$y$轴距离的$3$倍，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(A) = (x0, sqrt(2));x0:Number;PointOnCurve(A,G);Distance(A, Focus(G)) = Distance(A, yAxis) * 3

text: 过抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点$F$作倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$的直线，与抛物线分别交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;H: Line;PointOnCurve(F, H);Inclination(H) = ApplyUnit(30, degree);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 已知点$Q(m , 0)$, $P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的动点. 若点$P$恰在椭圆的右顶点时，线段$PQ$的长度取到最小，则实数$m$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: Q: Point;m: Real;Coordinate(Q) = (m, 0);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);RightVertex(G) = P;WhenMin(Length(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)))

text: 设圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-4 x+2 y-11=0$的圆心为$A$，点$P$在圆上，则线段$PA$的中点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: P: Point;A: Point;G: Circle;M: Point;Expression(G) = (2*y - 4*x + x^2 + y^2 - 11 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);Center(G) = A;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) = M

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$则该曲线的虚轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2 = 1)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程是$y=\sqrt{3} x$ ,它的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$的焦点相同,则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Parabola;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 16*x);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x);OneOf(Focus(G))=Focus(H)

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M(1, m)$到其焦点的距离为$5$，双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{a}=1$的左顶点为$A$，若双曲线一条渐近线与直线$AM$垂直，则实数$a$=?
fact_expressions: A: Point;M: Point;G: Hyperbola;a: Real;H: Parabola;p: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/a = 1);p>0;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(M) = (1, m);PointOnCurve(M, H);Distance(M, Focus(H)) = 5;LeftVertex(G) = A;IsPerpendicular(OneOf(Asymptote(G)), LineOf(A, M));m:Number

text: 设抛物线的顶点在原点，准线方程为$x=-2$，则抛物线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;O: Origin;Vertex(G) = O;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (x=-2)

text: 已知$A$、$B$两点的坐标分别是$(-2,0) $,$(2,0)$，直线$A M$ ,$B M$相交于点$M$，且直线$A M$的斜率与直线$B M$的斜率的差是$4$，则点$M$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;M: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-2, 0);Coordinate(B) = (2, 0);Intersection(LineOf(A,M),LineOf(B,M))=M;Slope(LineOf(A,M))-Slope(LineOf(B,M))=4

text: 椭圆$C$的中心在坐标原点，左、右焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$在$x$轴上，已知$A$、$B$分别是椭圆的上顶点和右顶点，$P$是椭圆上一点，且$P F_{1} \perp x$轴，$P F_{2} / / A B$，则此椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(C) = O;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, xAxis);PointOnCurve(F2, xAxis);A: Point;B: Point;UpperVertex(C) = A;RightVertex(C) = B;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), xAxis);IsParallel(LineSegmentOf(P, F2), LineSegmentOf(A, B))

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-y^{2}=1$和椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$焦点相同，则该双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/12 + y^2/4 = 1);Focus(G) = Focus(H)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{36}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的焦距为$18$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/36 - y^2/m = 1);FocalLength(G) = 18

text: 双曲线$3 my^{2}-mx^{2}=3$的一个焦点是$(0 , 2)$，则$m$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;H: Point;Expression(G) = (-m*x^2 + 3*(m*y^2) = 3);Coordinate(H) = (0, 2);OneOf(Focus(G)) = H

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点是$F$，左、右顶点分别是$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$，过$F$做$x$轴的垂线交双曲线于$B$、$C$两点，若$A_{1} B \perp A_{2} C$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A1: Point;B: Point;A2: Point;C: Point;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;LeftVertex(G) = A1;RightVertex(G) = A2;L:Line;PointOnCurve(F, L);IsPerpendicular(L,xAxis);Intersection(L, G) = {B, C};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A1, B), LineSegmentOf(A2, C))

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M(1, m)(m>0)$到其焦点的距离为$5$, 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a}-y^{2}=1$的左顶点为$A$. 若双曲线的一条渐近线与直线$AM$平行. 则实数$a$等于?
fact_expressions: A: Point;M: Point;G: Hyperbola;a: Real;H: Parabola;p: Number;m: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a = 1);p>0;m > 0;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(M) = (1, m);PointOnCurve(M, H);Distance(M, Focus(H)) = 5;LeftVertex(G) = A;IsParallel(OneOf(Asymptote(G)), LineOf(A, M))

text: 已知椭圆与$x$轴相切，两个焦点坐标为$F_{1}(1,1)$, $F_{2}(5,2)$，则其长轴长为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$，直线$l$过左焦点且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{3}$，以椭圆的长轴为直径的圆截$l$所得的弦长等于椭圆的焦距，则椭圆的离心率为?
