text: 若圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}  (a>0)$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$有公共点，则实数$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);a: Real;a>0;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);IsIntersect(H, G)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{49}+\frac{y^{2}}{24}=1$上一点$P$与椭圆的两个焦点$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$的连线互相垂直，则$\triangle PF_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/49 + y^2/24 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P,G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,F1),LineSegmentOf(P,F2))

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$的准线经过点$(-1,1)$, 则抛物线焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (-1, 1);PointOnCurve(H, Directrix(G))

text: 设$P$是双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$上任意一点，过$P$作渐近线$l_{1}$: $y=\frac{b}{a} x$和$l_{2}$: $y=-\frac{b}{a} x$的平行线分别交于点$R$、$Q$. 则$|P R| \cdot|P Q|$=?
fact_expressions: P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, E);E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;l1: Line;Expression(l1) = (y = (b/a)*x);l2: Line;Expression(l2) = (y = (-b/a)*x);Asymptote(E) = {l1, l2};Z1: Line;Z2: Line;PointOnCurve(P, Z1);PointOnCurve(P, Z2);IsParallel(Z1, l1);IsParallel(Z2, l2);R: Point;Q: Point;Intersection(Z1, l2) = R;Intersection(Z2, l1) = Q

text: 准线方程为$x=1$的抛物线标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (x = 1)

text: 已知$M$、$N$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上两个不同的点，$F$为抛物线的焦点.若线段$M N$的中点的纵坐标为$2$,$|M F|+|N F|=10$,则直线$M N$的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;N: Point;F:Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(M,G);PointOnCurve(N,G);Negation(M=N);Focus(G)=F;YCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M,N)))=2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(N,F))=10

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1$的上顶点为$A$，左顶点为$B$，则直线$A B$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 + y^2 = 1);UpperVertex(G) = A;LeftVertex(G) = B

text: 双曲线$C$与标准型的椭圆$C^{\prime}$有公共的焦点,$C$的实轴长为$C^{\prime}$长轴长的一半,$C^{\prime}$的离心率比$C$的离心率小$\frac{\sqrt{11}}{6}$, 且$C^{\prime}$的焦距是$2 \sqrt{11}$, 则此双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;C1: Ellipse;Focus(C) = Focus(C1);Length(RealAxis(C)) = (1/2)*Length(MajorAxis(C1));Eccentricity(C1) = Eccentricity(C) - sqrt(11)/6;FocalLength(C1) = 2*sqrt(11)

text: $AB$是过$C$:$y^{2}=4 x$焦点的弦，且$|AB|=10$，则$AB$中点的横坐标是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;C:Curve;Expression(C)=(y^2=4*x);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),C);PointOnCurve(Focus(C),LineSegmentOf(A,B));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 10

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，左右顶点分别为$A$、$B$，点$P$为该双曲线上一点，若$|O P|=|O F|$, $\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}+\overrightarrow{O F} \cdot \overrightarrow{O A}=0$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F: Point;RightFocus(G) = F;A: Point;B: Point;LeftVertex(G) = A;RightVertex(G) = B;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);O: Origin;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, P)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F));DotProduct(VectorOf(O, F), VectorOf(O, A)) + DotProduct(VectorOf(P, A), VectorOf(P, B)) = 0

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，左顶点为$A$，上顶点为$B$. 若点$F$到直线$A B$的距离为$\frac{2 b}{\sqrt{17}}$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F;LeftVertex(G) = A;UpperVertex(G) = B;Distance(F, LineOf(A,B)) = (2*b)/sqrt(17)

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点为$F$，抛物线上一点$P$，若$|P F|=5$，则$\triangle P O F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G:Parabola;P: Point;O: Origin;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 5

text: 已知$A$、$B$为椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右顶点，点$P$在$E$上，在$\triangle A P B$中，$\tan \angle P A B=\frac{1}{2}$ , $\tan \angle P B A=\frac{2}{9}$，则椭圆$E$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftVertex(E) = A;RightVertex(E) = B;PointOnCurve(P, E);Tan(AngleOf(P, A, B)) = 1/2;Tan(AngleOf(P, B, A)) = 2/9

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点，若椭圆上存在点$A$，使$\angle F_{1} A F_{2}=90^{\circ}$且$|A F_{1}|=3|A F_{2}|$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;A: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, G);AngleOf(F1, A, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F1)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2))

text: 过点$P(1,3)$作两条互相垂直的直线$l_{1}$和$l_{2}$，它们分别与$x$轴，$y$轴交于$A$、$B$两点，则线段$A B$中点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: l1:Line;l2:Line;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (1, 3);PointOnCurve(P,l1);PointOnCurve(P,l2);Intersection(l1,xAxis)=A;Intersection(l2,yAxis)=B;IsPerpendicular(l1,l2)

text: 过点$M(4 , 0)$的直线$l$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$两渐近线分别交于不同两点$A$、$B$、$O$为原点，若该双曲线的离心率为$2$，则$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (4, 0);PointOnCurve(M,l);L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(G)={L1,L2};Intersection(l,L1)=A;Intersection(l,L2)=B;Negation(A=B);Eccentricity(G) = 2

text: 已知双曲线过点$(4, \sqrt{3})$，且渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{1}{2} x$，则该双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (4, sqrt(3));Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = (pm*1/2)*x);PointOnCurve(H, G)

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{5-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{k-3}=1$表示双曲线，则$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(5 - k) + y^2/(k - 3) = 1);k: Number

text: $\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的离心率是?准线方程是?
fact_expressions: G:Curve;Expression(G)=(x^2/25+y^2/9=1)

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$E$: $\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点，$E$上的点$P$到原点的距离为$b$，且$\sin \angle P F_{2} F_{1}=3 \sin \angle P F_{1} F_{2}$，则双曲线$E$的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(E) = {F1, F2};E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, E);O: Origin;Distance(P, O) = b;Sin(AngleOf(P, F2, F1)) = 3*Sin(AngleOf(P, F1, F2))

text: 已知$P$是椭圆上的一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的两个焦点，$\angle P F_{1} F_{2}=90^{\circ}$, $\angle P F_{2} F_{1}=30^{\circ}$, 则椭圆的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree);AngleOf(P, F2, F1) = ApplyUnit(30, degree)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ ,过$F_{2}$作$x$轴的垂线与椭圆的一个交点为$P$，若$\angle F_{1} PF_{2}=45^{\circ}$，则椭圆的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;e: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(F2, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, xAxis);OneOf(Intersection(Z, G)) = P;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(45, degree);Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{2-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{2 k-1}=1$表示焦点在$y$轴上的椭圆，则实数$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;k: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/(2 - k) + y^2/(2*k - 1) = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis)

text: 若直线$l$过抛物线$y^{2}=4(x+1)$的焦点，并且与$x$轴垂直，则$l$被抛物线截得的线段长为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),l) = True;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*(x + 1));IsPerpendicular(l,xAxis) = True

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+y^{2}=1  (m>1)$的长轴长是短轴长的$2$倍，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Real;m>1;Expression(G) = (y^2 + x^2/m = 1);Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 2*Length(MinorAxis(G))

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的右焦点为$F$，则以$F$为焦点的抛物线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/5 + y^2/4 = 1);F: Point;RightFocus(H) = F;G: Parabola;Focus(G) = F

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的右焦点重合，则实数$p$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Real;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (x^2/6 + y^2/2 = 1);Focus(G) = RightFocus(H)

text: 已知线段$A B$长等于$10$，两端点$A$、$B$分别在$x$轴，$y$轴上移动，若点$M$在线段$A B$上，且$\overrightarrow{A M}+4 \overrightarrow{B M}=0$，则点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;Length(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=10;Endpoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))={A,B};PointOnCurve(A,xAxis);PointOnCurve(B,yAxis);PointOnCurve(M,LineSegmentOf(A,B));VectorOf(A, M) + 4*VectorOf(B, M) = 0

text: 以双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的右焦点为圆心，且被其渐近线截得的弦长为$6$的圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/16 = 1);RightFocus(G) = Center(H);Length(InterceptChord(Asymptote(G),H))=6

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$M$到其焦点的距离为$5$，则点$M$到$y$轴的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;Distance(M, Focus(G)) = 5
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/6 + y^2/m = 1);m: Number;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (0,2)

text: 过抛物线$x^{2}=\frac{1}{8} y$的焦点作直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，线段$A B$的中点$M$的纵坐标为$2$，则线段$A B$长为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;B: Point;A: Point;M:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = y/8);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=M;YCoordinate(M)=2

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的两个焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$作垂直于$x$轴的直线与椭圆相交，一个交点为$P$，则$|P F_{2}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1,F2};PointOnCurve(F1,H);IsPerpendicular(H,xAxis);OneOf(Intersection(H,G)) = P;IsIntersect(G, H)

text: 直线$l$交椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$于$A$、$B$两点，线段$A B$的中点为$M(1, t)(t \in R)$，直线$l$是线段$A B$的垂直平分线，若$O D \perp l$，$D$为垂足，则$D$点的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;O: Origin;D: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);t: Real;Coordinate(M) = (1, t);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M;PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = l;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, D), l);FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(O, D), l) = D

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过准线上一点$N$作$N F$的垂线交$y$轴于点$M$，若抛物线$C$上存在点$E$，满足$2 \overrightarrow{N E}=\overrightarrow{N M}+\overrightarrow{N F}$，则$\Delta M N F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(N, Directrix(C));N: Point;L: Line;PointOnCurve(N, L) ;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(N, F), L);Intersection(L, yAxis) = M;M: Point;PointOnCurve(E, C);E: Point;2*VectorOf(N, E) = VectorOf(N, F) + VectorOf(N, M)

text: 点$A$、$B$为椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$长轴的端点，$C$、$D$为椭圆$E$短轴的端点，动点$M$满足$\frac{|M A|}{|M B|}=2$，若$\triangle M A B$面积的最大值为$8$，$\Delta M C D$面积的最小值为$1$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;D: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Endpoint(MajorAxis(E)) = {A, B};Endpoint(MinorAxis(E)) = {C, D};Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, A))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, B)) = 2;Max(TriangleOf(M, A, B)) = 8;Min(TriangleOf(M, C, D)) = 1

text: 抛物线$y=x^{2}$上的点到直线$x-y-2=0$的最短距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);H: Line;Expression(H) = (x - y - 2 = 0)

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$M$到焦点的距离为$3$，则点$M$到$y$轴的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;M: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(M, G);Distance(M, Focus(G)) = 3

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，点$A(0,2)$. 若线段$F A$的中点$B$在抛物线上，则$F$到$l$的距离为?$|F B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;l: Line;Directrix(G) = l;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 2);B: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(F, A)) = B;PointOnCurve(B, G)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，经过原点的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\angle A F B \geq 150^{\circ}$，则$C$的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(O,G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};AngleOf(A, F, B) >= ApplyUnit(150, degree);O:Origin

text: 已知点$P$在双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的右支上，$A(0,2)$，动点$B$满足$|A B|=2$ , $F$是双曲线的右焦点，则$|P F|-|P B|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0, 2);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2;RightFocus(G) = F

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$左焦点$F_{1}$的直线交双曲线的左支于$M$，$N$两点，$F_{2}$为其右焦点，则$|MF_{2}|+| NF_{2}|-|MN|$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;M: Point;F2: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/3 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F2;F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Intersection(H, LeftPart(G)) = {M, N}
query_expressions: Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F2)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, F2)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N))

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左焦点$F(-c, 0)(c>0)$作圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=\frac{a^{2}}{4}$的切线，切点为$E$，延长$F E$交双曲线右支于点$P$，若$\overrightarrow{O E}=\frac{1}{2}(\overrightarrow{O F}+\overrightarrow{O P})$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的右焦点作一条斜率为$2$的直线与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点,$O$为坐标原点, 则$\triangle O A B$的面积为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=8 y$，过点$M(x_{0} , y_{0})$作直线$M A $, $M B$与抛物线$C$分别切于点$A$、$B$，且以$A B$为直径的圆过点$M$，则$y_{0}$的值为?

text: 过原点的直线$l$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=-1$交于两点，则直线$l$的斜率的取值范围是?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上一点$P$到两焦点的距离之积为$m$，则当$m$取最大值时，点$P$的坐标为?

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的左焦点，点$Q$在直线$l_{1}$: $y=-\frac{b}{a} x$上，点$P$在直线$l_{2}$: $y=\frac{b}{a} x$上，$O$为坐标原点，$2 \overrightarrow{F Q}=\overrightarrow{F P}$，$\overrightarrow{F P} \cdot \overrightarrow{O Q}=0$，$\Delta F O P$的面积为$\sqrt{3}$，则双曲线$C$的标准方程为?

text: $O$为坐标原点，$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 \sqrt{2} x$的焦点，$P$为$C$上一点，若$|P F|=4 \sqrt{2}$，则$\Delta P O F$的面积?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M(1, m)$到其焦点的距离为$5$，双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的左顶点为$A$，若双曲线$C$的一条渐近线与直线$A M$垂直，则双曲线$C$的焦距为?

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m+3}-\frac{y^{2}}{1-m}=1$表示焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线，则实数$m$的取值范围为?

text: 设$A$, $B$分别为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右顶点和上顶点，已知椭圆$C$过点$P(2 , 1)$，当线段$AB$长最小时椭圆$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$M$在$C$的左支上，过点$M$作$C$的一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$N$，则当$|M F_{2}|+|M N|$取最小值$10$时，$\Delta F_{1} N F_{2}$面积的最大值为?

text: 过点$P(-2,0)$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$A$、$B$在第一象限，且点$A$为线段$P B$的中点，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;B: Point;P: Point;A: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);Coordinate(P) = (-2, 0);PointOnCurve(P, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Quadrant(A) = 1;Quadrant(B) = 1;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,B)) = A

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1  (m n \neq 0)$的离心率为$2$，则$\frac{m}{n}$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;n: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2;Negation(m*n=0)

text: 方程$\frac{x^{2}}{16-m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m+4}=1$表示焦点在$y$轴上的椭圆，则实数$m$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/(16 - m) + y^2/(m + 4) = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$短轴端点为$A$，$B$. 点$P$是椭圆上除$A$ , $B$外任意一点，则直线$PA$，$PB$的斜率之积为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;A: Point;G: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Endpoint(MinorAxis(G)) = {A, B};PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(P = A);Negation(P = B)

text: 动点$P$到点$F(2,0)$的距离与它到直线$x+2=0$的距离相等,则点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Line;F: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x + 2 = 0);Coordinate(F) = (2, 0);Distance(P, F) = Distance(P, G)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点的直线$x-my+m=0$与抛物线交于$A$ , $B$两点，且$\triangle OAB$($O$为坐标原点）的面积为$2 \sqrt{2}$，则$m^{6}+m^{4}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;H: Line;Expression(H) = (m - m*y + x = 0);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);m: Number;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;Area(TriangleOf(O, A, B)) = 2*sqrt(2)

text: 经过双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左焦点$F_{1}$作倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{6}$的直线$A B$，分别交双曲线的左、右支为点$A$、$B$. 求弦长$A B$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(F1, LineOf(A, B)) = True;Inclination(LineOf(A, B)) = pi/6;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(LineOf(A, B), LeftPart(G)) = A;Intersection(LineOf(A, B), RightPart(G)) = B;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G) = True

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$的左、右焦点，点$P$在椭圆上，且满足$P F_{1}=2 P F_{2}$ , $\angle PF_{1} F_{2}=30^{\circ}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);LineSegmentOf(P, F1) = 2*LineSegmentOf(P, F2);AngleOf(P,F1,F2)=ApplyUnit(30,degree)

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=-8 x$上一点$P$到$y$轴的距离是$4$，则点$P$到该抛物线焦点的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -8*x);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, yAxis) = 4

text: 已知$A$、$B$为坐标平面上的两个定点，且$| A B |=2$，动点$P$到$A$、$B$两点距离之和为常数$2$，则点$P$的轨迹是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2;P: Point;Distance(P, A) + Distance(P, B) = 2

text: 双曲线$2 m x^{2}-m y^{2}=2$的一条准线是$y=1$，则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (2*(m*x^2) - m*y^2 = 2);m: Number;Expression(OneOf(Directrix(G))) = (y = 1)

text: 已知点$F$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，点$A(2 , y_{1})$,$B(\frac{1}{2} , y_{2})$分别是抛物线上位于第一、四象限的点，若$|A F|=10$，则$|y_{1}-y_{2}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;A: Point;B: Point;y1: Number;y2: Number;Coordinate(A) = (2, y1);Coordinate(B) = (1/2, y2);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);Quadrant(A) = 1;Quadrant(B) = 4;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 10

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，点$P$在双曲线的右支上，且$|P F_{2}|=|F_{1} F_{2}|$, $F_{2}$到直线$P F_{1}$的距离等于双曲线的实轴长，该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));Distance(F2, LineOf(P, F1)) = Length(RealAxis(G))

text: 过椭圆$x^{2}+2 y^{2}=2$的焦点引一条倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，椭圆的中心为$O$，则$\triangle A O B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 2*y^2 = 2);H: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H) = True;Inclination(H) = ApplyUnit(45, degree);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H,G) = {A,B};O: Origin;Center(G) = O

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1$的左、右焦点，点$A$、$B$在椭圆上，若$\overrightarrow {F_{1} A}=5 \overrightarrow{F_{2} B}$，则点$A$的坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F2: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);VectorOf(F1, A) = 5*VectorOf(F2, B)

text: 5. 直线 $l$ 过抛物线 $y^{2}=4 x$ 的焦点 $F$ 交抛物线于 $A$，$B$ 两个点，则 $\frac{1}{|F A|}+\frac{1}{|F B|}=$？
fact_expressions: l: Line;E: Parabola;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(E) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, E) = {A, B}

text: 已知曲线$C$:$|x|+|y|=m(m>0)$, 曲线$C$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$有四个不同的交点，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;C: Curve;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);m>0;Expression(C) = (Abs(x) + Abs(y) = m);NumIntersection(C, G) = 4

text: 已知$A(1,2)$,$B(-1,2)$, 动点$P$满足$\overrightarrow{A P} \perp \overrightarrow{B P}$, 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线与动点$P$的轨迹没有公共点，则双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (1, 2);Coordinate(B) = (-1, 2);IsPerpendicular(VectorOf(A,P),VectorOf(B,P));NumIntersection(Asymptote(G),Locus(P))=0

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，点$P$在双曲线上，且$F P_{1} \perp F P_{2}$，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(F, P1), LineSegmentOf(F, P2))

text: 已知双曲线的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{20}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$，那么它的焦距是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/20 - y^2/5 = 1)

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{14}=10$的左右焦点，过$F_{1}$的直线$l$与双曲线$\Gamma$左右两支分别交于$P$、$Q$两点，且$|P Q|=|Q F_{2}|$，则$\cos \angle P F_{1} F_{2}$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Gamma: Hyperbola;P: Point;Q: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/2 - y^2/14 = 10);LeftFocus(Gamma) = F1;RightFocus(Gamma) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l,LeftPart(Gamma))=P;Intersection(l,RightPart(Gamma))=Q;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F2))

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$，过点$N(2,0)$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，$\frac{|A N|}{|B N|}=2$，则线段$A B$长为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);N: Point;Coordinate(N) = (2, 0);H: Line;PointOnCurve(N, H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, N))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, N)) = 2

text: 已知椭圆$\Gamma$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$A$、$B$在椭圆$\Gamma$上，$\overrightarrow{A F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{1} F_{2}}=0$且$\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}=\lambda \overrightarrow{F_{2} B}$，则当$\lambda \in[2,3]$时，椭圆的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;lambda:Number;In(lambda,[2,3]);Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/a^2 + y^2/b^2 = 1);LeftFocus(Gamma) = F1;RightFocus(Gamma) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, Gamma);PointOnCurve(B, Gamma);DotProduct(VectorOf(A,F1),VectorOf(F1,F2))=0;VectorOf(A,F2)=lambda*VectorOf(F2,B)

text: 斜率为$1$的直线与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Slope(H)=1;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=x$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = x)

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=-8 y$的准线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = -8*y)

text: 直线$x+y+2=0$分别与$x$轴，$y$轴交于$A$、$B$两点，点$P$在抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上，则$\triangle A B P$面积的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x + y + 2 = 0);Intersection(H,xAxis) = A;Intersection(H,yAxis) = B;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 以直线$3 x-4 y-12=0$与$y$轴的交点为焦点的抛物线标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C:Parabola;H: Line;Expression(H) = (3*x - 4*y - 12 = 0);Intersection(H,yAxis)=Focus(C)

text: 双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{7}=1$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/7 + y^2/4 = 1)

text: 点$P$在双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右支上，其左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$, 直线$P F_{1}$与以坐标原点$O$为圆心、$a$为半径的圆相切于点$A$，线段$P F_{1}$的垂直平分线恰好过点$F_{2}$，则该双曲线的渐近线的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;O: Origin;H: Circle;A: Point;TangentPoint(LineOf(P, F1), H) = A;Center(H) = O;Radius(H) = a;PointOnCurve(F2, PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)))

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是椭圆上一点，若$P F_{1}=2 P F_{2}$，则$P$到左准线的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,G);LineSegmentOf(P, F1) = 2*LineSegmentOf(P, F2)

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a, b>0)$的左焦点，$B_{1} B_{2}$是双曲线的虚轴，$M$是$O B_{1}$的 中点，过$F$、$M$的直线交双曲线$C$于$A$，且$F M=2 M A$, 则双曲线$C$离心率是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = ( -y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1 );F: Point ;LeftFocus(C) = F;B1: Point;B2: Point;O: Origin;LineSegmentOf(B1,B2) = ImageinaryAxis(C);M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(O,B1)) = M;Line_1: Line ;A: Point;PointOnCurve(F, Line_1) = True;PointOnCurve(M,Line_1) = True;Intersection(Line_1, C) = A;LineSegmentOf(F,M) = 2*LineSegmentOf(M,A)

text: 如果直线$x+y+a=0$与圆$x^{2} + (y + \sqrt{2})^{2}=1$有公共点，则实数$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Circle;H: Line;a: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2 + (y + sqrt(2))^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (a + x + y = 0);IsIntersect(H, G)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=100 x$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 100*x)

text: 已知$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$上一动点，$O$为坐标原点，则线段$O P$中点$Q$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;P: Point;Q:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/8 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(O,P))=Q

text: 直线$l$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$|A B|=6$，则$A B$中点到$y$轴距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 6

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$作倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线交双曲线右支于$M$点，若$M F_{2}$垂直于$x$轴，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;M: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Inclination(H)=ApplyUnit(45,degree);Intersection(H, RightPart(G)) = M;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M,F2),xAxis)

text: 设抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，点$M$在$C$上，点$N$在$l$上，且$\overrightarrow{F N}=\lambda \overrightarrow{F M}(\lambda>0)$, 若$|M F|=\frac{4}{3}$，则$\lambda$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;F: Point;N: Point;M: Point;l: Line;lambda:Number;lambda>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;Directrix(C) = l;PointOnCurve(M, C);PointOnCurve(N, l);VectorOf(F, N) = lambda*VectorOf(F, M);Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = 4/3

text: 若双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm 3 x$，它的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 \sqrt{10} x$的焦点重合，则双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*sqrt(10)*x);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(3*x));OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H)

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$且斜率为$1$的直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点. 则$|A B|$的值等于?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Slope(G) = 1;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B}

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=8 y$的焦点到双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1$的渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2/3 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 = 8*y)

text: 直线$l$的方程为$y=x+3$，在$l$上任取一点$P$，若过点$P$且以双曲线$12 x^{2}-4 y^{2}=3$的焦点作椭圆的焦点，那么具有最短长轴的椭圆方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (12*x^2 - 4*y^2 = 3);Expression(l) = (y = x + 3);PointOnCurve(P, l);PointOnCurve(P, H);Focus(G) = Focus(H);WhenMin(MajorAxis(H))

text: 若$A$、$B$分别是椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{m}+y^{2}=1(m>1)$短轴上的两个顶点，点$P$是椭圆上异于$A$、$B$的任意一点，若直线$A P$与直线$B P$的斜率之积为$-\frac{m}{4}$ ,则椭圆$E$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;E: Ellipse;Expression(E) = (y^2 + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;m > 1;Vertex(MinorAxis(E)) = {A, B};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, E) = True;Negation(P = A);Negation(P = B);Slope(LineOf(A, P))*Slope(LineOf(B, P)) = -m/4

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点为$F$，若抛物线上一点$P$到$x$轴的距离为$2$，则$P F$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, xAxis) = 2

text: 直线$l$: $y=k x+2$与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1$有两个公共点则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(l)=(y=k*x+2);NumIntersection(l,C)=2;k:Number

text: 已知双曲线$C$的焦点、实轴端点恰好是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的长轴端点、焦点，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(x^2/25+y^2/16=1);Focus(C)=Endpoint(MajorAxis(G));Endpoint(RealAxis(C))=Focus(G)

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 px$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的右焦点重合，则该抛物线的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);Focus(G) = RightFocus(H)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的渐近线与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-4 x+2=0$有交点，则该双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (-4*x + x^2 + y^2 + 2 = 0);IsIntersect(Asymptote(G),H)

text: 已知点$A$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左顶点，点$B$为椭圆上任意一点，$y$轴上有一点$C(0,4)$，则三角形$A B C$的面积的最大值是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);LeftVertex(G) = A;B: Point;PointOnCurve(B, G) = True;PointOnCurve(C, yAxis) = True;C: Point;Coordinate(C) = (0, 4)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1  (m>0)$的一个焦点为$(4 , 0)$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;m>0;Expression(G)=(y^2/9 + x^2/m^2 = 1);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G)))=(4,0)

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的右焦点，$P$是$C$左支上一点，$A(0,6 \sqrt{6})$，当$\triangle A P F$周长最小时，该三角形的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/8 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0, 6*sqrt(6));RightFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, LeftPart(C));WhenMin(Perimeter(TriangleOf(A,P,F)))

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=-2 p y(p>0)$的焦点坐标为$F(0,-3)$，则直线$y=x$被抛物线截得的弦的中点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = -2*p*y);p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (0, -3);Focus(G) = F;H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = x)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率$e=2$，则其渐近线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e ;e: Number;e = 2

text: 设$O$为坐标原点，抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$、$P$为抛物线上一点，若$|P F|=3$，则$\triangle O P F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;O: Origin;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(P,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 3

text: 设$A B$是椭圆$\Gamma$的长轴，点$C$在$\Gamma$上，且$\angle C B A=\frac{\pi}{4}$，若$A B=4$ , $B C=\sqrt{2}$，则$\Gamma$的两个焦点之间的距离为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;MajorAxis(Gamma) = LineSegmentOf(A, B);PointOnCurve(C, Gamma);AngleOf(C, B, A) = pi/4;LineSegmentOf(A, B) = 4;LineSegmentOf(B, C) = sqrt(2);Focus(Gamma) = {F1, F2}

text: 抛物线$x=\frac{1}{4 m} y^{2}$的焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x = y^2/(4*m))

text: 已知圆$M$:$(x-4)^{2}+y^{2}=169$，圆$N$:$(x+4)^{2}+y^{2}=9$，动圆$P$和圆$M$相内切，和圆$N$相外切，则动圆圆心$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: M: Circle;Expression(M) = (y^2 + (x - 4)^2 = 169);N: Circle;Expression(N) = (y^2 + (x + 4)^2 = 9);P: Circle;IsInTangent(P,M) = True;IsOutTangent(P,N) = True;P1: Point;Center(P) = P1

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的两个焦点，$A$、$B$分别是该椭圆的左顶点和上顶点，点$P$在线段$A B$上，则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/6 + y^2/3 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};A: Point;B: Point;LeftVertex(G) = A;UpperVertex(G) = B;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = True

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的两个焦点，过$F_{1}$的直线与椭圆$C$交于$M$、$N$两点，则$\Delta F_{2} M N$的周长为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Line;F2: Point;M: Point;N: Point;F1: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/3 + y^2/4 = 1);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(F1,G);Intersection(G,C) = {M,N}

text: 已知点$A(-1,1)$和椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$ , $M$是椭圆$C$上的动点，$F$是椭圆$C$的右焦点，则$|M A|+2|M F|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-1, 1);C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, C) = True;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F

text: 方程$16 x^{2}+k y^{2}=16$表示椭圆，则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(k*y^2 + 16*x^2 = 16);k:Number

text: 双曲线$C$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$有公共焦点，且$C$的一条渐近线方程为$x+\sqrt{3} y=0$，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);Focus(C) = Focus(G);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (x + sqrt(3)*y = 0)

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$，则实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/m = 1);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(2*x))

text:
过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x,(p>0)$焦点的直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，$|A B|=3$，且$A B$中点的
纵坐标为$\frac{1}{2}$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 3;YCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = 1/2

C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(F2, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, A)) = 1/2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, B))

text: 抛物线$y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/2)

text: 点$M(-3,0)$，点$N(3,0)$，动点$P$满足$|P M|=10-|P N|$，则点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: M: Point;N: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-3, 0);Coordinate(N) = (3, 0);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M)) = 10 - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, N))

text: 椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左焦点为$F_{1}$，直线$x=m$与椭圆$E$交于$A$、$B$两点.当$\Delta F_{1} A B$的周长最大时，则$m$的值等于?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;G: Line;m: Number;F1: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(E) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Expression(G) = (x = m);LeftFocus(E) = F1;Intersection(G, E) = {A, B};WhenMax(Perimeter(TriangleOf(F1,A,B)))

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆方程为$(m-1) x^{2}+(3 m-4) y^{2}=m$，则$m$的范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2*(m - 1) + y^2*(3*m - 4) = m)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$离心率$e=\frac{1}{2}$，过椭圆中心的直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点 ($A$在第一象限)，过$A$作$x$轴垂线交椭圆于点$C$，过$A$作直线$A P$垂直$A B$交椭圆于点$P$，连接$B P$交$A C$于点$Q$，则$\frac{A Q}{Q C}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;e: Number;H: Line;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;C: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e ;e = 1/2;PointOnCurve(Center(G), H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Quadrant(A) = 1;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(A, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, xAxis);Intersection(Z, G) = C;PointOnCurve(A, LineOf(A, P));IsPerpendicular(LineOf(A, P), LineSegmentOf(A, B));Intersection(LineOf(A, P), G) = P;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(B, P), LineSegmentOf(A, C)) = Q
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/25 = 1)

text: 已知$A(2,1)$, $B(2,-1)$ , $O$为坐标原点，动点$P(x, y)$满足$\overrightarrow{O P}=m \overrightarrow{O A}+n \overrightarrow{O B}$，其中$m, n \in \mathbf{R}$，且$m^{2}+n^{2}=\frac{1}{2}$，则动点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;x1:Number;y1:Number;m:Real;n:Real;Coordinate(A) = (2, 1);Coordinate(B) = (2, -1);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);VectorOf(O, P) = m*VectorOf(O, A) + n*VectorOf(O, B);m^2 + n^2 = 1/2

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$ ,$F_{2}$，点$P$在双曲线上且满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$\triangle F_{1} PF_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Focus(G) ={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(F1,P,F2)=ApplyUnit(60,degree)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点重合，左准线方程为$x=-1$，设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$C$的左、右两个焦点，$P$为右支上任意一点，则$\frac{P F_{1}^{2}}{P F_{2}}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(C)=Focus(G);Expression(LeftDirectrix(C))=(x=-1);P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(C))

text: 已知圆$C$的方程$(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=1$,$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上一点，过$P$作圆的两条切线，切点为$A$、$B$，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Circle;Expression(C) = (y^2 + (x - 1)^2 = 1);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);L1: Line;L2: Line;TangentPoint(L1, C) = A;TangentPoint(L2, C) = B;A: Point;B: Point;TangentOfPoint(P, C) = {L1, L2}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的焦距为$2 \sqrt{5}$，且双曲线的实轴长是虚轴长的$2$倍，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;FocalLength(G) = 2*sqrt(5);Length(RealAxis(G)) = 2*Length(ImageinaryAxis(G))

text: 双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{16}=1$的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/16 + y^2/4 = 1)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(a>9)$长轴的一个顶点到直线$x-\sqrt{3} y=0$的距离不小于$2$，则椭圆的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/9 + x^2/a = 1);a: Number;a>9;H: Line;Expression(H) = (x - sqrt(3)*y = 0);Negation(Distance(OneOf(Vertex(MajorAxis(G))),H) < 2)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点$F$作直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=\frac{25}{12}$,  $| A F|<| B F |$, 则$|A F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 25/12;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) < Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F))

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$一个焦点坐标为$(m, 0)  (m>0)$，且点$P(m, 2m)$ 在双曲线上，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G))) = (m, 0);Coordinate(P) = (m, 2*m);PointOnCurve(P, G);m:Number;m>0

text: 如果双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{7}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的焦点在$x$轴上，焦距为$8$，那么实数$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/7 - y^2/m = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);FocalLength(G) = 8

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上有一点$M$到右准线的距离是$\frac{20}{3}$，则点$M$到左焦点的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);PointOnCurve(M, G);Distance(M, RightDirectrix(G)) = 20/3

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线的虚轴长等于半焦距，则双曲线的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis) = True;Length(ImageinaryAxis(G)) = HalfFocalLength(G)

text: 设过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上任意一点$P$(异于原点$O$) 的直线与抛物线$y^{2}=8 p x(p>0)$交于$A$、$B$两点，直线$O P$与抛物线$y^{2}=8 p x(p>0)$的另一个交点为$Q$，则$\frac{S_{\triangle A B Q}}{S_{\triangle A B O}}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;P: Point;O: Origin;Negation(P=O);PointOnCurve(P, G);H: Line;PointOnCurve(P, H);Z: Parabola;Expression(Z) = (y^2 = 8*p*x);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, Z)={A, B};Q: Point;Intersection(LineOf(O,P), Z)={P, Q}

text: $P$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$右支上一点,直线$l$是双曲线$C$的一条渐近线,$P$在$l$上的射影为$Q$、$F_{1}$是双曲线$C$的左焦点,则$|P F_{1}|+|P Q|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;Q: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(C));OneOf(Asymptote(C))=l;Projection(P,l)=Q;LeftFocus(C)=F1

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{3} x$，则双曲线的焦点为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;b>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x)

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的右顶点为$A$，右焦点为$F$，过点$F$平行于双曲线的一条渐近线的直线与双曲线交于点$B$，则$\triangle A F B$的面积为?

text: 椭圆中心在原点，且经过定点$(2,-3)$，其一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点重合，则该椭圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;Center(H) = O;H: Ellipse;PointOnCurve(I, H);I: Point;Coordinate(I) = (2, -3);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);OneOf(Focus(H)) = Focus(G)

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{k+8}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的离心率$e=\frac{1}{3}$，则$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;k: Number;e: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(k + 8) + y^2/9 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e ;e = 1/3

text: 动点$P(x, y)$到点$F(3,0)$的距离比它到直线$x+2=0$的距离大$1$，则动点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;P: Point;F: Point;x1:Number;y1:Number;Expression(G) = (x + 2 = 0);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(F) = (3, 0);Distance(P, F) = Distance(P, G) + 1
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 3*y^2 = 1)

text: 经过点$M(2 \sqrt{3} , 2 \sqrt{5})$且与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$有相同渐近线的双曲线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;C:Hyperbola;M: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2/2 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (2*sqrt(3), 2*sqrt(5));Asymptote(G) = Asymptote(C);PointOnCurve(M,C)

text: 已知$M$为抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点，$F$为抛物线焦点，过点$M$作准线$l$的垂线，垂足为$E$. 若$|E O|=|M F|$，点$M$的横坐标为$3$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;E: Point;O: Origin;M: Point;F: Point;l: Line;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));PointOnCurve(M, G);Focus(G) = F;L:Line;PointOnCurve(M, L);IsPerpendicular(L, l);FootPoint(L, l)=E;Abs(LineSegmentOf(E, O)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F));XCoordinate(M) = 3;Directrix(G)=l

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}=1$的两条渐近线互相垂直，那么该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/b^2 - y^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;l1: Line;l2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {l1, l2};IsPerpendicular(l1, l2)

text: 如果双曲线$5 x^{2}-4 y^{2}=20$上的一点$P$到双曲线右焦点的距离是$3$，那么$P$点到左准线的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (5*x^2 - 4*y^2 = 20);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;Distance(P, RightFocus(G)) = 3

text: 设$F(0,-3)$是椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点，点$A(0,2)$，若椭圆上存在点$P$满足$|P A|+|P F|=9$，则椭圆离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (0, -3);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 2);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 9

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的中心为顶点，以椭圆的左准线为准线的抛物线与椭圆右准线交于$A$、$B$两点,则$|A B|$的值为?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);G: Parabola;Center(H) = Vertex(G);LeftDirectrix(H) = Directrix(G);Intersection(G,RightDirectrix(H)) = {A,B};A: Point;B: Point

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/5 = 1)

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点为焦点，离心率为$2$的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(G)=Focus(H);Eccentricity(G)=2

text: 设$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上的点,$P$到该椭圆左焦点的距离为$2$则$P$到右焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, LeftFocus(G)) = 2

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$过$P(-\sqrt{2},-\sqrt{3})$ , $Q(\frac{\sqrt{15}}{3}, \sqrt{2})$两点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是它的左、右两个焦点，且$M$在此双曲线上，若$\angle F_{1} M F_{2}=120^{\circ}$，则$\Delta F_{1} M F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;Q: Point;F1: Point;M: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (-sqrt(2), -sqrt(3));Coordinate(Q) = (sqrt(15)/3, sqrt(2));PointOnCurve(P,C);PointOnCurve(Q,C);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(M,C);AngleOf(F1, M, F2) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)

text: 双曲线$C_{1}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ ,过$F_{1}$作一条直线$l$交双曲线右支于点$P$ , $PF_{2} \perp x$轴，且$\sin \angle PF_{1} F_{2}=\frac{1}{3}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C1: Hyperbola;Expression(C1) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C1) = F1;RightFocus(C1) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l) = True;Intersection(l, RightPart(C1)) = P;l: Line;P: Point;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F2), xAxis) = True;Sin(AngleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 1/3

text: 已知点$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上任一点，那点$P$到直线$l$: $x+2 y-12=0$的距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;l: Line;Expression(l) = (x + 2*y - 12 = 0)

text: 已知定点$A(0,-2)$，点$B$在圆$C$:$ x^{2}+y^{2}-4 y-32=0$上运动，$C$为圆心，线段$A B$的垂直平分线交$B C$于点$P$，则动点$P$的轨迹$E$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C1: Circle;Expression(C1) = (-4*y + x^2 + y^2 - 32 = 0);B: Point;PointOnCurve(B, C1);A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, -2);C: Point;Center(C1) = C;P: Point;Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A,B)), LineSegmentOf(B, C)) = P;Locus(P) = E;E: Curve

text: 过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F_{1}$作$x$轴的垂线交椭圆于点$P$、$F_{2}$为右焦点，若$\angle F_{1} PF_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Z: Line;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(F1, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, xAxis);Intersection(Z, G) = P;RightFocus(G) = F2;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)

text: 已知抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=8 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线$l$与$E$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A B}=3 \overrightarrow{F B}$ ,则$\frac{1}{|A F|}+\frac{1}{|B F|}$=?$l$的方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 8*x);F: Point;Focus(E) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, E) = {A, B};VectorOf(A,B) = 3*VectorOf(F,B)

text: 过点$M(1,2)$作直线$l$交椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$于$A$、$B$两点，若点$M$恰为线段$A B$的中点，则直线$l$的方程为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, 2);l: Line;PointOnCurve(M, l);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M

text: 抛物线$y=a x^{2}$的准线方程是$y=2$，则$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Number;Expression(G) = (y = a*x^2);Expression(Directrix(G)) = (y = 2)

text: 已知$M$是以$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为焦点的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{7}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上的一点，$O$是坐标原点，若$2 M O=F_{1} F_{2}$，则$\triangle F_{1} MF_{2}$的面积是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;M: Point;F2: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (x^2/7 + y^2/3 = 1);PointOnCurve(M, G);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};2*LineSegmentOf(M, O) = LineSegmentOf(F1, F2)

G: Circle;C:Circle;H: Curve;P: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(H)=(sqrt((x+4)^2+y^2)+sqrt((x-4)^2+y^2)=12);Expression(G) = (y^2 + (x + 4)^2 = 4);Expression(C) = (y^2 + (x - 4)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P,H);PointOnCurve(M, G);PointOnCurve(N, C)

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M(1 , m)$到其焦点的距离为$5$，双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{a}=1$的左顶点为$A$，若双曲线的一条渐近线与直线$A M$垂直，则实数$a$=?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (1, m);m: Number;PointOnCurve(M, H);Distance(M, Focus(H)) = 5;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/a = 1);a: Real;A: Point;LeftVertex(G) = A;IsPerpendicular(OneOf(Asymptote(G)), LineOf(A, M))

text: 已知直线$x-y=2$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，那么线段$AB$的中点坐标是?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (x - y = 2);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 双曲线$8 x^{2}-y^{2}=8$的右焦点到右准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (8*x^2 - y^2 = 8)

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 a x  (a \neq 0)$的准线与圆$(x-3)^{2}+y^{2}=16$相切，则实数$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Real;H: Circle;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(a*x));Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 3)^2 = 16);IsTangent(Directrix(G),H);Negation(a=0)

text: 过双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右顶点作$x$轴的垂线与$C$的一条渐近线相交于$A$. 若以$C$的右焦点为圆心、半径为$4$的圆经过$A$、$O$两点（$O$为坐标原点），则双曲线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;A: Point;O:Origin;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);L:Line;PointOnCurve(RightVertex(C),L);IsPerpendicular(xAxis,L);Intersection(L,OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=A;RightFocus(C)=Center(G);Radius(G)=4;PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(O,G)

text: 如果方程$\frac{x^{2}}{a-6}+\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}=1$表示双曲线，则实数$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(a-6) + y^2/a^2 = 1);a: Real

text: 过焦点为$F$的抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P$向其准线作垂线，垂足为$Q$，若$\angle QPF=120^{\circ}$，则$|PF|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Q: Point;P: Point;F: Point;H:Line;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(P,G);PointOnCurve(P,H);IsPerpendicular(H,Directrix(G));FootPoint(H,Directrix(G))=Q;AngleOf(Q, P, F) = ApplyUnit(120, degree)

text: 设$A$、$B$为在双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>a>0)$上两点，$O$为坐标原点. 若$O A \perp O B$，则$\triangle A O B$面积的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;b > a;a > 0;A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);O: Origin;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, A), LineSegmentOf(O, B))

text: 设$O$和$F$分别为抛物线$y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}$的顶点和焦点，过$F$的动直线与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，那么$S_{\triangle O A B}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: O: Point;Vertex(G)=O;F: Point;Focus(G) =F;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/2);H: Line;PointOnCurve(F,H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H,G) = {A, B}

text: 与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{49}+\frac{y^{2}}{24}=1$有相同的焦点且以$y=\pm \frac{4}{3} x$为渐近线的双曲线方程?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/49 + y^2/24 = 1);Focus(G)=Focus(H);Expression(Asymptote(G))=(y=pm*(4/3)*x)

text: 直线$l$与椭圆$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$相交于$P$、$Q$两点，若$O P \perp O Q$($O$为坐标原点），则以$O$点为圆心且与直线$l$相切的圆方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Gamma: Ellipse;H: Circle;O: Origin;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(Gamma)=(x^2/4+y^2/2=1);Intersection(l,Gamma) = {P, Q};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, P), LineSegmentOf(O, Q));Center(H)=O;IsTangent(l,H)

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点$F$和$A(1,2)$，点$P$为抛物线上的动点，则$\triangle P A F$的周长取到最小值时点$P$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(G) = F;F: Point;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (1, 2);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;WhenMin(Perimeter(TriangleOf(P,A,F))) = True

text: 直线$y=x+m$与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=\frac{8}{3} \sqrt{2}$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;m: Number;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/4 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = m + x);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = sqrt(2)*(8/3)

text: 动点$P$到直线$x+4=0$的距离减去它到点$M(2,0)$的距离之差等于$2$, 则点$P$的轨迹是?
fact_expressions: G: Line;M: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x + 4 = 0);Coordinate(M) = (2, 0);Distance(P, G)-Distance(P, M)=2

text: 若双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(a>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{2}$，则抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点到$C$的渐近线距离是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/3 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;a>0;Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(2);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x)

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}+n y^{2}=1(n \in R)$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$有相同的焦点，则该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (n*y^2 + x^2 = 1);n: Real;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/6 + y^2/2 = 1);Focus(G) = Focus(H)

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{m+9}=1$的离心率是$\frac{1}{2}$，则$m$的值等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/(m + 9) = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 1/2

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的渐近线的方程为$y=\pm 2 \sqrt{2} x$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*2*sqrt(2)*x)

text: 设双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的虚轴长为$2$，焦距为$2 \sqrt{3}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);Length(ImageinaryAxis(G))=2;FocalLength(G) = 2*sqrt(3)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$与直线$x+2 y-2=0$交于$A$、$B$两点，$|A B|=\sqrt{5}$，且$A B$中点的坐标为$(m, \frac{1}{2})$，则此椭圆的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x + 2*y - 2 = 0);Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = (m, 1/2);Intersection(G, H) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = sqrt(5);m:Number

text: 写出一个渐近线的倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$且焦点在$y$轴上的双曲线标准方程?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Inclination(Asymptote(G))=ApplyUnit(60,degree);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),yAxis)

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$C$:$ y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，$C$的准线与$x$轴交于点$T$、$P$、$Q$是$C$上的两点，直线$T P$与$C$相切，$\overrightarrow{T P}=\lambda \overrightarrow{F Q}(\lambda>0)$，则$\lambda$=?

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的右焦点重合，则$p$=?

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，且倾斜角为$\frac{3}{4} \pi$的直线交抛物线于$P$、$Q$两点，$O$为坐标原点，则$\triangle O P Q$的面积等于?

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$C$: $5 x^{2}-4 y^{2}=m^{2}$的左、右焦点，过$F_{2}$的直线$l$与双曲线$C$的右支交于$A$、$B$两点，且满足$\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}=7 \overrightarrow{F_{2} B}$($O$是坐标原点），则直线$l$的斜率为?

text: 设$F$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{b}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的右焦点，$C$上的一个动点到$F$的最大距离为$d$，若$C$的右准线上存在点$P$，使得$PF=d$，则椭圆$C$的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上的一点$P$到焦点$F_{1}$的距离为$2$, $M$是线段$P F_{1}$的中点,$O$为原点, 则$|O M|$等于?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{4}{3} x$，则该双曲线的离心率$e$为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$，在双曲线的右支上存在一点$P$，使得$|P F_{1}|=3| P F_{2} |$，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围为?

F1: Point;F2: Point;M: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1,F2)) = 6;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F1)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F2)) = 10

text: 已知$M$、$N$是过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$的交点，$O$是坐标原点，且满足$\overrightarrow{M F}=4 \overrightarrow{F N}$, $S_{\triangle O M N}=\sqrt{3}|M N|$，则$p$的值为?

text: 抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的准线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/4)

text: 斜率为$k$的直线$l$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$相交于$A$、$B$两点，点$M(1,1)$为线段$A B$的中点，则$k$=?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过点$F_{1}$的直线与椭圆交于$P$、$Q$两点. 若$\triangle P F_{2} Q$的内切圆与线段$P F_{2}$在其中点处相切，与$P Q$相切于点$F_{1}$，则椭圆的离心率为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左右顶点分别为$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$、$P$为$C$任意一点，其中直线$P A_{1}$的斜率范围为$[-2,-1]$，则直线$P A_{2}$的斜率范围为?

text: 设$O$为坐标原点，双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，点$P$是$C$上在第一象限的点，点$Q(x_{0}, y_{0})$满足$b x_{0}+a y_{0}=0$，且线段$O P$，$Q F$互相垂直平分，则$C$的离心率为?

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(a>0)$的渐近线方程为$3 x \pm 2 y=0$，则$a$的值为?

text: 已知过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$且斜率为$-1$的直线$l$交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 \sqrt{2} x$的焦点，$P$为$C$上一点，若$|P F|=3 \sqrt{2}$，则$\triangle P O F$的面积为?

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率为$2$，过其左支上一点$M$作平行于$x$轴的直线交渐近线于$P$、$Q$两点，若$|P M| \cdot|M Q|=4$，则该双曲线的焦距为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,   b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$, $P$是双曲线上的一点，且$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$, $\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$2 a b$, 则双曲线的离心率$e$=?

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两条渐近线互相垂直，顶点到一条渐近线的距离为$1$，则双曲线的一个焦点到另一条渐近线的距离为?

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A$、$B$、$P$是椭圆上不同于$A$、$B$的一点，设直线$A P$ , $B P$的斜率分别为$m$ , $n$ ,则当$\frac{a}{b}(3-\frac{2}{3 m n})+\frac{2}{m n}+3(\ln |m|+\ln |n|)$取得最小值时，椭圆$C$的离心率是?

text: 双曲线的焦点在$x$轴上，实轴长为$6$，虚轴长为$8$，则双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Length(RealAxis(G)) = 6;Length(ImageinaryAxis(G)) = 8

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m+9}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率是$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$，则实数$m$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m + 9) + y^2/m = 1);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(3)/3

text: 与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{5}-y^{2}=1$共焦点，且经过点$(0,-2)$的椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;I: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 - y^2 = 1);Coordinate(I) = (0, -2);Focus(G)=Focus(H);PointOnCurve(I, H)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在椭圆上，若$|P F_{1}|=4$，则$\angle F_{1} PF_{2}$的大小为?$\triangle F_{1} PF_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 4

text: 已知双曲线的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$，则双曲线的焦点到渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1)

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{3}$， 当$a=1$时，直线$x-y+m=0$与双曲线$C$交于不同的两点$A$、$B$，且线段$A B$的中点在圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=5$上，则$m$的值?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;H: Line;m: Number;B: Point;A: Point;a>0;b>0;a=1;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = 5);Expression(H) = (m + x - y = 0);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(3);Intersection(H, C) = {A, B};PointOnCurve(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)),G);Negation(A=B)

text: 抛物线$y=-\frac{1}{8} x^{2}$的准线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = -x^2/8)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的长轴长为$8$ , $F_{1}$, $F_{2}$是$C$的两个焦点，$P$为$C$上一点，且$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$ , $\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$9$，求椭圆$C$的标准方程?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Length(MajorAxis(C)) = 8;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 9

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，其准线与$x$轴交于点$A$，过$A$作直线$l$与抛物线交于$M$、$N$两点，则$|F M|^{2}+|F N|^{2}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;F: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;Intersection(Directrix(G), xAxis) = A;PointOnCurve(A, l);Intersection(l, G) = {M, N};A:Point

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上有$A$、$B$两点满足$O A \perp O B$，且点$O$到直线$A B$的距离为$c$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);c:Number;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O,A),LineSegmentOf(O,B));Distance(O, LineOf(A,B)) = c

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2/4 = 1)

text: 已知动点$P$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{49}+\frac{y^{2}}{40}=1$上若点$A$的坐标为$(3,0)$,点$M$满足$|\overrightarrow{A M}|=1$,且$\overrightarrow{P M} \cdot \overrightarrow{A M}=0$,则$|\overrightarrow{P M}|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;M: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/49 + y^2/40 = 1);PointOnCurve(P,G);Coordinate(A) = (3, 0);Abs(VectorOf(A, M)) = 1;DotProduct(VectorOf(P, M), VectorOf(A, M)) = 0

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点坐标为$(2,0)$，且椭圆过点$A(2 , 3)$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (2, 3);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(C))) = (2,0);PointOnCurve(A, C)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线$l$: $y=\sqrt{3}(x-2 a)$与双曲线$C$的右支交于点$A$，且与$y$轴交于点$B$. 若$\triangle O B F$的面积为$8 \sqrt{3}$，其中，$O$为坐标原点，则$\frac{|A F|}{|B F|}$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;RightFocus(C) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l) = True;Expression(l) = (y = sqrt(3)*(-2*a + x));A: Point;Intersection(l,RightPart(C)) = A;B: Point;Intersection(l,yAxis) = B;Area(TriangleOf(O, B, F)) = 8*sqrt(3);O: Origin

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$P(2,0)$的直线与该抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，直线$A F$, $B F$分别交抛物线于点$C$、$D$. 若直线$A B$, $C D$的斜率分别为$k_{1}$, $k_{2}$，则$\frac{k_{1}}{k_{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;D: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(P) = (2, 0);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Intersection(LineOf(A, F), G) = C;Intersection(LineOf(B, F), G) = D;Slope(LineOf(A, B)) = k1;Slope(LineOf(C, D)) = k2;k1: Number;k2: Number

text: $\frac{x^{2}}{4-t}+\frac{y^{2}}{t-1}=1$表示双曲线，则实数$t$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) =  (x^2/(4 - t) + y^2/(t - 1) = 1);t: Real

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上的一动点，则点$P$到直线$l_{1}$: $4 x-3 y-7=0$和$l_{2}$: $y=-1$的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);l1: Line;Expression(l1) = (4*x - 3*y - 7 = 0);l2: Line;Expression(l2) = (y = -1)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的离心率为$2$，焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25} + \frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点相同，那么双曲线的顶点坐标为?渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = 2;Focus(G) = Focus(H)

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的两个焦点，若$C$上存在点$P$满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=90^{\circ}$，则$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/m = 1);m: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(90, degree)

text: 已知$M$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点，$F$为其焦点，点$A$在圆$(x-5)^{2}+(y+1)^{2}=1$上，则$|M A|+|M F|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, H) = True;H: Circle;Expression(H) = ((x - 5)^2 + (y + 1)^2 = 1)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的准线与$x$轴相交于点$P$，过点$P$作斜率为$k(k>0)$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，若$|F A|=2|F B|$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);P: Point;Intersection(Directrix(G), xAxis) = P;H: Line;PointOnCurve(P, H);k: Number;Slope(H) = k;k>0;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};F: Point;Focus(G) = F;Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, A)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, B))

text: 设$M$、$N$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$实轴的两个端点，$Q$是双曲线上的一点(异于$M$、$N$两点)，$\angle Q M N=\alpha$, $\angle Q N M=\beta$, 则$\tan \alpha \tan \beta$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;M: Point;N: Point;Endpoint(RealAxis(G)) = {M, N};Q: Point;PointOnCurve(Q, G);Negation(Q=M);Negation(Q=N);alpha: Number;AngleOf(Q, M, N) = alpha;beta: Number;AngleOf(Q, N, M) = beta

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点，点$A$是椭圆上位于第一象限内的一点，$O$为坐标原点，且满足$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O F_{2}}=|\overrightarrow{O F_{2}}|^{2}$，若直线$O A$的方程是$y=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} x$，则椭圆的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;A: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Quadrant(A) = 1;PointOnCurve(A, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, F2)) = Abs(VectorOf(O, F2))^2;Expression(LineOf(O, A)) = (y = x*(sqrt(2)/2))

text: 已知圆$C_{1}$:$(x-2)^{2}+(y-2)^{2}=4$ , $C_{2}$:$(x+2)^{2}+(y+1)^{2}=2$，点$P$是圆$C_{1}$上的一个动点，$A B$是圆$C_{2}$的一条动弦，且$|A B|=2$，则$|\overrightarrow{P A}+\overrightarrow{P B}|$的最大值是?
fact_expressions: C1: Circle;Expression(C1) = ((x - 2)^2 + (y - 2)^2 = 4);C2: Circle;Expression(C2) = ((x + 2)^2 + (y + 1)^2 = 2);A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C1);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), C2);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2

text: 已知点$O$为坐标原点，点$M$在双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-y^{2}=1$上，过点$M$作双曲线$C$的某一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$N$，则$|O N| \cdot|M N|$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;O: Origin;N: Point;M: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(M, C);L:Line;PointOnCurve(M, L);IsPerpendicular(L, OneOf(Asymptote(C)));FootPoint(L, OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=N
F1: Point;F2: Point;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/((75/4)) = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G)  ;AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = pi/3

text: 点$P$在曲线$\sqrt{\frac{x^{2}}{25}}+\sqrt{\frac{y^{2}}{9}}=1$上运动，$E$是曲线第二象限上的定点，$E$的纵坐标是$\frac{15}{8}$ , $O(0,0)$ , $F(4,0)$，若$\overrightarrow{O P}=x \overrightarrow{O F}+y \overrightarrow{O E}$，则$x+y$的最大值是?
fact_expressions: G: Curve;Expression(G) = (sqrt(x^2/25) + sqrt(y^2/9) = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);E: Point;Quadrant(E) = 2;PointOnCurve(E, G);YCoordinate(E) = 15/8;O: Origin;Coordinate(O) = (0, 0);F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (4,0);x1: Number;y1: Number;VectorOf(O, P) = x1*VectorOf(O, F) + y1*VectorOf(O, E)

text: 若$A$点坐标为$(1,1)$ , $F_{1}$是椭圆$5 y^{2}+9 x^{2}=45$的下焦点，点$P$是该椭圆上的动点，则$|P A|+|P F_{1}|$的最大值为$M$，最小值为$N$，则$M-N$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;A: Point;F1: Point;M:Number;N:Number;Expression(G) = (9*x^2 + 5*y^2 = 45);Coordinate(A) = (1, 1);LowerFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(P, G);Max(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))) = M;Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))) = N
G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/36 - y^2/64 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 14

text: 已知$F$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点，过点$F$作直线$l$与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$相切于点$A$，且与双曲线的右支相交于点$B$，若$\overrightarrow{F A}=\frac{1}{3} \overrightarrow{F B}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);LeftFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);TangentPoint(l, H) = A;Intersection(l, RightPart(G)) = B;VectorOf(F, A) = (1/3)*VectorOf(F, B)

text: 已知$F$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$的一个焦点，则点$F$到双曲线$C$的一条渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/3 - y^2 = 1);F: Point;OneOf(Focus(C)) = F

text: 设$F$为抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=16 y$的焦点，直线$l$: $y=-1$，点$A$为$C$上任意一点，过点$A$作$A P \perp l$于$P$，则$|  A P|-| A F| $=?
fact_expressions: F: Point;Focus(C) = F;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 16*y);l: Line;Expression(l) = (y = -1);A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, C) = True;PointOnCurve(A,LineSegmentOf(A, P)) = True;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A,P),l) = True;FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,P),l) = P;P: Point

text: 椭圆$C$上一点$P$到两个焦点$F_{1}(-2,0)$, $F_{2}(2,0)$的距离之和等于$6$，则$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-2, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(P, C);Distance(P, F1) + Distance(P, F2) = 6;Focus(C) = {F1, F2}

text: 设椭圆的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，上顶点为$B_{1}$，若$B_{1} F_{2}=F_{1} F_{2}=4$，则该椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;B1: Point;LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;UpperVertex(E) = B1;LineSegmentOf(B1,F2) = LineSegmentOf(F1,F2);LineSegmentOf(F1,F2) = 4

text: 已知点$A(-2,4)$在抛物线$C$:$ y^{2}=2 p x$的准线上，抛物线的焦点为$F$，则直线$A F$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(A) = (-2, 4);PointOnCurve(A, Directrix(C));Focus(C) = F

text: 抛物线的焦点是$F(1 ,-1)$，准线方程是$x-y=0$，那么它的顶点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (1, -1);Focus(G) = F;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (x - y = 0)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{3}{2}$，则该双曲线的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Eccentricity(G) = 3/2

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{k-3}-\frac{y^{2}}{k+3}=1(k \in R)$表示双曲线，则$k$的范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/(k - 3) - y^2/(k + 3) = 1);k: Real

text: 已知点$P(6 , y)$在抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上，若点$P$到抛物线焦点$F$的距离等于$8$，则焦点$F$到抛物线准线的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;P: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G)=(y^2 = 2*p*x);Coordinate(P)=(6, y1);PointOnCurve(P,G);Focus(G)=F;Distance(P,F) = 8;y1:Number

text: 点$A(0,1)$到双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0, 1)

text: 设$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点若在$C$上存在一点$P$, 使$PF_{1} \perp PF_{2}$, 且$\angle PF_{1} F_{2}=30^{\circ}$, 则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));AngleOf(P, F1, F2) = ApplyUnit(30, degree)

text: 直线$y=k(x-1)$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，已知$A B$的中点坐标为$(\frac{3}{2}, 1)$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (y = k*(x - 1));Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = (3/2, 1);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};k:Number

text: 已知$F$，$A$分别是椭圆$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左焦点和下顶点，$M(x_{0}, y_{0})$是椭圆$\Gamma$上位于第一象限内的点，点$N$的坐标为$(0, \frac{1}{y_{0}})$，若线段$F M$上存在点$H$同时满足$|\overrightarrow{F H}|=|\overrightarrow{A H}|$，$\overrightarrow{F H} \cdot \overrightarrow{N H}=0$，则$x_{0} y_{0}$=?
fact_expressions: F: Point;A: Point;LeftFocus(Gamma) = F;LowerVertex(Gamma) = A;Gamma: Ellipse;Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);M: Point;x0: Number;y0: Number;Coordinate(M) = (x0, y0);Quadrant(M) = 1;PointOnCurve(M, Gamma);N: Point;Coordinate(N) = (0, 1/y0);H: Point;PointOnCurve(H, LineSegmentOf(F, M));Abs(VectorOf(F, H)) = Abs(VectorOf(A, H));DotProduct(VectorOf(F, H), VectorOf(N, H)) = 0

text: 过点$P(1,1)$作椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的一条弦，使此弦被$P$点平分，则此弦所在的直线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2/4 = 1);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (1, 1);H: LineSegment;PointOnCurve(P, H);IsChordOf(H, G);MidPoint(H) = P

text: 抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$上的动点$P$到直线$l_{1}$: $3 x-4 y-6=0$和直线$l_{2}$: $y=-1$的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;l1: Line;l2: Line;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/4);Expression(l1) = (3*x - 4*y - 6 = 0);Expression(l2) = (y = -1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$的一直线交抛物线于$P$、$Q$两点，若线段$PF$的长为$3$，则线段$F Q$的长?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;L: Line;PointOnCurve(F, L);Intersection(L, G) = {P, Q};P: Point;Q: Point;Length(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 3

text: 直线$y=k x-k$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=4$，则弦$A B$的中点到准线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;k: Number;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (y = k*x - k);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G)

text: $F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$的两个焦点，$A$为椭圆上一点，且$\angle A F_{1} F_{2}=45^{\circ}$，则$\triangle A F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/7 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(A, G);AngleOf(A, F1, F2) = ApplyUnit(45, degree)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$,$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$且倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线$l$与双曲线交于$M$、$N$两点，则$\Delta M N F_{2}$的内切圆半径为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;M: Point;N: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 - y^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F2;LeftFocus(G)=F1;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Inclination(l) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);Intersection(l, G) = {M, N}

text: $A$是椭圆长轴的一个端点，$O$是椭圆的中心，若椭圆上存在一点$P$，使$\angle OPA=\frac{\pi}{2}$，则椭圆离心率的范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;P: Point;A: Point;OneOf(Endpoint(MajorAxis(G)))=A;Center(G)=O;PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(O, P, A) = pi/2

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，点$N(4,0)$，直线$l$过$F$且交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若以$N F$为直径的圆交$l$于点$M$(异于$F$)，且$M$是$A B$中点，则线段$M F$的长为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;N: Point;Coordinate(N) = (4, 0);l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};G: Circle;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(N, F), G);M: Point;Intersection(l, G) = M;Negation(M=F);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右焦点$F_{2}$作垂直于实轴的弦$P Q$ , $F_{1}$是左焦点，若$\angle P F_{1} Q=90^{\circ}$，则双曲线的离心率是?

C1: Ellipse;Expression(C1) = (x^2/a1^2 + y^2/b1^2 = 1);a1: Number;b1: Number;a1 > 0;b1 > 0;C2: Hyperbola;Expression(C2) = (x^2/a2^2 - y^2/b2^2 = 1);a2: Number;b2: Number;a2 > 0;b2 > 0;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C1) = {F1, F2};Focus(C2) = {F1, F2};OneOf(Intersection(C1, C2)) = P;P: Point;e1: Number;e2: Number;Eccentricity(C1) = e1;Eccentricity(C2) = e2;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = True

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$上的一动点，则点$P$到直线$l_{1}$: $4 x-3 y=7$和直线$l_{2}$: $y=-1$的距离之和的最小值是?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$作斜率为$\frac{b}{a}$的直线与曲线$C$交于点$P$，若$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的准线与$x$轴的交点为$M$，过点$M$作$C$的两条切线，切点分别为$P$, $Q$, 则$\angle P M Q$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;M: Point;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = M;P: Point;Q: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;TangentOfPoint(M, C) = {l1, l2};TangentPoint(l1, C) = P;TangentPoint(l2, C) = Q

text: 已知直线$l$: $x-\sqrt{3} y=0$交双曲线$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$于$A$、$B$两点，过$A$作直线$l$的垂线$A C$交双曲线$\Gamma$于点$C$. 若$\angle A B C=60^{\circ}$，则双曲线$\Gamma$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Hyperbola;l: Line;a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(l) = (x - sqrt(3)*y = 0);Expression(Gamma) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Intersection(l, Gamma) = {A, B};C: Point;PointOnCurve(A, LineOf(A, C));IsPerpendicular(LineOf(A, C), l);Intersection(LineOf(A, C), Gamma) = C;AngleOf(A, B, C) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)

text: 已知直线$l$与$x$轴不垂直，且直线$l$过点$M(2,0)$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\frac{1}{|A M|^{2}}+\frac{1}{|B M|^{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (2, 0);Negation(IsPerpendicular(l,xAxis));PointOnCurve(M, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}

text: 已知$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$上的一点，$F$为右焦点，点$A$的坐标为$(0, \sqrt{6})$，则$\triangle A F P$周长的最大值为?

text: 过抛物线$M$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作两条相互垂直的弦$A B$,$C D$，分别交$M$于$A$、$B$、$C$、$D$，则$|A B|+|C D|$的最小值为?

text: 已知$F_{1}$ ,$ F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左右焦点，若直线$l$过焦点$F_{1}$，且与椭圆交于$A$、$B$，则$\Delta ABF_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l,G) ={A,B}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，过原点的直线$l$与双曲线左、右两支分别交于点$P$, $Q$, 且 满 足$|Q F|-|P F|$的值为虚轴长，则该双曲线离心率为?

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$、$P$为$C$上一点，$P F$与$x$轴垂直，$Q$为$x$轴上一点，且$P Q \perp O P$，若$|F Q|=6$，则$|P F|$=?

text: 已知椭圆的中心在坐标原点$O$、$A$、$C$分别是椭圆的上下顶点，$B$是椭圆的左顶点，$F$是椭圆的左焦点，直线$A F$与$BC$相交于点$D$. 若椭圆的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则$\angle BDF$的正切值?

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，$P$为抛物线$C$上在第一象限的点.若$M$为$P F$的中点，$O$为抛物线$C$的顶点，则直线$O M$斜率的最大值为?

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$y^{2}=-16 x$的焦点，$O$为坐标原点，点$P$是抛物线准线上的一动点，点$A$在抛物线上，且$|A F|=8$，则$|P A|+|P O|$的最小值为?

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$上的点到其准线距离最小值为$1$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2=2*p*y);p: Number;p>0;H: Point;PointOnCurve(H, G);Min(Distance(H, Directrix(G))) = 1

text: 双曲线$4 x^{2}-y^{2}-4=0$上一点$P$到它的一个焦点的距离等于$3$,那么点$P$到另一个焦点的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (4*x^2 - y^2 - 4 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1:Point;F2:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F2;Negation(F1=F2);Distance(P, F1) = 3

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (b>0)$的左、右焦点，$A$是双曲线上在第一象限内的点，若$|A F_{2}|=2$且$\angle F_{1} A F_{2}=45^{\circ}$，延长$A F_{2}$交双曲线的右支于点$B$，则$\triangle F_{1} A B$的面积等于?

l: Line;E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F2: Point;Q: Point;F1: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2,l);Intersection(l, E) = {P, Q};Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q,F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q,F1))=3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q,F2))

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$作斜率为$k_{1}$的直线和抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，延长$A M$ , $B M$交抛物线于$C$，$D$两点，直线$C D$的斜率为$k_{2}$若$M(4,0)$，则$\frac{k_{1}}{k_{2}}$=?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，准线与$x$轴的交点为$H$，点$P$在$C$上，且$|P H|=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}|P F|$，则$\Delta P F H$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;H: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = H;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, H)) = (sqrt(5)/2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$作$x$轴的垂线与双曲线交于$M$、$N$两点，且$\overrightarrow{N F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{M F_{1}}<0$，则双曲线$C$的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$、$O$为坐标原点，$M$为抛物线上一点，且$|M F|=3|O F|$, $\Delta M F O$的面积为$16 \sqrt{2}$，则抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;O: Origin;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F));Area(TriangleOf(M, F, O)) = 16*sqrt(2)

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，离心率为$\sqrt{5}$. $P$是$C$上一点，且$F_{1} P \perp F_{2} P$.若$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$4$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);Eccentricity(C)=sqrt(5);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(F1, P), LineSegmentOf(F2, P));Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 4
C1: Hyperbola;a: Number;C2: Hyperbola;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C1) = (y^2/a^2 - x^2/b^2 = 1);Expression(C2) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Asymptote(C1) = Asymptote(C2)

text: $AB$是过$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$右焦点$F$的弦，过$A$作右准线的垂线$AA_{1}$,$A_{1}$为垂足，连接$BA_{1}$交$x$轴 于$C$点，则$C$的坐标是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;A1: Point;F: Point;G:Curve;C:Point;Expression(G)=(x^2/16-y^2/9=1);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);PointOnCurve(F,LineSegmentOf(A,B));RightFocus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(A,LineSegmentOf(A,A1));IsPerpendicular(RightDirectrix(G),LineSegmentOf(A,A1));FootPoint(RightDirectrix(G),LineSegmentOf(A,A1))=A1;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(B,A1),xAxis)=C

text: 焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{k}=1$的离心率为$\frac{3}{5}$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;k: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/k = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Eccentricity(G) = 3/5

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m-1}+\frac{y^{2}}{2-m}=1$表示焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m - 1) + y^2/(2 - m) = 1);m: Real;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis)

text: 过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的右焦点$F$作斜率为$k$的直线$l$与椭圆相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=2 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$k$=?

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{5} x$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
