text: 设$e$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的离心率，若$e \in(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}]$，则$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/4 + x^2/a = 1);a: Number;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e;In(e,(1/2, sqrt(3)/2])

text: 准线方程为$x=\frac{1}{2}$的抛物线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (x=1/2)

text: 与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$有相同的渐近线，且过点$(2,2)$的双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;C:Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (2, 2);Asymptote(G) = Asymptote(C);PointOnCurve(H, C)

text: 设双曲线$m x^{2}+n y^{2}=1$的一个焦点与抛物线$y=\frac{1}{8} x^{2}$的焦点相同，离心率为$2$，则抛物线的焦点到双曲线的一条渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;n: Number;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (m*x^2 + n*y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x^2/8);OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H);Eccentricity(G)=2

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，点$A$在抛物线上，若点$P$是抛物线准线上的动点，$O$为坐标原点，且$|A F|=5$，则$|P A|+|P O|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(A, C);PointOnCurve(P, Directrix(C));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 5

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F$、$P$是椭圆$C$上第一象限内的点，$O$是原点. 若$\overrightarrow{F O} \cdot \overrightarrow{F P}=|P F|^{2}$，则椭圆$C$离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(P,C);Quadrant(P)=1;DotProduct(VectorOf(F, O), VectorOf(F, P)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))^2

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=-2 p x(p>0)$的准线为圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-4 x=0$的一条切线，则抛物线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (-4*x + x^2 + y^2 = 0);IsTangent(H, Directrix(G)) = True

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的准线与$x$轴交于点$M$，过焦点$F$作倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\tan \angle A M B$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = M;M: Point;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;L: Line;Inclination(L) = ApplyUnit(60,degree);PointOnCurve(F,L) = True;Intersection(L,C) = {A,B};A: Point;B: Point

text: 设动点$A$的轨迹为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$，点$B(2,0)$为定点.若线段$A B$的中点为点$P$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(B) = (2, 0);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P;PointOnCurve(A, G)

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的右焦点到直线$x+2 y+7=0$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/8 = 1);Expression(H) = (x + 2*y + 7 = 0)

text: 已知$\triangle ABC$外接圆半径$R=\frac{14 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，且$\angle ABC=120^{\circ}$, $BC=10$，边$BC$在$x$轴上且$y$轴垂直平分$BC$边，则过点$A$且以$B$、$C$为焦点的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;R: Number;Radius(CircumCircle(TriangleOf(A, B, C))) = R;R = 14*sqrt(3)/3;AngleOf(A, B, C) = ApplyUnit(120, degree);LineSegmentOf(B, C) = 10;OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(B, C), xAxis);PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(B, C)) = yAxis;G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(A, G);Focus(G) = {B, C}

text: 双曲线$y^{2}-x^{2}=1$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2 = 1)

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$上一点$A$到焦点$F$的距离为$4$，若点$M$为抛物线$C$准线上的动点，若$\overrightarrow{M F}=3 \overrightarrow{F A}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;M: Point;F: Point;A: Point;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);PointOnCurve(A, C);Focus(C) = F;Distance(A, F) = 4;PointOnCurve(M, Directrix(C));VectorOf(M, F) = 3*VectorOf(F, A)

text: 已知$x_{0}<0$,$M(x_{0}, 0)$,$O$为坐标原点，若在抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$上存在点$N$，使得$\angle O M N=45^{\circ}$，则$x_{0}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: x0: Number;x0 < 0;M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (x0, 0);O: Origin;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);N: Point;PointOnCurve(N, C);AngleOf(O, M, N) = ApplyUnit(45, degree)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$在椭圆上，且线段$P F_{1}$的中点恰好在$y$轴上，$|P F_{1}|=\lambda|P F_{2}|$，则$\lambda$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,F1)), yAxis);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = lambda*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2));lambda:Number

text: 已知点$A(-\frac{1}{2}, 0)$，抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点为$F$，点$P$在抛物线上，且$|A P|=\sqrt{2}|P F|$，则$|O P|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);Coordinate(A) = (-1/2, 0);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, P)) = sqrt(2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))

text: 设双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$，左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，以$F_{1} F_{2}$为直径的圆与双曲线左支的一个交点为$P$. 若以$A_{1} A_{2}$为直径的圆与直线$P F_{2}$相切，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;G: Circle;H: Circle;F2: Point;P: Point;F1: Point;A1: Point;A2: Point;b>0;Expression(C) = (x^2/5 - y^2/b^2 = 1);LeftVertex(C) = A1;RightVertex(C) = A2;LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(F1,F2),G);OneOf(Intersection(G,LeftPart(C)))=P;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A1,A2),H);IsTangent(H,LineOf(P,F2))

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{2-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{2 k-3}=1$表示的图形是双曲线，则$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G)=(x^2/(2-k)+y^2/(2*k-3)=1);k:Number

text: 已知椭圆$M$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，抛物线$N$:$ y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点为$F_{2}$. 若$P$为$M$与$N$的一个公共点，且$|P F_{1}|=\sqrt{2}|P F_{2}|$，则$M$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: N: Parabola;p: Number;M: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(N) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));a > b;b > 0;Expression(M) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(M) = F1;RightFocus(M) = F2;Focus(N) = F2;OneOf(Intersection(M,N))=P;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = sqrt(2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))

text: 已知$A$、$B$分别为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右顶点，点$M$、$N$为椭圆上的两个动点，满足线段$M N$与$x$轴垂直，则直线$M A$与$N B$交点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;M: Point;N: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);LeftVertex(G) = A;RightVertex(G) = B;PointOnCurve(M,G);PointOnCurve(N,G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M,N),xAxis)

text: 已知直线$y=2 x-2$与抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，抛物线的焦点为$F$，则$\overrightarrow{F A} \cdot \overrightarrow{F B}$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Expression(H) = (y = 2*x - 2);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Focus(G) = F

text: 已知直线$l$过椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左焦点$F$且交椭圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点. 若$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=0$，过点$O$作直线$A B$的垂线，垂足为$H$，则点$H$为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};O: Origin;DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, B)) = 0;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(O, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, LineOf(A, B));H: Point;FootPoint(Z, LineOf(A, B)) = H

text: 已知点$P$在曲线$C$: $y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}$上，曲线$C$在点$P$处的切线为$l$，过点$P$且与直线$l$垂直的直线与曲线$C$的另一交点为$Q$、$O$为坐标原点，若$OP \perp OQ$，则点$P$的纵坐标为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Curve;O: Origin;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(C) = (y = x^2/2);PointOnCurve(P, C);TangentOnPoint(P, C) = l;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(P, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, l);Intersection(Z, C) = Q;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, P), LineSegmentOf(O, Q))

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=a x(a \neq 0)$上的一点$P(1,4)$到其焦点$F$的距离$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;a: Number;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = a*x);Coordinate(P) = (1, 4);PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G) = F;Distance(P, F) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F));Negation(a = 0)

text: 已知点$A(3,4)$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$C$的左、右焦点，若以$F_{1} F_{2}$为直径的圆经过点$A$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;G: Circle;F1: Point;F2: Point;A: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (3, 4);PointOnCurve(A, C);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2), G);PointOnCurve(A, G)

text: 若直线$m x+n y=4$和圆$O$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=4$没有交点，则过点$(m, n)$的直线与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的交点个数为 个?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Circle;H: Line;m: Number;n: Number;I: Point;L:Line;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);Expression(O) = (x^2 + y^2 = 4);Expression(H) = (m*x + n*y = 4);Coordinate(I) = (m, n);NumIntersection(H, O)=0;PointOnCurve(I,L)
G: Ellipse;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-4, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (4, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (5, 3);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线的渐近线方程是$y=\pm 2 x$，则此双曲线的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(2*x))

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{5+k}+\frac{y^{2}}{4-2 k}=1$表示椭圆，则$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(x^2/(k + 5) + y^2/(4 - 2*k) = 1) ;k:Number

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左右焦点，过$F_{2}$的直线交椭圆于两点$P$、$Q$，若$\angle F_{1} P Q=60^{\circ} $，$|P F_{1}|=|P Q| $,则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;P: Point;F1: Point;Q: Point;F2: Point;a > b;b > 0;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2, H);Intersection(H, G) = {P, Q};AngleOf(F1, P, Q) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1))=Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,Q))

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左, 右焦点，点$P$在椭圆上，若线段$P F_{1}$的中点在$y$轴上，则$\frac{| P F_{2} |}{|P F_{1}|}$的值为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;PointOnCurve(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,F1)),yAxis) = True

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，则直线$y=\frac{b}{a} x$的倾斜角为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Eccentricity(G) = 2*sqrt(3)/3;H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = x*(b/a))

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3 m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{5 n^{2}}=1$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2 m^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3 n^{2}}=1$有公共的焦点，那么双曲线的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;n: Number;m: Number;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (-y^2/(3*n^2) + x^2/(2*m^2) = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2/(5*n^2) + x^2/(3*m^2) = 1);Focus(H) = Focus(G)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，$C$与过原点的直线相交于$A$ , $B$两点，连接$AF$，$BF$，若$|A B|=10$,$|A F|=6$,$\cos \angle A B F=\frac{4}{5}$，则$C$的离心率$e$=?

C1:Hyperbola;C2:Hyperbola;a:Number;b:Number;a>0;b>0;m:Number;n:Number;m>0;n>0;e1:Number;e2:Number;Expression(C1)=(x^2/a^2-y^2/b^2=1);Expression(C2)=(y^2/m^2-x^2/n^2=1);Eccentricity(C1)=e1;Eccentricity(C2)=e2;Asymptote(C1)=Asymptote(C2)

text: $F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$且斜率为$k$的直线$l$与抛物线交于$P$、$Q$两点，线段$P Q$的垂直平分线交$x$轴于点$M$，且$|P Q|=6$，则$|M F|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);k: Number;Slope(l) = k;P: Point;Q: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {P, Q};M: Point;Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)), xAxis) = M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = 6

text: 已知点$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的动点，点$P$在$y$轴上射影是$M$，点$A(4 , 6)$，则$|PA|+|PM|$的最小值?

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上一点$A$到$x$轴的距离为$m$，到直线$x+2 y+8=0$的距离为$n$，则$m+n$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;m:Number;n:Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Expression(H) = (x + 2*y + 8 = 0);PointOnCurve(A, G);Distance(A, xAxis) = m;Distance(A,H)=n

text: 已知斜率为$\sqrt{2}$的直线与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，$A B$的中点为$P$，若直线$O P$的斜率为$2 \sqrt{2}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

G: Ellipse;F1: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-2, 0);F2: Point;Coordinate(F2) = (2, 0);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (5/2, -3/2);PointOnCurve(P, G) = True

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=6 x$焦点作直线$l$，交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点若线段$A B$中点$M$的横坐标为$2$，则$|A B|$等于?

fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);H: Line;Expression(H) = (4*x - 5*y + 40 = 0)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{6}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ ,以$F_{2}$为圆心作半径为$1$的圆$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆$C$上一点，$Q$为圆$F_{2}$上一点，则$|P F_{1}|+|P Q|$的取值范围为?

text: 设$A(-2,0)$, $B(2,0)$，若直线$y=a x(a>0)$上存在一点$P$满足$|P A|+|P B|=6$，且$\Delta P A B$的内心到$x$轴的距离为$\frac{3 \sqrt{30}}{20}$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: G: Line;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;a>0;Expression(G) = (y = a*x);Coordinate(A) = (-2, 0);Coordinate(B) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(P,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,A))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,B))=6;Distance(Incenter(TriangleOf(P,A,B)), xAxis) = (3*sqrt(30))/20

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$, 过$F_{1}$且与$x$轴垂直的直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，直线$A F_{2}$与椭圆的另一个交点为$C$，若$\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}=2 \overrightarrow{F_{2} C}$，则椭圆的离心率为?

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的弦被点$(\frac{1}{2} , \frac{1}{2})$平分，则这条弦所在的直线方程是?

text: 直线过点$P(-1,0)$且交抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$于$A$、$B$两点，若$A$是线段$P B$的中点，则直线$A B$的斜率为?

text: 已知曲线$C$: $y=\frac{\sqrt{20-x^{2}}}{2}$与直线$l$: $y=-x+m$仅有一个公共点，则$m$的取值范围是?

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$x^{2}-4 y^{2}=4$的两个焦点，$P$在双曲线上，且$\overrightarrow{P F}_{1} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，则$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}| \cdot|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$=?

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=m y$过点$(-1,1)$，则抛物线的焦点坐标为?

text: 已知直线$l$: $a x+(a+1) y+2=0$，点$P(-2,0)$，作$P M \perp l$于点$M$，则点$M$的轨迹方程是?

text: 若抛物线$x^{2}=8 y$上的点$P$到焦点的距离为$8$，则$P$到$x$轴的距离是?

text: 平面上两定点$A$ , $B$之间的距离为$10$，动点$P$满足$PB-PA=6$，则点$P$到$AB$中点的距离的最小值?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Distance(A, B) = 10;-LineSegmentOf(P, A) + LineSegmentOf(P, B) = 6

text: 已知斜率$k(k>0)$为的直线过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$且与抛物线$C$相交于$A$、$B$两点，过$A$、$B$分别作该抛物线准线的垂线，垂足分别为$A_{1}$、$B_{1}$，若$\frac{S_{\Delta A B B_{1}}}{S_{\triangle AB A_{1}}}=4$，则$k$=?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(m>0)$的一个焦点是$(0,1)$，则$m$=?若椭圆上一点$P$与椭圆的两个焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$构成的三角形$P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$\sqrt{2}$，则点$P$的坐标是?

text: 已知抛物线$y=a x^{2}(a>0)$上两动点$A$、$B$(不在原点)，满足$\overrightarrow{O A} \perp \overrightarrow{O B}$，若存在点$M$，使得$\overrightarrow{O M}=\lambda \overrightarrow{O A}+\mu \overrightarrow{O B}$，且$\lambda+\mu=1$，则$M$坐标为?

text: 设$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的一个动点，则点$P$到点$A(0,1)$的距离与点$P$到直线$x=-1$的距离之和的最小值是?

text: 若$P$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的右顶点，过坐标原点$O$的直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，直线$P A$, $P B$交直线$x=3$于$E$,$F$两点，则$|E F|$的最小值为?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$, 该抛物线上点$P$的横坐标为$2$, 则$|P F|$=?

text: 长为$3$的线段$A B$的端点$A$、$B$分别在$x$, $y$轴上移动，动点$C(x, y)$满足$\overrightarrow{A C}=2 \overrightarrow{C B}$，则动点$C$的轨迹方程是?

text: 直线$l$在双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$上截得弦长为$4$, 其斜率为$2$, 则直线$l$在$y$轴上的截距是?

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的渐近线方程为?

text: 中心在原点，对称轴为坐标轴的双曲线$C$的两条渐近线与圆$(x-2)^{2}+y^{2}=1$都相切，则双曲线$C$的离心率是?

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$有公共焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是两条曲线的一个公共点，则$\cos \angle F_{1} P F_{2}$等于?

text: 直线$y=x-\frac{1}{2}$被椭圆$x^{2}+4 y^{2}=4$截得的弦长为?

text: 已知$P$是以$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为左，右焦点的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右支上的一点，且满足$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$ , $\tan \angle P F_{1} F_{2}=\frac{1}{4}$，则此双曲线的离心率为?

text: 设$F$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点，过点$F$向双曲线$C$的一条渐近线引垂线，垂足为$A$，交另一条渐近线于点$B$，若$2 \overrightarrow{A F}=\overrightarrow{F B}$，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程是?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的两个焦点，$P Q$是经过$F_{1}$且垂直于$x$轴的双曲线的弦. 如果$\angle P F_{2} Q=90^{\circ}$，则双曲线的离心率是?

text: 设斜率为$2$的直线$l$过抛物线$y^{2}=a x(a>0)$的焦点$F$，且和$y$轴交于点$A$，若$\triangle O A F$ ($O$为坐标原点) 的面积为$4$，则抛物线的方程为?

text: 设$e_{1}$ , $e_{2}$分别为具有公共焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$的椭圆和双曲线的离心率，$P$是两曲线的一个公共点，且满足$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|=|\overrightarrow{F_{1} F_{2}}|$，则$\frac{e_{1} e_{2}}{\sqrt{e_{1}^{2}+e_{2}^{2}}}$的值为?

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左焦点$F$作$\odot O$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$的两条切线，记切点为$A$、$B$，双曲线左顶点为$C$，若$\angle A C B=120^{\circ}$, 则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知椭圆$T$:$\frac{{x^2}}{a^2}+\frac{{y^2}}{b^2}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{{\sqrt{2}}}2$，右焦点$F(1,0)$，三角形$ABC$的三个顶点都在椭圆$T$上，设它的三条边$AB$、$BC$、$AC$的中点分别为$D$、$E$、$M$，且三条边所在直线的斜率分别$k_1$、$k_2$、$k_3$，且$k_1$、$k_2$、$k_3$均不为$0$，$O$为坐标原点。若直线$O D$、$O E$、$O M$的斜率之和为$1$，则$\frac{1}{k_{1}}+\frac{1}{k_{2}}+\frac{1}{k_{3}}$=?
fact_expressions: T: Ellipse;Expression(T) = (x^2/a^2 + y^2/b^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;Eccentricity(T) = sqrt(2)/2;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (1, 0);RightFocus(T) = F;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;PointOnCurve(Vertex(TriangleOf(A, B, C)), T) = True;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = D;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(B, C)) = E;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, C)) = M;D: Point;E: Point;M: Point;k1: Number;k2: Number;k3: Number;Slope(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = k1;Slope(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(B, C))) = k2;Slope(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(A, C))) = k3;Negation(k1 = 0);Negation(k2 = 0);Negation(k3 = 0);O: Origin;Slope(LineOf(O, D)) + Slope(LineOf(O, E)) + Slope(LineOf(O, M)) = 1

text: 已知椭圆$C$的焦点$F_{1}(-2 \sqrt{2}, 0)$, $F_{2}(2 \sqrt{2}, 0)$，长轴长为$6$，设直线$y=x+2$交椭圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则线段$A B$的中点坐标为?

text: 已知点$O$为坐标原点，抛物线$y^{2}=3 x$与过焦点的直线交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}$等于?

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$经过点$(\sqrt{3}, 2)$，且离心率为$3$，则它的虚轴长是?

text: 已知抛物线$y=a x^{2}-1$的焦点是坐标原点，则以抛物线与两坐标轴的三个交点为顶点的三角形面积为?

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、 右焦点，过$F_{2}$的直线$l$交双曲线$C$的右支于$A$、$B$两点，且$\overrightarrow{A F}_{1} \cdot \overrightarrow{A F_{2}}=0$ , $\frac{|A F_{2}|}{|B F_{2}|}=\frac{1}{2}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 过抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$焦点的直线与此抛物线交于$A$ , $B$两点，$A$ , $B$中点的纵坐标为$2$，则弦$AB$的长度为?

text: 已知斜率为$k$的直线$l$过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，且与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=8$，则$k$=?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若椭圆$C$上存在点$M$使三角形$M F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$\sqrt{3} b^{2}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率$e$的取值范围是?

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点，若点$P$在双曲线上，且$\overrightarrow{PF_{1}} \cdot  \overrightarrow{PF_{2}}=0$,则$|P F_{1}+P F_{2}|$=?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，$P$为双曲线右支上任意一点，若$\frac{|PF_{1}|^{2}}{|PF_{2}|}$的最小值为$8 a$，则该双曲线的离心率$e$的取值范围是?

text: 设$F$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{b}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点，$C$的一个动点到$F$的最大距离为$d$，若$C$的右准线上存在点$P$，使得$P F=d$，则椭圆$C$的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上有一条长为$10$的动弦$A B$，则$A B$的中点到$y$轴的最短距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);Length(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 10

text: 椭圆$x^{2}+4 y^{2}=16$被直线$y=\frac{1}{2} x+1$截得的弦长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 4*y^2 = 16);Expression(H) = (y = x/2 + 1)

text: 直线$y=2 x+3$与曲线$y=x^{2}$相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Line;H: Curve;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y = 2*x + 3);Expression(H) = (y = x^2);Intersection(G, H) = {A, B}

text: 若双曲线经过点$(6, \sqrt{3})$，且其渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{1}{3} x$，则此双曲线的标准方程?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (6, sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(H, G);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(x/3))

text: 若直线$m x-y-2 m=0$与曲线$x=\sqrt{1+y^{2}}$有两个公共点，则实数$m$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;m: Real;H: Curve;Expression(G) = (-2*m + m*x - y = 0);Expression(H) = (x = sqrt(y^2 + 1));NumIntersection(G, H)=2

text: 已知点$P(2, a)$在抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$上，则点$P$到抛物线$C$的焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (2, a);a: Number;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(P, C) = True

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{-2-\lambda}+\frac{y^{2}}{1+2 \lambda}=-3$表示焦点在$y$轴上的椭圆，则$\lambda$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;lambda: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(-lambda - 2) + y^2/(2*lambda + 1) = -3);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis)

text: 已知动圆$M$与直线$y=2$相切，且与定圆$C$: $x^{2}+(y+3)^{2}=1$外切，则动圆圆心$M$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: M: Circle;G: Line;Expression(G) = (y = 2);IsTangent(M, G);C: Circle;Expression(C) = (x^2 + (y + 3)^2 = 1);IsOutTangent(M, C);M1: Point;Center(M) = M1

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F(4,0)$，若过点$F$且倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线与双曲线的右支有且只有一个交点，则$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;F: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F) = (4, 0);RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Inclination(H) = ApplyUnit(60, degree);NumIntersection(H, RightPart(G)) = 1

text: 以抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的焦点为圆心，以焦点到准线的距离为半径的圆被双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的渐近线截得的弦长为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;C: Circle;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x^2/4);Center(C)=Focus(H);Radius(C)=Distance(Focus(H),Directrix(H))

text: 焦点在$y$轴上，渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$的双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(2*x))

text: 已知椭圆方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$，左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆上的动点，若$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}$的最大值为$\frac{2 \pi}{3}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) =F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,G);Max(AngleOf(F1, P, F2)) = (2*pi)/3;a:Number;b:Number;a>b;b>0

text: 已知曲线$C$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=m$恰有三个点到直线$12 x+5 y+26=0$距离为$1$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: C: Curve;Expression(C) = (x^2 + y^2 = m);m: Number;D1: Point;D2: Point;D3: Point;PointOnCurve(D1, C) ;PointOnCurve(D2, C) ;PointOnCurve(D3, C)  ;Distance(D1, G) = 1;Distance(D2, G) = 1;Distance(D3, G) = 1;G: Line;Expression(G) = (12*x + 5*y + 26 = 0)

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的两个焦点，点$P$在双曲线上且满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Focus(G) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)

text: 过双曲线$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{3 a^{2}}=1(a>0)$的右焦点$F$作斜率为$k$的直线交双曲线的右支于$M$ . $N$两点，弦$M N$的垂直平分线交$x$轴于点$P$，则$\frac{|P F|}{|M N|}$=?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Hyperbola;a: Number;k:Number;H: Line;M: Point;N: Point;P: Point;F:Point;a>0;Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/a^2- y^2/(3*a^2) = 1);RightFocus(Gamma) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Slope(H) = k;Intersection(H,RightPart(Gamma))={M,N};IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(M,N),Gamma);Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(M,N)),xAxis)=P

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为$C$渐近线上一点，$O$为坐标原点，且$|O P|=1$ , $\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$\sqrt{2} a$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, Asymptote(C)) = True;O: Origin;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, P)) = 1;Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = sqrt(2)*a

text: 抛物线$y=2 x^{2}$的焦点为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = 2*x^2)

text: 点$P$是焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{25}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上的动点，若点$I$满足$\overrightarrow{PI} \cdot | \overrightarrow{F_{1} F_{2}}|+\overrightarrow{F_{1} I} \cdot |\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|+\overrightarrow{F_{2} I} \cdot | \overrightarrow{P F_{1}} |=\overrightarrow{0}$, 则点$I$的横坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;I: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 - y^2/16 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P,G);VectorOf(F1, I)*Abs(VectorOf(P, F2)) + VectorOf(P, I)*Abs(VectorOf(F1, F2)) + VectorOf(F2, I)*Abs(VectorOf(P, F1)) = 0

text: 如果方程$\frac{x^{2}}{m+1} + \frac {y^{2}}{m+2}=1$表示双曲线，那么$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/(m + 1) + y^2/(m + 2) = 1)

text: 已知点$A$、$B$是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$上的两点，$O$为原点，若$ \overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=0$, 则点$O$到直线$A B$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;B: Point;A: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);DotProduct(VectorOf(O, A), VectorOf(O, B)) = 0

text: 已知$\triangle A B C$的顶点$A$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1$的一个焦点，顶点$B$、$C$在椭圆上，且$B C$边经过椭圆的另一个焦点，则$\triangle A B C$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;B: Point;C: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 + y^2 = 1);Negation(A=F);OneOf(Focus(G)) = A;PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(C, G);F:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F;PointOnCurve(F,LineSegmentOf(B,C))

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的焦距为$6$, 则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/m = 1);FocalLength(G) = 6

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若椭圆上的点$P$满足$P F_{2} \perp x$轴，$|P F_{1}|=2|P F_{2}|$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,F2),xAxis);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1))=2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F2))

text: 若$A B$为抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的动弦, 且$|A B|=a(a>2 p)$, 则$A B$的中点$M$到$y$轴的最近距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);a: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = a;a>2*p;M: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M
P: Point;O: Origin;C: Curve;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Expression(C) = (sqrt(y^2 + (x - 1)^2) + sqrt(y^2 + (x + 1)^2) = 4);PointOnCurve(P, C);x1: Number;y1: Number

text: 已知点$P$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上任意一点，过点$P$作双曲线的渐近线的平行线，分别与两渐近线交于$M$、$N$两点，若$|P M| \cdot|P N|=b^{2}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;M: Point;N: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);L1:Line;L2:Line;PointOnCurve(P,L1);PointOnCurve(P,L2);Asymptote(G)={l1,l2};IsParallel(L1,l1);IsParallel(L2,l2);Intersection(L1,l2)=M;Intersection(L2,l1)=N;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M))*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, N)) = b^2

text: 已知抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=2 px(p>0)$的准线$l$，过$M(1,0)$且斜率为$\sqrt{3}$的直线与$l$相交于$A$，与$C$的一个交点为$B$，若$\overrightarrow{A M}=\overrightarrow{M B}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G:Line;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;l: Line;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Coordinate(M) = (1, 0);Directrix(C)=l;PointOnCurve(M,G);Slope(G)=sqrt(3);Intersection(G,l)=A;OneOf(Intersection(G,C))=B;VectorOf(A, M) = VectorOf(M, B)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$，过点$(1,0)$作倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线$l$交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，则$\triangle A O B$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (1, 0);l: Line;PointOnCurve(H, l) = True;Inclination(l) = ApplyUnit(45, degree);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};A: Point;O: Origin;B: Point

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$和椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$有相同的焦点，且双曲线的离心率 是椭圆离心率的两倍，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Ellipse;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/16 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(G) = Focus(H);Eccentricity(G)=2*Eccentricity(H)

text: 双曲线的焦距是两准线间距离的$4$倍，则此双曲线的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;L1:Line;L2:Line;Directrix(G)={L1,L2};FocalLength(G)=4*Distance(L1,L2)

text: 已知椭圆中心在原点，一个焦点为$F(-2  \sqrt{3} , 0)$，且长轴长是短轴长的$2$倍，则该椭圆的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (-2*sqrt(3), 0);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 2*Length(MinorAxis(G))
G: Ellipse;C:Ellipse;a: Number;Expression(G) = (a*x^2 + y^2 = 4);Expression(C)=(x^2/12 + y^2/9 = 1);FocalLength(G)=FocalLength(C)

text: 已知以$x \pm 2 y=0$为渐近线的双曲线经过点$(4,1)$，则该双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (pm*2*y + x = 0);H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (4, 1);PointOnCurve(H, G)

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点$F$作渐近线$y=\frac{b}{a} x$的垂线，垂足为$M$，与双曲线的左、右两支分别交于$A$、$B$两点，则双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;M:Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;L:Line;OneOf(Asymptote(G))=L;Expression(L)=(y=(b/a)*x);L1:Line;IsPerpendicular(L,L1);FootPoint(L,L1)=M;PointOnCurve(F, L1);Intersection(L1,LeftPart(G)) = A;Intersection(L1,RightPart(G)) = B

text: 顶点在原点，焦点在$x$轴上，且过点$(-4,-8)$的抛物线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Point;O: Origin;Coordinate(H) = (-4, -8);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);PointOnCurve(H, G);Vertex(G) = O
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 4

text: 设$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$的焦点，过$F$且倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$的直线交于$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;G: Line;PointOnCurve(F, G);Inclination(G) = ApplyUnit(30, degree);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B}
